273 
274 std::string activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity &act ) const
275 {
276  if( act.moves_total > 0 ) {
277  const int pct = ( ( act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) * 100 ) / act.moves_total;
278  return string_format( "%d%%", pct );
279  } else {
280  return std::string();
281  }
282 }
283 
284 aim_activity_actor::aim_activity_actor()
285 {
286  initial_view_offset = get_avatar().view_offset;
287 }
288 
289 aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_wielded()
290 {
291  return aim_activity_actor();
292 }
293 
294 aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_bionic( const item &fake_gun )
295 {
296  aim_activity_actor act = aim_activity_actor();
297  act.fake_weapon = fake_gun;
298  return act;
299 }
300 
301 aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_mutation( const item &fake_gun )
302 {
303  aim_activity_actor act = aim_activity_actor();
304  act.fake_weapon = fake_gun;
305  return act;
306 }
307 
308 void aim_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
309 {
310  // Time spent on aiming is determined on the go by the player
311  act.moves_total = 1;
312  act.moves_left = 1;
313 }
314 
315 void aim_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
316 {
317  if( !who.is_avatar() ) {
318  debugmsg( "ACT_AIM not implemented for NPCs" );
319  aborted = true;
320  act.moves_left = 0;
321  return;
322  }
323  avatar &you = get_avatar();
324 
325  item_location weapon = get_weapon();
326  if( !weapon || !avatar_action::can_fire_weapon( you, get_map(), *weapon ) ) {
327  aborted = true;
328  act.moves_left = 0;
329  return;
330  }
331 
332  gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
333  // We need to make sure RAS weapon is loaded/reloaded in case the aim activity was temp. suspended
334  // therefore the order of evaluation matters here
335  if( gun->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) && !gun->ammo_remaining() && !load_RAS_weapon() &&
336  first_turn ) {
337  aborted = true;
338  act.moves_left = 0;
339  return;
340  }
341 
342  if( gun->has_flag( json_flag_ALWAYS_AIMED ) ) {
343  you.recoil = 0;
344  }
345 
346  g->temp_exit_fullscreen();
347  target_handler::trajectory trajectory = target_handler::mode_fire( you, *this );
348  g->reenter_fullscreen();
349 
350  if( aborted ) {
351  act.moves_left = 0;
352  } else {
353  if( !trajectory.empty() ) {
354  fin_trajectory = trajectory;
355  act.moves_left = 0;
356  }
357  // If aborting on the first turn, keep 'first_turn' as 'true'.
358  // This allows refunding moves spent on unloading RELOAD_AND_SHOOT weapons
359  // to simulate avatar not loading them in the first place
360  first_turn = false;
361 
362  // Allow interrupting activity only during 'aim and fire'.
363  // Prevents '.' key for 'aim for 10 turns' from conflicting with '.' key for 'interrupt activity'
364  // in case of high input lag (curses, sdl sometimes...), but allows to interrupt aiming
365  // if a bug happens / stars align to cause an endless aiming loop.
366  act.interruptable_with_kb = action != "AIM";
367  }
368 }
369 
370 void aim_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
371 {
372  act.set_to_null();
373  item_location weapon = get_weapon();
374  if( !weapon ) {
375  restore_view();
376  return;
377  }
378  if( aborted ) {
379  unload_RAS_weapon();
380  if( reload_requested ) {
381  // Reload the gun / select different arrows
382  // May assign ACT_RELOAD
383  g->reload_wielded( true );
384  }
385  restore_view();
386  return;
387  }
388 
389  gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
390  who.fire_gun( fin_trajectory.back(), gun.qty, *gun );
391 
392  if( weapon && weapon->gun_current_mode()->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
393  // RAS weapons are currently bugged, this is a workaround so bug impact
394  // isn't amplified, once #54997 and #50571 are fixed this can be removed.
395  restore_view();
396  return;
397  }
398 
399  if( !get_option<bool>( "AIM_AFTER_FIRING" ) ) {
400  restore_view();
401  return;
402  }
403 
404  // re-enter aiming UI with same parameters
405  aim_activity_actor aim_actor;
406  aim_actor.abort_if_no_targets = true;
407  aim_actor.fake_weapon = this->fake_weapon;
408  aim_actor.initial_view_offset = this->initial_view_offset;
409 
410  // if invalid target or it's dead - reset it so a new one is acquired
411  shared_ptr_fast<Creature> last_target = who.last_target.lock();
412  if( !last_target || last_target->is_dead_state() ) {
413  who.last_target.reset();
414  }
415  who.assign_activity( aim_actor );
416 }
417 
418 void aim_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
419 {
420  restore_view();
421  unload_RAS_weapon();
422 }
423 
424 void aim_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
425 {
426  jsout.start_object();
427 
428  jsout.member( "fake_weapon", fake_weapon );
429  jsout.member( "fin_trajectory", fin_trajectory );
430  jsout.member( "first_turn", first_turn );
431  jsout.member( "action", action );
432  jsout.member( "aif_duration", aif_duration );
433  jsout.member( "aiming_at_critter", aiming_at_critter );
434  jsout.member( "snap_to_target", snap_to_target );
435  jsout.member( "loaded_RAS_weapon", loaded_RAS_weapon );
436  jsout.member( "shifting_view", shifting_view );
437  jsout.member( "initial_view_offset", initial_view_offset );
438  jsout.member( "aborted", aborted );
439  jsout.member( "reload_requested", reload_requested );
440  jsout.member( "abort_if_no_targets", abort_if_no_targets );
441 
442  jsout.end_object();
443 }
444 
445 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> aim_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
446 {
447  aim_activity_actor actor = aim_activity_actor();
448 
449  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
450 
451  data.read( "fake_weapon", actor.fake_weapon );
452  data.read( "fin_trajectory", actor.fin_trajectory );
453  data.read( "first_turn", actor.first_turn );
454  data.read( "action", actor.action );
455  data.read( "aif_duration", actor.aif_duration );
456  data.read( "aiming_at_critter", actor.aiming_at_critter );
457  data.read( "snap_to_target", actor.snap_to_target );
458  data.read( "loaded_RAS_weapon", actor.loaded_RAS_weapon );
459  data.read( "shifting_view", actor.shifting_view );
460  data.read( "initial_view_offset", actor.initial_view_offset );
461  data.read( "aborted", actor.aborted );
462  data.read( "reload_requested", actor.reload_requested );
463  data.read( "abort_if_no_targets", actor.abort_if_no_targets );
464 
465  return actor.clone();
466 }
467 
468 item_location aim_activity_actor::get_weapon()
469 {
470  if( fake_weapon.has_value() ) {
471  // TODO: check if the player lost relevant bionic/mutation
472  return item_location( get_player_character(), &fake_weapon.value() );
473  } else {
474  // Check for lost gun (e.g. yanked by zombie technician)
475  // TODO: check that this is the same gun that was used to start aiming
476  return get_player_character().get_wielded_item();
477 
478  }
479 }
480 
481 void aim_activity_actor::restore_view() const
482 {
483  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
484  bool changed_z = player_character.view_offset.z != initial_view_offset.z;
485  player_character.view_offset = initial_view_offset;
486  if( changed_z ) {
487  get_map().invalidate_map_cache( player_character.view_offset.z );
488  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
489  }
490 }
491 
492 bool aim_activity_actor::load_RAS_weapon()
493 {
494  // TODO: use activity for fetching ammo and loading weapon
495  Character &you = get_avatar();
496  item_location weapon = get_weapon();
497  gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
498  // selected gun_mode might come from a gunmod
499  item_location used_gun = &*gun != &*weapon ? item_location( weapon, &*gun ) : weapon;
500  const auto ammo_location_is_valid = [&]() -> bool {
501  if( !you.ammo_location )
502  {
503  return false;
504  }
505  if( !gun->can_reload_with( *you.ammo_location.get_item(), false ) )
506  {
507  return false;
508  }
509  if( square_dist( you.pos(), you.ammo_location.position() ) > 1 )
510  {
511  return false;
512  }
513  return true;
514  };
515  item::reload_option opt = ammo_location_is_valid() ? item::reload_option( &you, weapon,
516  you.ammo_location ) : you.select_ammo( used_gun );
517  if( !opt ) {
518  // Menu canceled
519  return false;
520  }
521  int reload_time = 0;
522  reload_time += opt.moves();
523  if( !gun->reload( you, std::move( opt.ammo ), 1 ) ) {
524  // Reload not allowed
525  return false;
526  }
527 
528  // Burn 0.6% max base stamina without cardio/BMI factored in x the strength required to fire.
529  you.burn_energy_arms( gun->get_min_str() * static_cast<int>( 0.006f *
530  get_option<int>( "PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_BASE" ) ) );
531  // At low stamina levels, firing starts getting slow.
532  int sta_percent = ( 100 * you.get_stamina() ) / you.get_stamina_max();
533  reload_time += ( sta_percent < 25 ) ? ( ( 25 - sta_percent ) * 2 ) : 0;
534 
535  you.mod_moves( -reload_time );
536  loaded_RAS_weapon = true;
537  return true;
538 }
539 
540 void aim_activity_actor::unload_RAS_weapon()
541 {
542  // Unload reload-and-shoot weapons to avoid leaving bows pre-loaded with arrows
543  avatar &you = get_avatar();
544  item_location weapon = get_weapon();
545  if( !weapon || !loaded_RAS_weapon ) {
546  return;
547  }
548 
549  gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
550  if( gun->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
551  int moves_before_unload = you.get_moves();
552 
553  // Note: this code works only for avatar
554  item_location loc = item_location( you, gun.target );
555  you.unload( loc, true );
556 
557  // Give back time for unloading as essentially nothing has been done.
558  if( first_turn ) {
559  you.set_moves( moves_before_unload );
560  }
561  }
562  loaded_RAS_weapon = false;
563 }
564 
565 void autodrive_activity_actor::update_player_vehicle( Character &who )
566 {
567  const bool in_vehicle = who.in_vehicle && who.controlling_vehicle;
568  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( who.pos() );
569  if( !( vp && in_vehicle ) ) {
570  player_vehicle = nullptr;
571  } else {
572  player_vehicle = &vp->vehicle();
573  }
574 }
575 
576 void autodrive_activity_actor::start( player_activity &, Character &who )
577 {
578  update_player_vehicle( who );
579  if( player_vehicle == nullptr ) {
580  who.cancel_activity();
581  } else {
582  player_vehicle->is_autodriving = true;
583  }
584 }
585 
586 void autodrive_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
587 {
588  if( who.in_vehicle && who.controlling_vehicle && player_vehicle ) {
589  if( who.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
590  // out of moves? the driver's not doing anything this turn
591  // (but the vehicle will continue moving)
592  return;
593  }
594  switch( player_vehicle->do_autodrive( who ) ) {
595  case autodrive_result::ok:
596  if( who.get_moves() > 0 ) {
597  // if do_autodrive() didn't eat up all our moves, end the turn
598  // equivalent to player pressing the "pause" button
599  who.set_moves( 0 );
600  }
601  sounds::reset_markers();
602  break;
603  case autodrive_result::abort:
604  who.cancel_activity();
605  break;
606  case autodrive_result::finished:
607  act.moves_left = 0;
608  break;
609  }
610  } else {
611  who.cancel_activity();
612  }
613 }
614 
615 void autodrive_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &who )
616 {
617  // The activity might be canceled because the driver got unboarded, in which case we may not have a valid pointer anymore (e.g. summoned vehicle).
618  update_player_vehicle( who );
619 
620  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Auto drive canceled." ) );
621  if( player_vehicle ) {
622  player_vehicle->stop_autodriving( false );
623  }
624  act.set_to_null();
625 }
626 
627 void autodrive_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
628 {
629  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
630  player_vehicle->stop_autodriving( false );
631  act.set_to_null();
632 }
633 
634 void autodrive_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
635 {
636  // Activity is not being saved but still provide some valid json if called.
637  jsout.write_null();
638 }
639 
640 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> autodrive_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
641 {
642  return autodrive_activity_actor().clone();
643 }
644 
645 void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
646 {
647  act.moves_total = moves_total;
648  act.moves_left = moves_total;
649 }
650 
651 void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
652 {
653  item *it_gun = gun.get_item();
654  if( !it_gun ) {
655  debugmsg( "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gun" );
656  act.set_to_null();
657  return;
658  }
659  item *it_mod = nullptr;
660  std::vector<item *> mods = it_gun->gunmods();
661  if( gunmod_idx >= 0 && mods.size() > static_cast<size_t>( gunmod_idx ) ) {
662  it_mod = mods[gunmod_idx];
663  } else {
664  debugmsg( "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gunmod" );
665  act.set_to_null();
666  return;
667  }
668  act.set_to_null();
669  gunmod_remove( who, *it_gun, *it_mod );
670  it_gun->on_contents_changed();
671 }
672 
673 bool gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_unload( Character &who, item &gunmod )
674 {
675  if( gunmod.has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
676  // Exclude brass catchers so that removing them wouldn't spill the casings
677  return true;
678  }
679  // TODO: unloading gunmods happens instantaneously in some cases, but should take time
680  // Also note, gunmod_unload is called twice, once in
681  // gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_remove
682  // and once in
683  // Character::gunmod_remove
684  // Remove one of them before making gunmod_unload take time
685  item_location loc = item_location( who, &gunmod );
686  return !( gunmod.ammo_remaining() && !who.unload( loc, true ) );
687 }
688 
689 void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_remove( Character &who, item &gun, item &mod )
690 {
691  if( !gunmod_unload( who, mod ) ) {
692  return;
693  }
694 
695  gun.gun_set_mode( gun_mode_DEFAULT );
696  const itype *modtype = mod.type;
697 
698  who.i_add_or_drop( mod );
699  gun.remove_item( mod );
700 
701  //~ %1$s - gunmod, %2$s - gun.
702  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove your %1$s from your %2$s." ), modtype->nname( 1 ),
703  gun.tname() );
704 }
705 
706 void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
707 {
708  jsout.start_object();
709 
710  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
711  jsout.member( "gun", gun );
712  jsout.member( "gunmod", gunmod_idx );
713 
714  jsout.end_object();
715 }
716 
717 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> gunmod_remove_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
718 {
719  gunmod_remove_activity_actor actor( 0, item_location(), -1 );
720 
721  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
722 
723  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
724  data.read( "gun", actor.gun );
725  data.read( "gunmod", actor.gunmod_idx );
726 
727  return actor.clone();
728 }
729 
730 void hacking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
731 {
732  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
733  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
734 }
735 
736 enum class hack_result : int {
737  UNABLE,
738  FAIL,
739  NOTHING,
740  SUCCESS
741 };
742 
743 enum class hack_type : int {
744  SAFE,
745  DOOR,
746  GAS,
747  NONE
748 };
749 
750 static int hack_level( const Character &who, item_location &tool )
751 {
752  // Quality of 2 is a base electrohack, which results in no modifier
753  int tool_quality_modifier = tool->get_quality( qual_HACK ) - 2;
754  ///\EFFECT_COMPUTER increases success chance of hacking
755  // odds go up with int>8, down with int<8
756  // 4 int stat is worth 1 computer skill here
757  ///\EFFECT_INT increases success chance of hacking
758  // tool_quality_modifier may increase or reduce the success chance of hacking
759  return round( who.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_computer ) + tool_quality_modifier +
760  static_cast<float>
761  ( who.int_cur ) / 2.0f - 8 );
762 }
763 
764 static hack_result hack_attempt( Character &who, item_location &tool )
765 {
766  // TODO: Remove this once player -> Character migration is complete
767  {
768  who.practice( skill_computer, 20 );
769  }
770 
771  // only skilled supergenius never cause short circuits, but the odds are low for people
772  // with moderate skills
773  const int hack_stddev = 5;
774  int success = std::ceil( normal_roll( hack_level( who, tool ), hack_stddev ) );
775  if( success < 0 ) {
776  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cause a short circuit!" ) );
777  tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
778 
779  if( success <= -5 ) {
780  tool->ammo_consume( ( tool->ammo_required() * 2 ), tool.position(), &who );
781  }
782  return hack_result::FAIL;
783  } else if( success < 6 ) {
784  return hack_result::NOTHING;
785  } else {
786  return hack_result::SUCCESS;
787  }
788 }
789 
790 static hack_type get_hack_type( const tripoint &examp )
791 {
792  hack_type type = hack_type::NONE;
793  map &here = get_map();
794  const furn_t &xfurn_t = here.furn( examp ).obj();
795  const ter_t &xter_t = here.ter( examp ).obj();
796  if( xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::pay_gas ) || xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::pay_gas ) ) {
797  type = hack_type::GAS;
798  } else if( xter_t.has_examine( "cardreader" ) ||
799  xfurn_t.has_examine( "cardreader" ) ) {
800  type = hack_type::DOOR;
801  } else if( xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::gunsafe_el ) ||
802  xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::gunsafe_el ) ) {
803  type = hack_type::SAFE;
804  }
805  return type;
806 }
807 
808 void hacking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
809 {
810  // TODO: fix point types
811  tripoint examp = get_map().getlocal( act.placement );
812  hack_type type = get_hack_type( examp );
813  switch( hack_attempt( who, tool ) ) {
814  case hack_result::UNABLE:
815  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot hack this." ) );
816  break;
817  case hack_result::FAIL:
818  // currently all things that can be hacked have equivalent alarm failure states.
819  // this may not always be the case with new hackable things.
820  get_event_bus().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( who.getID() );
821  sounds::sound( who.pos(), 60, sounds::sound_t::music, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
822  "alarm" );
823  break;
824  case hack_result::NOTHING:
825  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You fail the hack, but no alarms are triggered." ) );
826  break;
827  case hack_result::SUCCESS:
828  map &here = get_map();
829  if( type == hack_type::GAS ) {
830  int tankUnits;
831  fuel_station_fuel_type fuelType;
832  const std::optional<tripoint> pTank_ = iexamine::getNearFilledGasTank( examp, tankUnits,
833  fuelType );
834  if( !pTank_ ) {
835  break;
836  }
837  const tripoint pTank = *pTank_;
838  const std::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = iexamine::getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
839  uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
840  if( pGasPump && iexamine::toPumpFuel( pTank, *pGasPump, tankUnits ) ) {
841  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You hack the terminal and route all available fuel to your pump!" ) );
842  sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::activity,
843  _( "Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug" ), true, "tool", "gaspump" );
844  } else {
845  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Nothing happens." ) );
846  }
847  } else if( type == hack_type::SAFE ) {
848  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The door on the safe swings open." ) );
849  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_safe_o );
850  } else if( type == hack_type::DOOR ) {
851  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You activate the panel!" ) );
852  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The nearby doors unlock." ) );
853  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_card_reader_broken );
854  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
855  if( here.ter( tmp ) == ter_t_door_metal_locked ) {
856  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_door_metal_c );
857  }
858  }
859  }
860  break;
861  }
862  act.set_to_null();
863 }
864 
865 void hacking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
866 {
867  jsout.write_null();
868 }
869 
870 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hacking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
871 {
872  hacking_activity_actor actor( {} );
873  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
874  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
875  return actor.clone();
876 }
877 
878 void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
879 {
880  pages = bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::pages_for_recipe( *rec_id );
881  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( pages * 10_minutes );
882  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( pages * 10_minutes );
883 }
884 
885 void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &p )
886 {
887  if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4.0f ) {
888  p.cancel_activity();
889  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It's too dark to write!" ) );
890  return;
891  }
892 }
893 
894 void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
895 {
896  if( !book_binder->can_contain( item( itype_paper, calendar::turn, pages ) ).success() ) {
897  debugmsg( "Book binder can not contain '%s' recipe when it should.", rec_id.str() );
898  act.set_to_null();
899  return;
900  }
901 
902  std::set<recipe_id> recipes = book_binder->get_saved_recipes();
903 
904  if( recipes.emplace( rec_id ).second ) { // if .second is true then recipe was inserted
905  book_binder->set_saved_recipes( recipes );
906  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You copy the recipe for %1$s into your recipe book." ),
907  rec_id->result_name() );
908 
909  p.use_charges( itype_paper, pages );
910 
911  const std::vector<const item *> writing_tools_filter =
912  p.crafting_inventory().items_with( [&]( const item & it ) {
913  return it.has_flag( flag_WRITE_MESSAGE ) && it.ammo_remaining() >= it.ammo_required() ;
914  } );
915 
916  std::vector<tool_comp> writing_tools;
917  writing_tools.reserve( writing_tools_filter.size() );
918  for( const item *tool : writing_tools_filter ) {
919  writing_tools.emplace_back( tool->typeId(), 1 );
920  }
921 
922  p.consume_tools( writing_tools, pages );
923  book_binder->put_in( item( itype_paper, calendar::turn, pages ),
924  pocket_type::MAGAZINE );
925  } else {
926  debugmsg( "Recipe book already has '%s' recipe when it should not.", rec_id.str() );
927  }
928 
929  act.set_to_null();
930 }
931 
932 void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
933 {
934  jsout.start_object();
935  jsout.member( "book_binder", book_binder );
936  jsout.member( "rec_id", rec_id );
937  jsout.member( "pages", pages );
938  jsout.end_object();
939 }
940 
941 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
942 {
943  bookbinder_copy_activity_actor actor;
944 
945  JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
946  jsobj.read( "book_binder", actor.book_binder );
947  jsobj.read( "rec_id", actor.rec_id );
948  jsobj.read( "pages", actor.pages );
949 
950  return actor.clone();
951 }
952 
953 data_handling_activity_actor::data_handling_activity_actor(
954  const item_location &recorder, const std::vector<item_location> &targets )
955  : recorder( recorder ), targets( targets ) {}
956 
957 static int get_quality_from_string( const std::string_view s )
958 {
959  const ret_val<int> try_quality = try_parse_integer<int>( s, false );
960  if( try_quality.success() ) {
961  return try_quality.value();
962  } else {
963  debugmsg( "Error parsing photo quality: %s", try_quality.str() );
964  return 0;
965  }
966 }
967 
968 void data_handling_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
969 {
970  act.moves_left = act.moves_total = targets.size() * to_moves<int>( time_per_card );
971 }
972 
973 void data_handling_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
974 {
975  if( !recorder || !recorder->ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
976  p.cancel_activity();
977  p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s appears to have no energy." ), recorder->display_name() );
978  return;
979  }
980  if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
981  recorder->ammo_consume( recorder->type->charges_to_use(), p.pos(), &p );
982  }
983  time_until_next_card -= 1_seconds;
984  if( time_until_next_card > 0_seconds ) {
985  return; // not yet
986  }
987  item &eink = *recorder;
988  item &mc = *targets.back();
989  targets.pop_back();
990  if( targets.empty() ) {
991  act.moves_left = 0;
992  }
993  time_until_next_card = time_per_card;
994  handled_cards++;
995 
996  if( mc.has_var( "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ) ) {
997  std::vector<item::extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
998  try {
999  mc.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", false );
1000  eink.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", true );
1001  eink.write_extended_photos( extended_photos, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
1002  downloaded_extended_photos++;
1003  } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
1004  debugmsg( "Error card reading photos (loaded photos = %i) : %s", extended_photos.size(),
1005  e.c_str() );
1006  }
1007  }
1008 
1009  const std::string monster_photos = mc.get_var( "MC_MONSTER_PHOTOS" );
1010  if( !monster_photos.empty() ) {
1011  downloaded_monster_photos++;
1012  std::string photos = eink.get_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS" );
1013  if( photos.empty() ) {
1014  eink.set_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS", monster_photos );
1015  } else {
1016  std::istringstream f( monster_photos );
1017  std::string s;
1018  while( getline( f, s, ',' ) ) {
1019  if( s.empty() ) {
1020  continue;
1021  }
1022  const std::string mtype = s;
1023  getline( f, s, ',' );
1024  const int quality = get_quality_from_string( s );
1025 
1026  const size_t eink_strpos = photos.find( "," + mtype + "," );
1027 
1028  if( eink_strpos == std::string::npos ) {
1029  photos += mtype + "," + string_format( "%d", quality ) + ",";
1030  } else {
1031  const size_t strqpos = eink_strpos + mtype.size() + 2;
1032  const size_t next_comma = photos.find( ',', strqpos );
1033  const int old_quality =
1034  get_quality_from_string( photos.substr( strqpos, next_comma ) );
1035 
1036  if( quality > old_quality ) {
1037  const std::string quality_s = string_format( "%d", quality );
1038  cata_assert( quality_s.size() == 1 );
1039  photos[strqpos] = quality_s.front();
1040  }
1041  }
1042 
1043  }
1044  eink.set_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS", photos );
1045  }
1046  }
1047  const memory_card_info *mmd = mc.type->memory_card_data ? &*mc.type->memory_card_data : nullptr;
1048  const bool failed_encrypted = mmd && mmd->data_chance < rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
1049  if( mmd && mmd->on_read_convert_to.is_valid() ) {
1050  mc.clear_vars();
1051  mc.unset_flags();
1052  mc.convert( mmd->on_read_convert_to );
1053  } // mc is invalid past this point
1054  if( !mmd || failed_encrypted ) {
1055  encrypted_cards += failed_encrypted ? 1 : 0;
1056  return;
1057  }
1058  if( mmd->photos_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1059  const int new_photos = rng( 1, mmd->photos_amount );
1060  eink.set_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", eink.get_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", 0 ) + new_photos );
1061  downloaded_photos += new_photos;
1062  }
1063  if( mmd->songs_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1064  const int new_songs = rng( 1, mmd->songs_amount );
1065  eink.set_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", eink.get_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", 0 ) + new_songs );
1066  downloaded_songs += new_songs;
1067  }
1068  if( mmd->recipes_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1069  std::set<recipe_id> saved_recipes = eink.get_saved_recipes();
1070  std::set<recipe_id> candidates;
1071  for( const auto& [rid, r] : recipe_dict ) {
1072  if( r.never_learn || r.obsolete || mmd->recipes_categories.count( r.category ) == 0 ||
1073  saved_recipes.count( rid ) ||
1074  r.difficulty > mmd->recipes_level_max || r.difficulty < mmd->recipes_level_min ||
1075  ( r.has_flag( "SECRET" ) && !mmd->secret_recipes ) ) {
1076  continue;
1077  }
1078  candidates.emplace( rid );
1079  }
1080 
1081  const int recipe_num = rng( 1, mmd->recipes_amount );
1082  for( int i = 0; i < recipe_num && !candidates.empty(); i++ ) {
1083  const recipe_id rid = random_entry_removed( candidates );
1084  if( saved_recipes.emplace( rid ).second ) {
1085  downloaded_recipes.emplace_back( rid );
1086  } else {
1087  debugmsg( "failed saving '%s' to '%s'", rid.str(), eink.display_name() );
1088  }
1089  }
1090  eink.set_saved_recipes( saved_recipes );
1091  }
1092 }
1093 
1094 static void print_data_handling_tally( Character &who, int encrypted_cards, int photos, int songs,
1095  const std::vector<recipe_id> &recipes, int extended_photos, int monster_photos )
1096 {
1097  if( !recipes.empty() ) {
1098  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d %s: %s." ), recipes.size(),
1099  n_gettext( "recipe", "recipes", recipes.size() ),
1100  enumerate_as_string( recipes, []( const recipe_id & rid ) {
1101  return rid->result_name();
1102  } ) );
1103  }
1104  if( monster_photos > 0 ) {
1105  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You have updated your monster collection." ) );
1106  }
1107  if( extended_photos > 0 ) {
1108  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You have downloaded your photos." ) );
1109  }
1110  if( encrypted_cards > 0 ) {
1111  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "%d %s appeared to be encrypted or corrupted." ),
1112  encrypted_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", encrypted_cards ) );
1113  }
1114  if( photos > 0 && who.is_avatar() ) {
1115  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d new %s." ),
1116  photos, n_gettext( "photo", "photos", photos ) );
1117  }
1118  if( songs > 0 && who.is_avatar() ) {
1119  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d new %s." ),
1120  songs, n_gettext( "song", "songs", songs ) );
1121  }
1122  if( !( photos || songs || monster_photos || extended_photos || !recipes.empty() ) ) {
1123  who.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "No new data has been discovered." ) );
1124  }
1125 }
1126 
1127 void data_handling_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &p )
1128 {
1129  print_data_handling_tally( p, encrypted_cards, downloaded_photos, downloaded_songs,
1130  downloaded_recipes, downloaded_extended_photos, downloaded_monster_photos );
1131  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You stop downloading data after %d %s." ),
1132  handled_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", handled_cards ) );
1133  act.set_to_null();
1134 }
1135 
1136 void data_handling_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
1137 {
1138  print_data_handling_tally( p, encrypted_cards, downloaded_photos, downloaded_songs,
1139  downloaded_recipes, downloaded_extended_photos, downloaded_monster_photos );
1140  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish downloading data from %d %s." ),
1141  handled_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", handled_cards ) );
1142  act.set_to_null();
1143 }
1144 
1145 void data_handling_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1146 {
1147  jsout.start_object();
1148  jsout.member( "recorder", recorder );
1149  jsout.member( "targets", targets );
1150  jsout.member( "time_until_next_action", time_until_next_card );
1151  jsout.member( "handled_cards", handled_cards );
1152  jsout.member( "encrypted_cards", encrypted_cards );
1153  jsout.member( "downloaded_photos", downloaded_photos );
1154  jsout.member( "downloaded_songs", downloaded_songs );
1155  jsout.member( "downloaded_recipes", downloaded_recipes );
1156  jsout.member( "downloaded_extended_photos", downloaded_extended_photos );
1157  jsout.member( "downloaded_monster_photos", downloaded_monster_photos );
1158  jsout.end_object();
1159 }
1160 
1161 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> data_handling_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1162 {
1163  data_handling_activity_actor actor;
1164  JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
1165  jsobj.read( "recorder", actor.recorder );
1166  jsobj.read( "targets", actor.targets );
1167  jsobj.read( "time_until_next_action", actor.time_until_next_card );
1168  jsobj.read( "handled_cards", actor.handled_cards );
1169  jsobj.read( "encrypted_cards", actor.encrypted_cards );
1170  jsobj.read( "downloaded_photos", actor.downloaded_photos );
1171  jsobj.read( "downloaded_songs", actor.downloaded_songs );
1172  jsobj.read( "downloaded_recipes", actor.downloaded_recipes );
1173  jsobj.read( "downloaded_extended_photos", actor.downloaded_extended_photos );
1174  jsobj.read( "downloaded_monster_photos", actor.downloaded_monster_photos );
1175  return actor.clone();
1176 }
1177 
1178 void hotwire_car_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1179 {
1180  act.moves_total = moves_total;
1181  act.moves_left = moves_total;
1182 }
1183 
1184 void hotwire_car_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1185 {
1186  map &here = get_map();
1187  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1188  bool lost = !here.veh_at( here.getlocal( target ) ).has_value();
1189  if( lost ) {
1190  act.set_to_null();
1191  debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle" );
1192  }
1193  if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1194  who.practice( skill_mechanics, 1, 2, true );
1195  }
1196  }
1197 }
1198 
1199 void hotwire_car_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1200 {
1201  act.set_to_null();
1202 
1203  map &here = get_map();
1204  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( target ) );
1205  if( !vp ) {
1206  debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle" );
1207  return;
1208  }
1209  vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
1210 
1211  int skill = round( who.get_average_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) );
1212  if( skill > rng( 1, 6 ) ) {
1213  // Success
1214  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You found the wire that starts the engine." ) );
1215  veh.is_locked = false;
1216  } else if( skill > rng( 0, 4 ) ) {
1217  // Soft fail
1218  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You found a wire that looks like the right one." ) );
1219  veh.is_alarm_on = veh.has_security_working();
1220  veh.is_locked = false;
1221  } else if( !veh.is_alarm_on ) {
1222  // Hard fail
1223  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The red wire always starts the engine, doesn't it?" ) );
1224  veh.is_alarm_on = veh.has_security_working();
1225  } else {
1226  // Already failed
1227  who.add_msg_if_player(
1228  _( "By process of elimination, you found the wire that starts the engine." ) );
1229  veh.is_locked = false;
1230  }
1231 }
1232 
1233 void hotwire_car_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1234 {
1235  jsout.start_object();
1236 
1237  jsout.member( "target", target );
1238  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1239 
1240  jsout.end_object();
1241 }
1242 
1243 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hotwire_car_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1244 {
1245  hotwire_car_activity_actor actor( 0, tripoint_zero );
1246 
1247  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1248 
1249  data.read( "target", actor.target );
1250  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1251 
1252  return actor.clone();
1253 }
1254 
1255 void hacksaw_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
1256 {
1257  const map &here = get_map();
1258  int moves_before_quality;
1259 
1260  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
1261  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
1262  if( !furn_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1263  if( !testing ) {
1264  debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
1265  }
1266  act.set_to_null();
1267  return;
1268  }
1269 
1270  moves_before_quality = to_moves<int>( furn_type->hacksaw->duration() );
1271  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
1272  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
1273  if( !ter_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1274  if( !testing ) {
1275  debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
1276  }
1277  act.set_to_null();
1278  return;
1279  }
1280  moves_before_quality = to_moves<int>( ter_type->hacksaw->duration() );
1281  } else {
1282  if( !testing ) {
1283  debugmsg( "hacksaw activity called on invalid terrain" );
1284  }
1285  act.set_to_null();
1286  return;
1287  }
1288 
1289  int qual = 0;
1290  if( type.has_value() ) {
1291  item veh_tool = item( type.value(), calendar::turn );
1292  for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type.value()->qualities ) {
1293  if( quality.first == qual_SAW_M ) {
1294  qual = quality.second;
1295  }
1296  }
1297  for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type.value()->charged_qualities ) {
1298  if( quality.first == qual_SAW_M ) {
1299  qual = std::max( qual, quality.second );
1300  }
1301  }
1302  } else {
1303  qual = tool->get_quality( qual_SAW_M );
1304  }
1305  if( qual < 2 ) {
1306  if( !testing ) {
1307  debugmsg( "Item %s with 'HACKSAW' use action requires SAW_M quality of at least 2.",
1308  tool->typeId().c_str() );
1309  }
1310  act.set_to_null();
1311  return;
1312  }
1313 
1314  //Speed of hacksaw action is the SAW_M quality over 2, 2 being the hacksaw level.
1315  //3 makes the speed one-and-a-half times, and the total moves 66% of hacksaw. 4 is twice the speed, 50% the moves, etc, 5 is 2.5 times the speed, 40% the original time
1316  //done because it's easy to code, and diminising returns on cutting speed make sense as the limiting factor becomes aligning the tool and controlling it instead of the actual cutting
1317  act.moves_total = moves_before_quality / ( qual / 2 );
1318  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total );
1319  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
1320 }
1321 
1322 void hacksaw_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
1323 {
1324  std::string method = "HACKSAW";
1325 
1326  if( !veh_pos.has_value() ) {
1327  if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who, method ) ) {
1328  int ammo_consumed = tool->ammo_required();
1329  std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator iter = tool->type->ammo_scale.find( method );
1330  if( iter != tool->type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
1331  ammo_consumed *= iter->second;
1332  }
1333 
1334  tool->ammo_consume( ammo_consumed, tool.position(), &who );
1335  sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hacksaw", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
1336  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1337  //~ Sound of a metal sawing tool at work!
1338  sounds::sound( target, 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "grnd grnd grnd" ) );
1339  }
1340  } else {
1341  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
1342  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." ), tool->tname() );
1343  } else { // who.is_npc()
1344  add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." ), who.disp_name( false,
1345  true ), tool->tname() );
1346  }
1347  who.cancel_activity();
1348  }
1349  } else {
1350  map &here = get_map();
1351  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( veh_pos.value() );
1352  if( !vp ) {
1353  debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HACKSAW vehicle tool" );
1354  return;
1355  }
1356  vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
1357  if( vehicle::use_vehicle_tool( veh, veh_pos.value(), type.value(), true ) ) {
1358  sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hacksaw", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
1359  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1360  //~ Sound of a metal sawing tool at work!
1361  sounds::sound( target, 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "grnd grnd grnd" ) );
1362  }
1363  } else {
1364  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
1365  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." ), type.value()->nname( 1 ) );
1366  } else { // who.is_npc()
1367  add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." ), who.disp_name( false,
1368  true ), type.value()->nname( 1 ) );
1369  }
1370  who.cancel_activity();
1371  }
1372  }
1373 }
1374 
1375 void hacksaw_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1376 {
1377  map &here = get_map();
1378  const activity_data_common *data;
1379 
1380  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
1381  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
1382  if( !furn_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1383  if( !testing ) {
1384  debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
1385  }
1386  act.set_to_null();
1387  return;
1388  }
1389 
1390  const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->hacksaw->result();
1391  if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
1392  if( !testing ) {
1393  debugmsg( "hacksaw furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() );
1394  }
1395  act.set_to_null();
1396  return;
1397  }
1398 
1399  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->hacksaw );
1400  here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
1401  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
1402  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
1403  if( !ter_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1404  if( !testing ) {
1405  debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
1406  }
1407  act.set_to_null();
1408  return;
1409  }
1410 
1411  const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->hacksaw->result();
1412  if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
1413  if( !testing ) {
1414  debugmsg( "hacksaw terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() );
1415  }
1416  act.set_to_null();
1417  return;
1418  }
1419 
1420  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->hacksaw );
1421  here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
1422  } else {
1423  if( !testing ) {
1424  debugmsg( "hacksaw activity finished on invalid terrain" );
1425  }
1426  act.set_to_null();
1427  return;
1428  }
1429 
1430  for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
1431  const int amount = byproduct.roll();
1432  if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
1433  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
1434  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
1435  } else {
1436  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
1437  for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
1438  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
1439  }
1440  }
1441  }
1442 
1443  if( !data->message().empty() ) {
1444  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
1445  }
1446 
1447  act.set_to_null();
1448 }
1449 
1450 //TODO: Make hacksawing resumable with different tools with the same SAW_M quality.
1451 //Potentially make it possible to resume with different SAW_M quality and recalculate time to completion partway through.
1452 //This is really not a big deal, and will cost a few minutes of in game time and part of a medium battery charge at worst as someone accidentally cancels the activity_actor and has to start again
1453 //If a few minutes are life and death, sawing metal may not be the wise choice in the first place.
1454 bool hacksaw_activity_actor::can_resume_with_internal( const activity_actor &other,
1455  const Character &/*who*/ ) const
1456 {
1457  const hacksaw_activity_actor &actor = static_cast<const hacksaw_activity_actor &>
1458  ( other );
1459  return actor.target == target && ( ( veh_pos.has_value() &&
1460  veh_pos.value() == actor.veh_pos.value_or( tripoint_max ) ) || actor.tool.operator == ( tool ) );
1461 }
1462 
1463 void hacksaw_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1464 {
1465  jsout.start_object();
1466  jsout.member( "target", target );
1467  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
1468  jsout.member( "type", type );
1469  jsout.member( "veh_pos", veh_pos );
1470  jsout.end_object();
1471 }
1472 
1473 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hacksaw_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1474 {
1475  hacksaw_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
1476  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1477  data.read( "target", actor.target );
1478  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
1479  data.read( "type", actor.type );
1480  data.read( "veh_pos", actor.veh_pos );
1481  return actor.clone();
1482 }
1483 
1484 static std::string enumerate_ints_to_string( const std::vector<int> &vec )
1485 {
1486  return enumerate_as_string( vec, []( const int &it ) {
1487  return std::to_string( it );
1488  } );
1489 }
1490 
1491 bikerack_racking_activity_actor::bikerack_racking_activity_actor( const vehicle &parent_vehicle,
1492  const vehicle &racked_vehicle, const std::vector<int> &racks )
1493  : racks( racks )
1494 {
1495  parent_vehicle_pos = parent_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1496  racked_vehicle_pos = racked_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1497 }
1498 
1499 void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1500 {
1501  act.moves_total = moves_total;
1502  act.moves_left = moves_total;
1503 }
1504 
1505 void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
1506 {
1507  map &here = get_map();
1508 
1509  const optional_vpart_position ovp_parent = here.veh_at( parent_vehicle_pos );
1510  if( !ovp_parent ) {
1511  debugmsg( "racking actor lost parent vehicle at %s", parent_vehicle_pos.to_string() );
1512  act.set_to_null();
1513  return;
1514  }
1515 
1516  const optional_vpart_position ovp_racked = here.veh_at( racked_vehicle_pos );
1517  if( !ovp_racked ) {
1518  debugmsg( "racking actor lost racked vehicle at %s", racked_vehicle_pos.to_string() );
1519  act.set_to_null();
1520  return;
1521  }
1522 
1523  vehicle &parent_veh = ovp_parent->vehicle();
1524  vehicle &racked_veh = ovp_racked->vehicle();
1525 
1526  if( !parent_veh.merge_rackable_vehicle( &racked_veh, racks ) ) {
1527  debugmsg( "racking actor failed: failed racking %s on %s, racks: [%s].",
1528  racked_veh.name, parent_veh.name, enumerate_ints_to_string( racks ) );
1529  }
1530  act.set_to_null();
1531 }
1532 
1533 void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1534 {
1535  jsout.start_object();
1536  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1537  jsout.member( "parent_vehicle_pos", parent_vehicle_pos );
1538  jsout.member( "racked_vehicle_pos", racked_vehicle_pos );
1539  jsout.member( "racks", racks );
1540  jsout.end_object();
1541 }
1542 
1543 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bikerack_racking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1544 {
1545  bikerack_racking_activity_actor actor;
1546  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1547  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1548  data.read( "parent_vehicle_pos", actor.parent_vehicle_pos );
1549  data.read( "racked_vehicle_pos", actor.racked_vehicle_pos );
1550  data.read( "racks", actor.racks );
1551 
1552  return actor.clone();
1553 }
1554 
1555 void glide_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &you )
1556 {
1557  tripoint heading;
1558  if( jump_direction == 0 ) {
1559  heading = tripoint_south;
1560  }
1561  if( jump_direction == 1 ) {
1562  heading = tripoint_south_west;
1563  }
1564  if( jump_direction == 2 ) {
1565  heading = tripoint_west;
1566  }
1567  if( jump_direction == 3 ) {
1568  heading = tripoint_north_west;
1569  }
1570  if( jump_direction == 4 ) {
1571  heading = tripoint_north;
1572  }
1573  if( jump_direction == 5 ) {
1574  heading = tripoint_north_east;
1575  }
1576  if( jump_direction == 6 ) {
1577  heading = tripoint_east;
1578  }
1579  if( jump_direction == 7 ) {
1580  heading = tripoint_south_east;
1581  }
1582  const tripoint_abs_ms newpos = you.get_location() + heading;
1583  const tripoint_bub_ms checknewpos = you.pos_bub() + heading;
1584  if( get_map().tr_at( you.pos() ) != tr_ledge || heading == tripoint_zero ) {
1585  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1586  _( "You come to a gentle landing." ),
1587  _( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing." ) );
1588  you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1589  you.gravity_check();
1590  act.set_to_null();
1591  return;
1592  } // Have we crashed into a wall?
1593  if( get_map().impassable( checknewpos ) ) {
1594  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1595  _( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide." ),
1596  _( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide." ),
1597  get_map().tername( checknewpos.raw() ) );
1598  you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1599  you.gravity_check();
1600  act.set_to_null();
1601  return;
1602  }
1603  if( !you.can_fly() ) {
1604  you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1605  you.gravity_check();
1606  act.set_to_null();
1607  return;
1608  }
1609  Creature *creature_ahead = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( newpos );
1610  if( creature_ahead && creature_ahead->get_size() >= creature_size::medium &&
1611  you.get_size() >= creature_size::medium ) {
1612  // Zombies are too stupid to avoid midair collision
1613  if( !you.dodge_check( 15, true ) || ( !creature_ahead->in_species( species_ZOMBIE ) &&
1614  !creature_ahead->dodge_check( 15, true ) ) ) {
1615  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1616  _( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide." ),
1617  _( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide." ),
1618  creature_ahead->disp_name() );
1619  if( creature_ahead->get_size() < creature_size::huge ) {
1620  creature_ahead->add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false );
1621  }
1622  you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1623  you.gravity_check();
1624  act.set_to_null();
1625  return;
1626  }
1627  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1628  _( "You deftly maneuver around %s." ),
1629  _( "<npcname> deftly maneuvers around %s." ), creature_ahead->disp_name() );
1630  }
1631  you.move_to( newpos );
1632  moved_tiles ++;
1633  if( moved_tiles >= glide_distance ) {
1634  g->vertical_move( -1, false, false );
1635  moved_tiles = 0;
1636  }
1637  you.mod_moves( -you.get_speed() * 0.5 );
1638  get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().z );
1639  get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().x );
1640  get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().y );
1641  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
1642  g->update_map( you );
1643  }
1644 }
1645 
1646 glide_activity_actor::glide_activity_actor( Character *you, int jump_direction, int glide_distance )
1647  : jump_direction( jump_direction ), glide_distance( glide_distance )
1648 {
1649  you->add_effect( effect_gliding, 1_turns, true );
1650  tripoint heading;
1651  if( jump_direction == 0 ) {
1652  heading = tripoint_south;
1653  }
1654  if( jump_direction == 1 ) {
1655  heading = tripoint_south_west;
1656  }
1657  if( jump_direction == 2 ) {
1658  heading = tripoint_west;
1659  }
1660  if( jump_direction == 3 ) {
1661  heading = tripoint_north_west;
1662  }
1663  if( jump_direction == 4 ) {
1664  heading = tripoint_north;
1665  }
1666  if( jump_direction == 5 ) {
1667  heading = tripoint_north_east;
1668  }
1669  if( jump_direction == 6 ) {
1670  heading = tripoint_east;
1671  }
1672  if( jump_direction == 7 ) {
1673  heading = tripoint_south_west;
1674  }
1675 }
1676 
1677 void glide_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1678 {
1679  jsout.start_object();
1680 
1681  jsout.member( "moved_tiles", moved_tiles );
1682  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1683  jsout.member( "jump_direction", jump_direction );
1684  jsout.member( "glide_distance", glide_distance );
1685 
1686  jsout.end_object();
1687 }
1688 
1689 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> glide_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1690 {
1691  glide_activity_actor actor;
1692  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1693  data.read( "moved_tiles", actor.moved_tiles );
1694  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1695  data.read( "jump_direction", actor.jump_direction );
1696  data.read( "glide_distance", actor.glide_distance );
1697  return actor.clone();
1698 }
1699 void glide_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1700 {
1701  act.moves_total = moves_total;
1702  act.moves_left = moves_total;
1703 }
1704 
1705 void glide_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &you )
1706 {
1707  g->update_map( you );
1708  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1709  _( "You come to a gentle landing." ),
1710  _( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing." ) );
1711  you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1712  you.gravity_check();
1713  act.set_to_null();
1714 }
1715 
1716 bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::bikerack_unracking_activity_actor( const vehicle &parent_vehicle,
1717  const std::vector<int> &parts, const std::vector<int> &racks )
1718  : parts( parts ), racks( racks )
1719 {
1720  parent_vehicle_pos = parent_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1721 }
1722 
1723 void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1724 {
1725  act.moves_total = moves_total;
1726  act.moves_left = moves_total;
1727 }
1728 
1729 void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
1730 {
1731  const optional_vpart_position ovp = get_map().veh_at( parent_vehicle_pos );
1732  if( !ovp ) {
1733  debugmsg( "unracking actor lost vehicle." );
1734  act.set_to_null();
1735  return;
1736  }
1737 
1738  vehicle &parent_vehicle = ovp->vehicle();
1739 
1740  if( !parent_vehicle.remove_carried_vehicle( parts, racks ) ) {
1741  debugmsg( "unracking actor failed on %s, parts: [%s], racks: [%s]", parent_vehicle.name,
1742  enumerate_ints_to_string( parts ), enumerate_ints_to_string( racks ) );
1743  }
1744  act.set_to_null();
1745 }
1746 
1747 void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1748 {
1749  jsout.start_object();
1750  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1751  jsout.member( "parent_vehicle_pos", parent_vehicle_pos );
1752  jsout.member( "parts", parts );
1753  jsout.member( "racks", racks );
1754  jsout.end_object();
1755 }
1756 
1757 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1758 {
1759  bikerack_unracking_activity_actor actor;
1760  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1761  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1762  data.read( "parent_vehicle_pos", actor.parent_vehicle_pos );
1763  data.read( "parts", actor.parts );
1764  data.read( "racks", actor.racks );
1765 
1766  return actor.clone();
1767 }
1768 
1769 static bool is_valid_book( const item_location &book )
1770 {
1771  // If book is invalid, perhaps we lost it during the activity
1772  // If book is valid but not a book, it's probably due to a bug where
1773  // `item_location` points to the wrong item after a save/load cycle.
1774  // In both cases cancel activity to avoid segfault.
1775  return book && book->is_book();
1776 }
1777 
1778 static bool cancel_if_book_invalid(
1779  player_activity &act, const item_location &book, const Character &who )
1780 {
1781  if( !is_valid_book( book ) ) {
1782  who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
1783  _( "You no longer have the book!" ),
1784  _( "<npcname> no longer has the book!" ) );
1785  act.set_to_null();
1786  return true;
1787  }
1788  return false;
1789 }
1790 
1791 void read_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1792 {
1793  if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
1794  return;
1795  }
1796 
1797  // book item_location must be of type character
1798  // or else there will be item_location errors while loading
1799  if( book.where() != item_location::type::character ) {
1800  book = item_location( who, book.get_item() );
1801  }
1802 
1803  using_ereader = !!ereader;
1804 
1805  bktype = book->type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ?
1806  book_type::martial_art : book_type::normal;
1807 
1808  // push copy of book for focus calculation
1809  // avatar::update_mental_focus and avatar::calc_focus_equilibrium
1810  act.targets.push_back( book );
1811 
1812  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "reading time = %s",
1813  to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( moves_total ) ) );
1814 
1815  // starting the activity should cost a charge to boot up the ebook app
1816  if( using_ereader ) {
1817  ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
1818  }
1819 
1820  act.moves_total = moves_total;
1821  act.moves_left = moves_total;
1822 }
1823 
1824 void read_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1825 {
1826  if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
1827  return;
1828  }
1829 
1830  if( !bktype.has_value() ) {
1831  bktype = book->type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ?
1832  book_type::martial_art : book_type::normal;
1833  }
1834 
1835  if( who.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
1836  // It got too dark during the process of reading, bail out.
1837  act.set_to_null();
1838  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It's too dark to read!" ) );
1839  return;
1840  }
1841 
1842  if( bktype.value() == book_type::martial_art && one_in( 3 ) ) {
1843  who.burn_energy_all( -1 );
1844  }
1845 
1846  // do not spam the message log
1847  if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1848  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "%s reading time = %s",
1849  who.name, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left ) ) );
1850  }
1851 
1852  if( using_ereader && !ereader ) {
1853  who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
1854  _( "You no longer have the e-book!" ),
1855  _( "<npcname> no longer has the e-book!" ) );
1856  who.cancel_activity();
1857  return;
1858  }
1859 
1860  if( using_ereader && !ereader->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
1861  add_msg_if_player_sees(
1862  who,
1863  _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries." ),
1864  who.disp_name( true, true ),
1865  item::nname( ereader->typeId() ) );
1866  who.cancel_activity();
1867  return;
1868  }
1869 
1870  if( using_ereader && calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1871  /** Expected battery life while reading with common ereaders:
1872  integrated_ar - implant = potentially infinite
1873  ar_glasses_advanced - max 300 charges from disposable light battery = 25 hours of reading
1874  eink_tablet_pc - max 300 charges from disposable light battery = 25 hours of reading
1875  laptop - max 1200 charges from disposable medium battery = 100 hours of reading
1876  smart_phone - 120 UPS charges = 10 hours of reading
1877  */
1878  ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
1879  }
1880 }
1881 
1882 void read_activity_actor::read_book( Character &learner,
1883  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook,
1884  SkillLevel &skill_level, double penalty )
1885 {
1886  const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1887 
1888  // Calculate experience gained
1889  /** @EFFECT_INT increases reading comprehension */
1890  // Enhanced Memory Banks modestly boosts experience
1891  int min_ex = std::max( 1, to_minutes<int>( islotbook->time ) / 10 + learner.get_int() / 4 );
1892  int max_ex = to_minutes<int>( islotbook->time ) / 5 + learner.get_int() / 2 - originalSkillLevel;
1893 
1894  min_ex = learner.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::READING_EXP, min_ex );
1895 
1896  min_ex = std::lround( learner.adjust_for_focus( min_ex ) );
1897  max_ex = std::lround( learner.adjust_for_focus( max_ex ) );
1898 
1899  max_ex = clamp( max_ex, 2, 10 );
1900  max_ex = std::max( min_ex, max_ex );
1901 
1902  min_ex *= ( originalSkillLevel + 1 ) * penalty;
1903  min_ex = std::max( min_ex, 1 );
1904 
1905  max_ex *= ( originalSkillLevel + 1 ) * penalty;
1906  max_ex = std::max( min_ex, max_ex );
1907 
1908  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "%s read exp: min_ex %d; max_ex %d",
1909  learner.disp_name(), min_ex, max_ex );
1910  skill_level.readBook( min_ex, max_ex, islotbook->level );
1911 }
1912 
1913 bool read_activity_actor::player_read( avatar &you )
1914 {
1915  if( !you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
1916  you.identify( *book );
1917  return true;
1918  }
1919 
1920  std::vector<std::string> fail_messages;
1921  const Character *reader = you.get_book_reader( *book, fail_messages );
1922  if( reader == nullptr ) {
1923  // We can't read, and neither can our followers
1924  for( const std::string &reason : fail_messages ) {
1925  add_msg( m_bad, reason );
1926  }
1927  return true;
1928  }
1929 
1930  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
1931  const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
1932 
1933  std::vector<std::string> little_learned;
1934  std::vector<std::string> cant_learn;
1935 
1936  std::vector<Character *> learners;
1937  for( Character *learner : you.get_crafting_helpers() ) {
1938  const book_mastery mastery = learner->get_book_mastery( *book );
1939  const bool morale_req = learner->fun_to_read( *book ) || learner->has_morale_to_read();
1940 
1941  if( learner->is_deaf() && learner != reader ) {
1942  continue;
1943  }
1944 
1945  if( // fun readers
1946  ( mastery == book_mastery::MASTERED && learner->fun_to_read( *book ) )
1947  // reading for experience
1948  || ( mastery == book_mastery::LEARNING && morale_req )
1949  ) {
1950  learners.push_back( learner );
1951  }
1952  }
1953 
1954  // caller should check if player
1955  // can understand the book
1956  learners.push_back( you.as_character() );
1957 
1958  // Characters can move while learning from a book
1959  // Check ID of all learners to avoid
1960  // getting stuck in an infinite loop
1961  bool learner_left = true;
1962  for( Character *learner : learners ) {
1963 
1964  double penalty = 1.0;
1965 
1966  const bool reading_for_skill =
1967  learner->get_book_mastery( *book ) == book_mastery::LEARNING;
1968 
1969  const int book_fun = learner->book_fun_for( *book, *learner );
1970  if( book_fun != 0 ) {
1971  // Fun bonus is no longer calculated here.
1972  learner->add_morale( MORALE_BOOK,
1973  book_fun * 5, book_fun * 15,
1974  1_hours, 30_minutes, true,
1975  book->type );
1976  }
1977 
1978  book->mark_chapter_as_read( *learner );
1979  if( reading_for_skill ) {
1980  if( !learner->is_avatar() ) {
1981  const time_duration read_time = you.time_to_read( *book, *reader, learner );
1982  penalty = static_cast<double>( moves_total ) / to_moves<int>( read_time );
1983  }
1984  } else {
1985  continue; // reading for fun
1986  }
1987 
1988  if( skill &&
1989  learner->get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
1990  learner->get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() ) {
1991 
1992  SkillLevel &skill_level = learner->get_skill_level_object( skill );
1993  std::string skill_name = skill.obj().name();
1994  const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1995 
1996  read_book( *learner, islotbook, skill_level, penalty );
1997  const int newSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1998 
1999  // levels up the skill
2000  if( newSkillLevel != originalSkillLevel ) {
2001  get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>(
2002  learner->getID(), skill, skill_level.knowledgeLevel() );
2003 
2004  if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
2005  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your theoretical knowledge of %s increases to level %d." ), skill.obj().name(),
2006  originalSkillLevel + 1 );
2007  } else {
2008  add_msg( m_good, _( "%s increases their %s knowledge." ), learner->disp_name(),
2009  skill.obj().name() );
2010  }
2011 
2012  if( learner->getID().get_value() == learner_id ) {
2013  continuous = false;
2014  }
2015 
2016  } else {
2017  if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
2018  add_msg( m_info, _( "You learn a little about %s! (%d%%)" ), skill_name,
2019  skill_level.knowledgeExperience() );
2020  } else {
2021  little_learned.push_back( learner->disp_name() );
2022  }
2023  }
2024 
2025  if( ( skill_level == islotbook->level || !skill_level.can_train() ) ||
2026  ( learner->has_trait( trait_SCHIZOPHRENIC ) && !learner->has_effect( effect_took_thorazine ) &&
2027  one_in( 25 ) ) ) {
2028  if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
2029  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can no longer learn from %s." ), book->type_name() );
2030  } else {
2031  cant_learn.push_back( learner->disp_name() );
2032  }
2033  }
2034  }
2035 
2036  if( learner_left && learner->getID().get_value() == learner_id ) {
2037  learner_left = false;
2038  }
2039  } // end for all learners
2040 
2041  if( little_learned.size() == 1 ) {
2042  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learns a little about %s!" ), little_learned.begin()->c_str(),
2043  skill.obj().name() );
2044 
2045  } else if( !little_learned.empty() ) {
2046  const std::string little_learned_msg = enumerate_as_string( little_learned );
2047  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learn a little about %s!" ), little_learned_msg, skill.obj().name() );
2048  }
2049 
2050  if( !cant_learn.empty() ) {
2051  const std::string names = enumerate_as_string( cant_learn );
2052  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." ), names, book->type_name() );
2053  }
2054 
2055  // read non-skill books only once
2056  if( learner_left || !skill ) {
2057  continuous = false;
2058  }
2059 
2060  return false;
2061 }
2062 
2063 bool read_activity_actor::player_readma( avatar &you )
2064 {
2065  // NPCs can't learn martial arts from manuals (yet).
2066 
2067  if( !you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
2068  you.identify( *book );
2069  return true;
2070  }
2071 
2072  // std::map<std::string, use_function>::const_iterator
2073  auto mart_iter = book->type->use_methods.find( "MA_MANUAL" );
2074  if( mart_iter == book->type->use_methods.end() ) {
2075  debugmsg( "ACT_READ MARTIAL ARTS BOOK HAS NO MARTIAL ART" );
2076  return true;
2077  }
2078 
2079  const matype_id style_to_learn = martial_art_learned_from( *book->type );
2080  skill_id skill_used = style_to_learn->primary_skill;
2081 
2082  int difficulty = std::max( 1, style_to_learn->learn_difficulty );
2083  difficulty = std::max( 1, 20 + difficulty * 2 - you.get_knowledge_level( skill_used ) * 2 );
2084  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "Chance to learn one in: %d", difficulty );
2085 
2086  if( one_in( difficulty ) ) {
2087  // learn martial art
2088  mart_iter->second.call( &you, *book, you.pos() );
2089  return true;
2090  } else if( continuous ) {
2091  switch( rng( 1, 5 ) ) {
2092  case 1:
2093  add_msg( m_info,
2094  _( "You train the moves according to the book, but can't get a grasp of the style, so you start from the beginning." ) );
2095  break;
2096  case 2:
2097  add_msg( m_info,
2098  _( "This martial art is not easy to grasp. You start training the moves from the beginning." ) );
2099  break;
2100  case 3:
2101  add_msg( m_info,
2102  _( "You decide to read the manual and train even more. In martial arts, patience leads to mastery." ) );
2103  break;
2104  case 4: // intentionally empty
2105  case 5:
2106  add_msg( m_info, _( "You try again. This training will finally pay off." ) );
2107  break;
2108  }
2109  } else {
2110  add_msg( m_info, _( "You train for a while." ) );
2111  }
2112  return false;
2113 }
2114 
2115 bool read_activity_actor::npc_read( npc &learner )
2116 {
2117  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
2118  const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
2119 
2120  // NPCs don't need to identify the book or learn recipes yet.
2121  // NPCs don't read to other NPCs yet.
2122  const bool display_messages = learner.get_fac_id() == faction_your_followers &&
2123  get_player_character().sees( learner );
2124 
2125  const int book_fun = learner.book_fun_for( *book, learner );
2126  if( book_fun != 0 ) {
2127  // Fun bonus is no longer calculated here.
2128  learner.add_morale( MORALE_BOOK,
2129  book_fun * 5, book_fun * 15,
2130  1_hours, 30_minutes, true,
2131  book->type );
2132  }
2133 
2134  book->mark_chapter_as_read( learner );
2135 
2136  if( skill &&
2137  learner.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
2138  learner.get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() ) {
2139 
2140  SkillLevel &skill_level = learner.get_skill_level_object( skill );
2141  std::string skill_name = skill.obj().name();
2142  const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
2143 
2144  read_book( learner, islotbook, skill_level, 1.0 );
2145 
2146  const int newSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
2147  if( newSkillLevel != originalSkillLevel ) {
2148  get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>(
2149  learner.getID(), skill, skill_level.knowledgeLevel() );
2150 
2151  if( display_messages ) {
2152  add_msg( m_good, _( "%s increases their %s level." ), learner.disp_name(),
2153  skill_name );
2154  }
2155 
2156  continuous = false;
2157 
2158  } else if( display_messages ) {
2159  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learns a little about %s!" ), learner.disp_name(),
2160  skill_name );
2161  }
2162 
2163  if( display_messages &&
2164  ( ( skill_level == islotbook->level || !skill_level.can_train() ) ||
2165  ( learner.has_trait( trait_SCHIZOPHRENIC ) && !learner.has_effect( effect_took_thorazine ) &&
2166  one_in( 25 ) ) ) ) {
2167  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." ), learner.disp_name(),
2168  book->type_name() );
2169  }
2170 
2171  } else if( display_messages && skill ) {
2172  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." ), learner.disp_name(),
2173  book->type_name() );
2174  continuous = false;
2175  // read non-skill books only once
2176  } else if( !skill ) {
2177  continuous = false;
2178  }
2179 
2180  return false;
2181 }
2182 
2183 void read_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2184 {
2185  if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
2186  return;
2187  }
2188 
2189  const bool is_mabook = bktype.value() == book_type::martial_art;
2190  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
2191  get_event_bus().send<event_type::reads_book>( who.getID(), book->typeId() );
2192 
2193  const bool should_null = is_mabook ?
2194  player_readma( *who.as_avatar() ) : player_read( *who.as_avatar() );
2195 
2196  if( should_null ) {
2197  act.set_to_null();
2198  return;
2199  }
2200  } else { // who.is_npc()
2201 
2202  // npcs can't read martial arts books yet
2203  if( is_mabook ) {
2204  act.set_to_null();
2205  return;
2206  }
2207 
2208  if( npc_read( static_cast<npc &>( who ) ) ) {
2209  act.set_to_null();
2210  return;
2211  }
2212  }
2213 
2214  if( continuous ) {
2215  time_duration time_taken;
2216 
2217  // caller should check if npc can read first
2218  if( who.is_npc() ) {
2219  npc &n = static_cast<npc &>( who );
2220  time_taken = n.time_to_read( *book, n );
2221 
2222  } else { // who.is_avatar()
2223 
2224  // check if there can still be a reader before restarting
2225  // because npcs can move while reading for the player
2226  std::vector<std::string> fail_messages;
2227  const Character *reader = who.as_avatar()->get_book_reader( *book, fail_messages );
2228  if( reader == nullptr ) {
2229  // We can't read, and neither can our followers
2230  for( const std::string &reason : fail_messages ) {
2231  add_msg( m_bad, reason );
2232  }
2233  act.set_to_null();
2234  return;
2235  }
2236 
2237  time_taken = who.as_avatar()->time_to_read( *book, *reader );
2238  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "reading time = %s",
2239  to_string_writable( time_taken ) );
2240  }
2241 
2242  // restart the activity
2243  moves_total = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2244  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2245  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2246  return;
2247  } else {
2248  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish reading." ) );
2249  }
2250 
2251  act.set_to_null();
2252 }
2253 
2254 bool read_activity_actor::can_resume_with_internal( const activity_actor &other,
2255  const Character & ) const
2256 {
2257  const read_activity_actor &actor = static_cast<const read_activity_actor &>( other );
2258 
2259  // The ereader gets transformed into the _on version
2260  // which means the item_location of the book changes
2261  // this check is to prevent a segmentation fault
2262  if( !is_valid_book( book ) || !is_valid_book( actor.book ) ) {
2263  return false;
2264  }
2265 
2266  return continuous == actor.continuous &&
2267  learner_id == actor.learner_id &&
2268  book->typeId() == actor.book->typeId();
2269 }
2270 
2271 std::string read_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
2272 {
2273  if( !is_valid_book( book ) ) {
2274  return std::string();
2275  }
2276 
2277  Character &you = get_player_character();
2278  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
2279  const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
2280 
2281  if( skill &&
2282  you.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
2283  you.get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() &&
2284  you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
2285  const SkillLevel &skill_level = you.get_skill_level_object( skill );
2286  //~ skill_name current_skill_level -> next_skill_level (% to next level)
2287  return string_format( pgettext( "reading progress", "%1$s %2$d -> %3$d (%4$d%%)" ),
2288  skill.obj().name(),
2289  skill_level.knowledgeLevel(),
2290  skill_level.knowledgeLevel() + 1,
2291  skill_level.knowledgeExperience() );
2292  }
2293 
2294  return std::string();
2295 }
2296 
2297 void read_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2298 {
2299  jsout.start_object();
2300 
2301  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
2302  if( is_valid_book( book ) ) {
2303  jsout.member( "book", book );
2304  }
2305  if( ereader ) {
2306  jsout.member( "ereader", ereader );
2307  }
2308  jsout.member( "using_ereader", using_ereader );
2309  jsout.member( "continuous", continuous );
2310  jsout.member( "learner_id", learner_id );
2311 
2312  jsout.end_object();
2313 }
2314 
2315 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> read_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2316 {
2317  read_activity_actor actor;
2318  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2319 
2320  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
2321  data.read( "book", actor.book );
2322  data.read( "ereader", actor.ereader );
2323  data.read( "using_ereader", actor.using_ereader );
2324  data.read( "continuous", actor.continuous );
2325  data.read( "learner_id", actor.learner_id );
2326 
2327  return actor.clone();
2328 }
2329 
2330 void move_items_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2331 {
2332  const tripoint_bub_ms dest = relative_destination + who.pos_bub();
2333 
2334  while( who.get_moves() > 0 && !target_items.empty() ) {
2335  item_location target = std::move( target_items.back() );
2336  const int quantity = quantities.back();
2337  target_items.pop_back();
2338  quantities.pop_back();
2339 
2340  if( !target ) {
2341  debugmsg( "Lost target item of ACT_MOVE_ITEMS" );
2342  continue;
2343  }
2344 
2345  // Check that we can pick it up.
2346  if( target->made_of_from_type( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
2347  // Spill out any invalid contents first
2348  target.overflow();
2349 
2350  item &leftovers = *target;
2351  // Make a copy to be put in the destination location
2352  item newit = leftovers;
2353 
2354  if( newit.is_owned_by( who, true ) ) {
2355  newit.set_owner( who );
2356  } else {
2357  continue;
2358  }
2359 
2360  // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
2361  if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
2362  newit.charges = std::min( newit.charges, quantity );
2363  leftovers.charges -= quantity;
2364  } else {
2365  leftovers.charges = 0;
2366  }
2367 
2368  // This is for hauling across zlevels, remove when going up and down stairs
2369  // is no longer teleportation
2370  const tripoint_bub_ms src = target.pos_bub();
2371  const int distance = src.z() == dest.z() ? std::max( rl_dist( src, dest ), 1 ) : 1;
2372  // Yuck, I'm sticking weariness scaling based on activity level here
2373  const float weary_mult = who.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() );
2374  who.mod_moves( -Pickup::cost_to_move_item( who, newit ) * distance * weary_mult );
2375  if( to_vehicle ) {
2376  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { newit }, dest );
2377  } else {
2378  std::vector<item_location> dropped_items = drop_on_map( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { newit },
2379  dest );
2380  if( hauling_mode ) {
2381  who.haul_list.insert( who.haul_list.end(), dropped_items.begin(), dropped_items.end() );
2382  }
2383  }
2384  // If we picked up a whole stack, remove the leftover item
2385  if( leftovers.charges <= 0 ) {
2386  target.remove_item();
2387  }
2388  }
2389  }
2390 
2391  if( target_items.empty() ) {
2392  // Nuke the current activity, leaving the backlog alone.
2393  act.set_to_null();
2394  if( hauling_mode ) {
2395  std::vector<item_location> haulable_items = get_map().get_haulable_items( who.pos() );
2396  bool overflow = who.trim_haul_list( haulable_items );
2397  if( who.is_hauling() && haulable_items.empty() ) {
2398  who.stop_hauling();
2399  }
2400 
2401  if( overflow ) {
2402  add_msg( m_warning,
2403  _( "You lose track of some hauled items as they didn't fit on the current tile." ) );
2404  }
2405  }
2406  }
2407 }
2408 
2409 void move_items_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2410 {
2411  jsout.start_object();
2412 
2413  jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
2414  jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
2415  jsout.member( "to_vehicle", to_vehicle );
2416  jsout.member( "relative_destination", relative_destination );
2417  jsout.member( "hauling_mode", hauling_mode );
2418 
2419  jsout.end_object();
2420 }
2421 
2422 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> move_items_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2423 {
2424  move_items_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, false, tripoint_zero );
2425 
2426  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2427 
2428  data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
2429  data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
2430  data.read( "to_vehicle", actor.to_vehicle );
2431  data.read( "relative_destination", actor.relative_destination );
2432  data.read( "hauling_mode", actor.hauling_mode );
2433 
2434  return actor.clone();
2435 }
2436 
2437 static void cancel_pickup( Character &who )
2438 {
2439  who.cancel_activity();
2440  if( who.is_hauling() && !get_map().has_haulable_items( who.pos() ) ) {
2441  who.stop_hauling();
2442  }
2443  who.drop_invalid_inventory();
2444 }
2445 
2446 void pickup_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
2447 {
2448  // If we don't have target items bail out
2449  if( target_items.empty() ) {
2450  cancel_pickup( who );
2451  return;
2452  }
2453 
2454  // If the player moves while picking up (i.e.: in a moving vehicle) cancel
2455  // the activity, only populate starting_pos when grabbing from the ground
2456  if( starting_pos && *starting_pos != who.pos() ) {
2457  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Moving canceled auto-pickup." ) );
2458  cancel_pickup( who );
2459  return;
2460  }
2461 
2462  // False indicates that the player canceled pickup when met with some prompt
2463  const bool keep_going = Pickup::do_pickup( target_items, quantities, autopickup,
2464  stash_successful, info );
2465 
2466  // If there are items left we ran out of moves, so continue the activity
2467  // Otherwise, we are done.
2468  if( !keep_going || target_items.empty() ) {
2469  if( !stash_successful && !autopickup ) {
2470  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Some items were not picked up!" ) );
2471  }
2472 
2473  cancel_pickup( who );
2474 
2475  if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
2476  who.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
2477  }
2478 
2479  if( !keep_going ) {
2480  // The user canceled the activity, so we're done
2481  // AIM might have more pickup activities pending, also cancel them.
2482  // TODO: Move this to advanced inventory instead of hacking it in here
2483  cancel_aim_processing();
2484  }
2485  }
2486 }
2487 
2488 void pickup_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2489 {
2490  jsout.start_object();
2491 
2492  jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
2493  jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
2494  jsout.member( "starting_pos", starting_pos );
2495  jsout.member( "stash_successful", stash_successful );
2496  jsout.member( "autopickup", autopickup );
2497  jsout.member( "info", info );
2498 
2499  jsout.end_object();
2500 }
2501 
2502 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> pickup_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2503 {
2504  pickup_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, std::nullopt, false );
2505 
2506  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2507 
2508  data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
2509  data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
2510  data.read( "starting_pos", actor.starting_pos );
2511  data.read( "stash_successful", actor.stash_successful );
2512  data.read( "autopickup", actor.autopickup );
2513  data.read( "info", actor.info );
2514 
2515  return actor.clone();
2516 }
2517
