2518 void boltcutting_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
2519 {
2520  const map &here = get_map();
2521 
2522  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2523  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2524  if( !furn_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2525  if( !testing ) {
2526  debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
2527  }
2528  act.set_to_null();
2529  return;
2530  }
2531 
2532  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( furn_type->boltcut->duration() );
2533  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
2534  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2535  if( !ter_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2536  if( !testing ) {
2537  debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
2538  }
2539  act.set_to_null();
2540  return;
2541  }
2542  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( ter_type->boltcut->duration() );
2543  } else {
2544  if( !testing ) {
2545  debugmsg( "boltcut activity called on invalid terrain" );
2546  }
2547  act.set_to_null();
2548  return;
2549  }
2550 
2551  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total );
2552  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
2553 }
2554 
2555 void boltcutting_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
2556 {
2557  if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
2558  tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
2559  } else {
2560  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
2561  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." ), tool->tname() );
2562  } else { // who.is_npc()
2563  add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." ), who.disp_name( false,
2564  true ), tool->tname() );
2565  }
2566  who.cancel_activity();
2567  }
2568 }
2569 
2570 void boltcutting_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2571 {
2572  map &here = get_map();
2573  const activity_data_common *data;
2574 
2575  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2576  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2577  if( !furn_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2578  if( !testing ) {
2579  debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
2580  }
2581  act.set_to_null();
2582  return;
2583  }
2584 
2585  const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->boltcut->result();
2586  if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
2587  if( !testing ) {
2588  debugmsg( "boltcut furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() );
2589  }
2590  act.set_to_null();
2591  return;
2592  }
2593 
2594  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->boltcut );
2595  here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
2596  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
2597  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2598  if( !ter_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2599  if( !testing ) {
2600  debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
2601  }
2602  act.set_to_null();
2603  return;
2604  }
2605 
2606  const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->boltcut->result();
2607  if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
2608  if( !testing ) {
2609  debugmsg( "boltcut terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() );
2610  }
2611  act.set_to_null();
2612  return;
2613  }
2614 
2615  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->boltcut );
2616  here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
2617  } else {
2618  if( !testing ) {
2619  debugmsg( "boltcut activity finished on invalid terrain" );
2620  }
2621  act.set_to_null();
2622  return;
2623  }
2624 
2625  if( data->sound().empty() ) {
2626  sounds::sound( target, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Snick, snick, gachunk!" ),
2627  true, "tool", "boltcutters" );
2628  } else {
2629  sounds::sound( target, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, data->sound().translated(),
2630  true, "tool", "boltcutters" );
2631  }
2632 
2633  for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
2634  const int amount = byproduct.roll();
2635  if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
2636  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
2637  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
2638  } else {
2639  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
2640  for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
2641  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
2642  }
2643  }
2644  }
2645 
2646  if( !data->message().empty() ) {
2647  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
2648  }
2649 
2650  act.set_to_null();
2651 }
2652 
2653 void boltcutting_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2654 {
2655  jsout.start_object();
2656  jsout.member( "target", target );
2657  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
2658  jsout.end_object();
2659 }
2660 
2661 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> boltcutting_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2662 {
2663  boltcutting_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
2664  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2665  data.read( "target", actor.target );
2666  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
2667  return actor.clone();
2668 }
2669 
2670 lockpick_activity_actor lockpick_activity_actor::use_item(
2671  int moves_total,
2672  const item_location &lockpick,
2673  const tripoint &target
2674 )
2675 {
2676  return lockpick_activity_actor {
2677  moves_total,
2678  lockpick,
2679  std::nullopt,
2680  target
2681  };
2682 }
2683 
2684 lockpick_activity_actor lockpick_activity_actor::use_bionic(
2685  const tripoint &target
2686 )
2687 {
2688  return lockpick_activity_actor {
2689  to_moves<int>( 4_seconds ),
2690  std::nullopt,
2691  item( itype_pseudo_bio_picklock ),
2692  target
2693  };
2694 }
2695 
2696 void lockpick_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
2697 {
2698  act.moves_left = moves_total;
2699  act.moves_total = moves_total;
2700 
2701  const time_duration lockpicking_time = time_duration::from_moves( moves_total );
2702  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK, "lockpicking time = %s",
2703  to_string_writable( lockpicking_time ) );
2704 }
2705 
2706 void lockpick_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2707 {
2708  act.set_to_null();
2709 
2710  item *it;
2711  if( lockpick.has_value() ) {
2712  it = ( *lockpick ).get_item();
2713  } else {
2714  it = &*fake_lockpick;
2715  }
2716 
2717  if( !it ) {
2718  debugmsg( "Lost ACT_LOCKPICK item" );
2719  return;
2720  }
2721 
2722  map &here = get_map();
2723  const tripoint target = here.getlocal( this->target );
2724  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2725  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2726  optional_vpart_position const veh = here.veh_at( target );
2727  int locked_part = -1;
2728  ter_id new_ter_type;
2729  furn_id new_furn_type;
2730  std::string open_message = _( "The lock opens…" );
2731 
2732  if( veh ) {
2733  std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts_at_target = veh->vehicle().get_parts_at(
2734  target, "LOCKABLE_DOOR", part_status_flag::available );
2735  if( !parts_at_target.empty() ) {
2736  locked_part = veh->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock(
2737  veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );
2738  }
2739  }
2740 
2741  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2742  if( furn_type->lockpick_result.is_null() ) {
2743  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't open this lock." ) );
2744  return;
2745  }
2746 
2747  new_furn_type = furn_type->lockpick_result;
2748  if( !furn_type->lockpick_message.empty() ) {
2749  open_message = furn_type->lockpick_message.translated();
2750  }
2751  } else if( locked_part >= 0 ) {
2752  // no-op.
2753  } else {
2754  if( ter_type->lockpick_result.is_null() ) {
2755  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't open this lock." ) );
2756  return;
2757  }
2758 
2759  new_ter_type = ter_type->lockpick_result;
2760  if( !ter_type->lockpick_message.empty() ) {
2761  open_message = ter_type->lockpick_message.translated();
2762  }
2763  }
2764 
2765  bool perfect = it->has_flag( flag_PERFECT_LOCKPICK );
2766  bool destroy = false;
2767 
2768  // Your devices skill is the primary skill that applies to your roll. Your mechanics skill has a little input.
2769  const float weighted_skill_average = ( 3.0f * who.get_skill_level(
2770  skill_traps ) + who.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) / 4.0f;
2771 
2772  // Your dexterity determines most of your stat contribution, but your intelligence and perception combined are about half as much.
2773  const float weighted_stat_average = ( 6.0f * who.dex_cur + 2.0f * who.per_cur +
2774  who.int_cur ) / 9.0f;
2775 
2776  // Get a bonus from your lockpick quality if the quality is higher than 3, or a penalty if it is lower. For a bobby pin this puts you at -2, for a locksmith kit, +2.
2777  const float tool_effect = ( it->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) - 3 ) - ( it->damage() / 2000.0 );
2778 
2779  // Without at least a basic lockpick proficiency, your skill level is effectively 6 levels lower.
2780  int proficiency_effect = -3;
2781  int duration_proficiency_factor = 10;
2782  if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking ) ) {
2783  // If you have the basic lockpick prof, negate the above penalty
2784  proficiency_effect = 0;
2785  duration_proficiency_factor = 5;
2786  }
2787  if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking_expert ) ) {
2788  // If you have the locksmith proficiency, your skill level is effectively 4 levels higher.
2789  proficiency_effect = 3;
2790  duration_proficiency_factor = 1;
2791  }
2792 
2793  // We get our average roll by adding the above factors together. For a person with no skill, average stats, no proficiencies, and an improvised lockpick, mean_roll will be 2.
2794  const float mean_roll = weighted_skill_average + ( weighted_stat_average / 4 ) + proficiency_effect
2795  + tool_effect;
2796 
2797  // A standard deviation of 2 means that about 2/3 of rolls will come within 2 points of your mean_roll. Lockpicking
2798  int pick_roll = std::round( normal_roll( mean_roll, 2 ) );
2799 
2800  // Lock_roll should be replaced with a flat value defined by the door, soon.
2801  // In the meantime, let's roll 3d5-3, giving us a range of 0-12.
2802  int lock_roll = rng( 0, 4 ) + rng( 0, 4 ) + rng( 0, 4 );
2803 
2804  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK, "Rolled %i. Mean_roll %g. Difficulty %i.",
2805  pick_roll, mean_roll, lock_roll );
2806 
2807  // Your base skill XP gain is derived from the lock difficulty (which is currently random but shouldn't be).
2808  int xp_gain = 3 * lock_roll;
2809  if( perfect || ( pick_roll >= lock_roll ) ) {
2810  if( !perfect ) {
2811  // Increase your XP if you successfully pick the lock, unless you were using a Perfect Lockpick.
2812  xp_gain = xp_gain * 2;
2813  }
2814  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2815  here.furn_set( target, new_furn_type );
2816  } else if( locked_part >= 0 ) {
2817  veh->vehicle().unlock( locked_part );
2818  } else {
2819  here.ter_set( target, new_ter_type );
2820  }
2821  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, open_message );
2822  } else if( furn_type == furn_f_gunsafe_ml && lock_roll > ( 3 * pick_roll ) ) {
2823  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your clumsy attempt jams the lock!" ) );
2824  here.furn_set( target, furn_f_gunsafe_mj );
2825  } else if( lock_roll > ( 1.5 * pick_roll ) ) {
2826  if( it->inc_damage() ) {
2827  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2828  _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you destroy your tool." ) );
2829  destroy = true;
2830  } else {
2831  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2832  _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you damage your tool." ) );
2833  }
2834  } else {
2835  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it." ) );
2836  }
2837 
2838  if( avatar *you = dynamic_cast<avatar *>( &who ) ) {
2839  // Gives another boost to XP, reduced by your skill level.
2840  // Higher skill levels require more difficult locks to gain a meaningful amount of xp.
2841  // Again, we're using randomized lock_roll until a defined lock difficulty is implemented.
2842  if( lock_roll > round( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) ) ) {
2843  xp_gain += lock_roll + ( xp_gain / ( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + 1 ) );
2844  } else {
2845  xp_gain += xp_gain / ( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + 1 );
2846  }
2847  you->practice( skill_traps, xp_gain );
2848  }
2849 
2850  if( !perfect && ter_type == ter_t_door_locked_alarm && ( lock_roll + dice( 1, 30 ) ) > pick_roll ) {
2851  sounds::sound( who.pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
2852  "alarm" );
2853  }
2854 
2855  if( destroy && lockpick.has_value() ) {
2856  ( *lockpick ).remove_item();
2857  }
2858 
2859  who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking,
2860  time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_total ) / duration_proficiency_factor );
2861  who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking_expert,
2862  time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_total ) / duration_proficiency_factor );
2863 }
2864 
2865 std::optional<tripoint> lockpick_activity_actor::select_location( avatar &you )
2866 {
2867  if( you.cant_do_mounted() ) {
2868  return std::nullopt;
2869  }
2870 
2871  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> is_pickable = [&you]( const tripoint & p ) {
2872  const map &here = get_map();
2873  const optional_vpart_position vpart = here.veh_at( p );
2874  if( p == you.pos() ) {
2875  return false;
2876  }
2877  return here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PICKABLE, p ) ||
2878  ( vpart && vpart->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock( vpart->part_index() ) >= 0 );
2879  };
2880 
2881  std::optional<tripoint> target = choose_adjacent_highlight(
2882  _( "Use your lockpick where?" ), _( "There is nothing to lockpick nearby." ), is_pickable, false );
2883  if( !target ) {
2884  return std::nullopt;
2885  }
2886 
2887  if( is_pickable( *target ) ) {
2888  return target;
2889  }
2890 
2891  const ter_id terr_type = get_map().ter( *target );
2892  if( *target == you.pos() ) {
2893  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You pick your nose and your sinuses swing open." ) );
2894  } else if( get_creature_tracker().creature_at<npc>( *target ) ) {
2895  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2896  _( "You can pick your friends, and you can\npick your nose, but you can't pick\nyour friend's nose." ) );
2897  } else if( terr_type == ter_t_door_c ) {
2898  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That door isn't locked." ) );
2899  } else {
2900  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That cannot be picked." ) );
2901  }
2902  return std::nullopt;
2903 }
2904 
2905 void lockpick_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2906 {
2907  jsout.start_object();
2908 
2909  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
2910  jsout.member( "lockpick", lockpick );
2911  jsout.member( "fake_lockpick", fake_lockpick );
2912  jsout.member( "target", target );
2913 
2914  jsout.end_object();
2915 }
2916 
2917 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> lockpick_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2918 {
2919  lockpick_activity_actor actor( 0, std::nullopt, std::nullopt, tripoint_zero );
2920 
2921  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2922 
2923  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
2924  data.read( "lockpick", actor.lockpick );
2925  data.read( "fake_lockpick", actor.fake_lockpick );
2926  data.read( "target", actor.target );
2927 
2928  return actor.clone();
2929 }
2930 
2931 int ebooksave_activity_actor::total_pages(
2932  const std::vector<item_location> &books )
2933 {
2934  int pages = 0;
2935  for( const item_location &book : books ) {
2936  pages += pages_in_book( book->typeId() );
2937  }
2938  return pages;
2939 }
2940 
2941 time_duration ebooksave_activity_actor::required_time(
2942  const std::vector<item_location> &books )
2943 {
2944  return total_pages( books ) * time_per_page;
2945 }
2946 
2947 int ebooksave_activity_actor::required_charges(
2948  const std::vector<item_location> &books,
2949  const item_location &ereader )
2950 {
2951  const int charges = total_pages( books ) / pages_per_charge;
2952  return charges * ereader->ammo_required();
2953 }
2954 
2955 void ebooksave_activity_actor::start_scanning_next_book( player_activity &act )
2956 {
2957  while( !books.empty() && !books.back() ) {
2958  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_EBOOK, "Skipping unavailable book at %s",
2959  books.back().describe() );
2960  books.pop_back();
2961  }
2962  if( books.empty() ) {
2963  act.moves_left = 0;
2964  return;
2965  }
2966  const item_location &current_book = books.back();
2967  const int pages_in_current_book = pages_in_book( current_book->typeId() );
2968  turns_left_on_current_book = to_turns<int>( pages_in_current_book * time_per_page );
2969  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( required_time( books ) );
2970 }
2971 
2972 void ebooksave_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
2973 {
2974  const time_duration scanning_time = required_time( books );
2975  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_EBOOK, "scanning_time time = %s",
2976  to_string_writable( scanning_time ) );
2977  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( scanning_time );
2978  start_scanning_next_book( act );
2979 }
2980 
2981 void ebooksave_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2982 {
2983  // only consume charges every 25 pages
2984  if( calendar::once_every( pages_per_charge * time_per_page ) ) {
2985  if( !ereader->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
2986  add_msg_if_player_sees(
2987  who,
2988  _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries." ),
2989  who.disp_name( true, true ),
2990  item::nname( ereader->typeId() ) );
2991  who.cancel_activity();
2992  return;
2993  }
2994 
2995  ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
2996  }
2997 
2998  turns_left_on_current_book--;
2999  if( turns_left_on_current_book > 0 ) {
3000  return; // not fully scanned yet
3001  }
3002 
3003  // We have now spent enough time to fully scan current book
3004  completed_scanning_current_book( act, who );
3005 }
3006 
3007 void ebooksave_activity_actor::completed_scanning_current_book( player_activity &act,
3008  Character &who )
3009 {
3010  item_location scanned_book = books.back();
3011  books.pop_back();
3012  if( scanned_book ) {
3013  ereader->put_in( *scanned_book, pocket_type::EBOOK );
3014  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3015  if( !who.has_identified( scanned_book->typeId() ) ) {
3016  who.identify( *scanned_book );
3017  }
3018  }
3019  handled_books++;
3020  } else {
3021  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_EBOOK,
3022  "Spent time to scan book at %s, but it is no longer available?",
3023  scanned_book.describe() );
3024  }
3025  start_scanning_next_book( act );
3026 }
3027 
3028 void ebooksave_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3029 {
3030  while( !books.empty() ) {
3031  // We can end up here with books left if the player has speed>100
3032  completed_scanning_current_book( act, who );
3033  }
3034  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3035  add_msg( m_info, _( "You scan %d %s into your device." ), handled_books,
3036  n_gettext( "book", "books", handled_books ) );
3037  } else { // who.is_npc()
3038  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%s scans %d %s into their device." ),
3039  who.disp_name( false, true ), handled_books, n_gettext( "book", "books", handled_books ) );
3040  }
3041  act.set_to_null();
3042 }
3043 
3044 void ebooksave_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3045 {
3046  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3047  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop scanning the remaining books." ) );
3048  } else { // who.is_npc()
3049  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%s stops scanning books." ),
3050  who.disp_name( false, true ) );
3051  }
3052  act.set_to_null();
3053 }
3054 
3055 void ebooksave_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3056 {
3057  jsout.start_object();
3058  jsout.member( "books", books );
3059  jsout.member( "ereader", ereader );
3060  jsout.member( "handled_books", handled_books );
3061  jsout.member( "turns_left_on_current_book", turns_left_on_current_book );
3062  jsout.end_object();
3063 }
3064 
3065 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> ebooksave_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3066 {
3067  ebooksave_activity_actor actor = ebooksave_activity_actor( {}, {} );
3068 
3069  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3070  data.read( "books", actor.books );
3071  if( data.has_member( "book" ) ) {
3072  // legacy compatibility: in 0.G, this activity only handled one book each
3073  item_location book;
3074  data.read( "book", book );
3075  actor.books.push_back( book );
3076  }
3077  data.read( "ereader", actor.ereader );
3078  data.read( "handled_books", actor.handled_books );
3079  data.read( "turns_left_on_current_book", actor.turns_left_on_current_book );
3080  return actor.clone();
3081 }
3082 
3083 void migration_cancel_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3084 {
3085  // Stop the activity
3086  act.set_to_null();
3087 
3088  // Ensure that neither avatars nor npcs end up in an invalid state
3089  if( who.is_npc() ) {
3090  npc &npc_who = dynamic_cast<npc &>( who );
3091  npc_who.revert_after_activity();
3092  } else {
3093  avatar &avatar_who = dynamic_cast<avatar &>( who );
3094  avatar_who.clear_destination();
3095  avatar_who.backlog.clear();
3096  }
3097 }
3098 
3099 void migration_cancel_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3100 {
3101  // This will probably never be called, but write null to avoid invalid json in
3102  // the case that it is
3103  jsout.write_null();
3104 }
3105 
3106 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> migration_cancel_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
3107 {
3108  return migration_cancel_activity_actor().clone();
3109 }
3110 
3111 void open_gate_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
3112 {
3113  act.moves_total = moves_total;
3114  act.moves_left = moves_total;
3115 }
3116 
3117 void open_gate_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3118 {
3119  gates::open_gate( placement );
3120  act.set_to_null();
3121 }
3122

3128  jsout.member( "placement", placement );

3133 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> open_gate_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3134 {
3135  open_gate_activity_actor actor( 0, tripoint_bub_ms( tripoint_zero ) );
3136 
3137  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3138 
3139  data.read( "moves", actor.moves_total );
3140  data.read( "placement", actor.placement );
3141 
3142  return actor.clone();
3143 }
3144 
3145 void consume_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &guy )
3146 {
3147  int moves = 0;
3148  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3149  if( consume_location ) {
3150  ret_val<edible_rating> ret = player_character.will_eat( *consume_location, true );
3151  if( !ret.success() ) {
3152  canceled = true;
3153  consume_menu_selections = std::vector<int>();
3154  consume_menu_selected_items.clear();
3155  consume_menu_filter.clear();
3156  } else {
3157  moves = to_moves<int>( guy.get_consume_time( *consume_location ) );
3158  }
3159  } else if( !consume_item.is_null() ) {
3160  ret_val<edible_rating> ret = player_character.will_eat( consume_item, true );
3161  if( !ret.success() ) {
3162  canceled = true;
3163  consume_menu_selections = std::vector<int>();
3164  consume_menu_selected_items.clear();
3165  consume_menu_filter.clear();
3166  } else {
3167  moves = to_moves<int>( guy.get_consume_time( consume_item ) );
3168  }
3169  } else {
3170  debugmsg( "Item/location to be consumed should not be null." );
3171  canceled = true;
3172  }
3173 
3174  act.moves_total = moves;
3175  act.moves_left = moves;
3176 }
3177 
3178 void consume_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3179 {
3180  // Prevent interruptions from this point onwards, so that e.g. pain from
3181  // injecting serum doesn't pop up messages about cancelling consuming (it's
3182  // too late; we've already consumed).
3183  act.interruptable = false;
3184 
3185  // Consuming an item may cause various effects, including cancelling our activity.
3186  // Back up these values since this activity actor might be destroyed.
3187  std::vector<int> temp_selections = consume_menu_selections;
3188  const std::vector<item_location> temp_selected_items = consume_menu_selected_items;
3189  const std::string temp_filter = consume_menu_filter;
3190  item_location consume_loc = consume_location;
3191  activity_id new_act = type;
3192 
3193  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3194  if( !canceled ) {
3195  if( consume_loc ) {
3196  player_character.consume( consume_loc, /*force=*/true );
3197  } else if( !consume_item.is_null() ) {
3198  player_character.consume( consume_item, /*force=*/true );
3199  } else {
3200  debugmsg( "Item location/name to be consumed should not be null." );
3201  }
3202  if( player_character.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
3203  player_character.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
3204  }
3205  }
3206 
3207  if( act.id() == ACT_CONSUME ) {
3208  act.set_to_null();
3209  }
3210 
3211  if( act.id() == ACT_FIRSTAID && consume_loc ) {
3212  act.targets.clear();
3213  act.targets.push_back( consume_loc );
3214  }
3215 
3216  if( !temp_selections.empty() || !temp_selected_items.empty() || !temp_filter.empty() ) {
3217  if( act.is_null() ) {
3218  player_character.assign_activity( new_act );
3219  player_character.activity.values = temp_selections;
3220  player_character.activity.targets = temp_selected_items;
3221  player_character.activity.str_values = { temp_filter, "true" };
3222  } else {
3223  // Warning: this can add a redundant menu activity to the backlog.
3224  // It will prevent deleting the smart pointer of the selected item_location
3225  // if the backlog is not sanitized.
3226  player_activity eat_menu( new_act );
3227  eat_menu.values = temp_selections;
3228  eat_menu.targets = temp_selected_items;
3229  eat_menu.str_values = { temp_filter, "true" };
3230  player_character.backlog.push_back( eat_menu );
3231  }
3232  }
3233 }
3234 
3235 void consume_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3236 {
3237  jsout.start_object();
3238 
3239  jsout.member( "consume_location", consume_location );
3240  jsout.member( "consume_item", consume_item );
3241  jsout.member( "consume_menu_selections", consume_menu_selections );
3242  jsout.member( "consume_menu_selected_items", consume_menu_selected_items );
3243  jsout.member( "consume_menu_filter", consume_menu_filter );
3244  jsout.member( "canceled", canceled );
3245  jsout.member( "type", type );
3246 
3247  jsout.end_object();
3248 }
3249 
3250 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> consume_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3251 {
3252  item_location null;
3253  consume_activity_actor actor( null );
3254 
3255  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3256 
3257  data.read( "consume_location", actor.consume_location );
3258  data.read( "consume_item", actor.consume_item );
3259  data.read( "consume_menu_selections", actor.consume_menu_selections );
3260  data.read( "consume_menu_selected_items", actor.consume_menu_selected_items );
3261  data.read( "consume_menu_filter", actor.consume_menu_filter );
3262  data.read( "canceled", actor.canceled );
3263  data.read( "type", actor.type );
3264 
3265  return actor.clone();
3266 }
3267 
3268 void try_sleep_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3269 {
3270  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
3271  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3272  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_attempt_to_fall_asleep>( who.getID() );
3273  who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_prone );
3274  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You lie down preparing to fall asleep." ) );
3275 }
3276 
3277 void try_sleep_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3278 {
3279  if( who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3280  return;
3281  }
3282  if( who.can_sleep() ) {
3283  who.fall_asleep(); // calls act.set_to_null()
3284  if( !who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3285  // Character can potentially have immunity for 'effect_sleep'
3286  who.add_msg_if_player(
3287  _( "You feel you should've fallen asleep by now, but somehow you're still awake." ) );
3288  }
3289  return;
3290  }
3291  if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
3292  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You toss and turn…" ) );
3293  }
3294  if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
3295  query_keep_trying( act, who );
3296  }
3297 }
3298 
3299 void try_sleep_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3300 {
3301  act.set_to_null();
3302  if( !who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3303  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to sleep, but can't." ) );
3304  }
3305  who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3306 }
3307 
3308 void try_sleep_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
3309 {
3310  if( who.movement_mode_is( move_mode_prone ) ) {
3311  who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3312  }
3313 }
3314 
3315 void try_sleep_activity_actor::query_keep_trying( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3316 {
3317  if( disable_query || !who.is_avatar() ) {
3318  return;
3319  }
3320 
3321  uilist sleep_query;
3322  sleep_query.text = _( "You have trouble sleeping, keep trying?" );
3323  sleep_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop trying to fall asleep and get up." ) );
3324  sleep_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue trying to fall asleep." ) );
3325  sleep_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C',
3326  _( "Continue trying to fall asleep and don't ask again." ) );
3327  sleep_query.query();
3328  switch( sleep_query.ret ) {
3329  case UILIST_CANCEL:
3330  case 1:
3331  act.set_to_null();
3332  who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3333  break;
3334  case 3:
3335  disable_query = true;
3336  break;
3337  case 2:
3338  default:
3339  break;
3340  }
3341 }
3342 
3343 void try_sleep_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3344 {
3345  jsout.start_object();
3346 
3347  jsout.member( "disable_query", disable_query );
3348  jsout.member( "duration", duration );
3349 
3350  jsout.end_object();
3351 }
3352 
3353 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> try_sleep_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3354 {
3355  try_sleep_activity_actor actor = try_sleep_activity_actor( 0_seconds );
3356 
3357  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3358 
3359  data.read( "disable_query", actor.disable_query );
3360  data.read( "duration", actor.duration );
3361 
3362  return actor.clone();
3363 }
3364 
3365 time_duration safecracking_activity_actor::safecracking_time( const Character &who )
3366 {
3367  time_duration cracking_time = 150_minutes;
3368  /** @EFFECT_DEVICES decreases time needed for safe cracking */
3369  cracking_time -= 20_minutes * ( who.get_skill_level( skill_traps ) - 3 ) ;
3370  /** @EFFECT_PER decreases time needed for safe cracking */
3371  cracking_time -= 10_minutes * ( who.get_per() - 8 );
3372  cracking_time = std::max( 30_minutes, cracking_time );
3373 
3374  if( !who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3375  cracking_time *= 3;
3376  }
3377 
3378  return cracking_time;
3379 }
3380 
3381 void safecracking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3382 {
3383  time_duration cracking_time = safecracking_time( who );
3384 
3385  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3386  add_msg( m_info, _( "You start cracking the safe." ) );
3387  } else { // who.is_npc
3388  // npcs can't crack safes yet, this is for when they are able to
3389  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s starts cracking the safe." ), who.disp_name() );
3390  }
3391 
3392  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING, "safecracking time = %s",
3393  to_string_writable( cracking_time ) );
3394 
3395  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( cracking_time );
3396  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3397 }
3398 
3399 void safecracking_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3400 {
3401  bool can_crack = who.has_flag( json_flag_SAFECRACK_NO_TOOL );
3402  // short-circuit to avoid the more expensive iteration over items
3403  can_crack = can_crack || who.cache_has_item_with( flag_SAFECRACK );
3404 
3405  if( !can_crack ) {
3406  // We lost our cracking tool somehow, bail out.
3407  act.set_to_null();
3408  return;
3409  }
3410 
3411  if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
3412  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING, "safecracking time left = %s",
3413  to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left ) ) );
3414  }
3415 
3416  /* Split experience gain in 20 parts, each giving 5% of the total*/
3417  const int current_step =
3418  ( 100 * ( act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) / act.moves_total ) / 5;
3419  const int difference = current_step - exp_step ;
3420  if( difference > 0 ) {
3421  exp_step += difference;
3422  if( !who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3423  who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking, 3_minutes * difference );
3424  // player gained the proficiency mid-way through cracking
3425  if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3426  int new_time = to_moves<int>( safecracking_time( who ) );
3427  act.moves_total = act.moves_total > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_total;
3428  act.moves_left = act.moves_left > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_left;
3429  }
3430  }
3431 
3432  const float skill_level = who.get_skill_level( skill_traps );
3433  who.practice( skill_traps, std::max( 1.0f, skill_level / 2 ) );
3434  if( who.get_skill_level( skill_traps ) > skill_level ) {
3435  int new_time = to_moves<int>( safecracking_time( who ) );
3436  act.moves_total = act.moves_total > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_total;
3437  act.moves_left = act.moves_left > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_left;
3438  }
3439  }
3440 }
3441 
3442 void safecracking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3443 {
3444  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a satisfying click, the lock on the safe opens!" ) );
3445  get_map().furn_set( safe, furn_f_safe_c );
3446  act.set_to_null();
3447 }
3448 
3449 void safecracking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3450 {
3451  jsout.start_object();
3452  jsout.member( "safe", safe );
3453  jsout.member( "exp_step", exp_step );
3454  jsout.end_object();
3455 }
3456 
3457 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> safecracking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3458 {
3459  safecracking_activity_actor actor = safecracking_activity_actor( {} );
3460 
3461  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3462  data.read( "safe", actor.safe );
3463  data.read( "exp_step", actor.exp_step );
3464  return actor.clone();
3465 }
3466 
3467 void unload_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
3468 {
3469  act.moves_left = moves_total;
3470  act.moves_total = moves_total;
3471 }
3472 
3473 void unload_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3474 {
3475  // Need to copy `target` here because `::unload` is static and `this` might be invalidated
3476  // after `act.set_to_null()` has been called (so `this.target` might also be invalidated)
3477  item_location target_copy = target;
3478  act.set_to_null();
3479  unload( who, target_copy );
3480 }
3481 
3482 void unload_activity_actor::unload( Character &who, item_location &target )
3483 {
3484  int qty = 0;
3485  item &it = *target.get_item();
3486  bool actually_unloaded = false;
3487 
3488  if( it.is_container() ) {
3489  contents_change_handler handler;
3490  bool changed = false;
3491 
3492  for( pocket_type ptype : {
3493  pocket_type::CONTAINER,
3494  pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL,
3495  pocket_type::MAGAZINE
3496  } ) {
3497 
3498  for( item *contained : it.all_items_top( ptype, true ) ) {
3499  int old_charges = contained->charges;
3500  const bool consumed = who.add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true, &it, contained );
3501  if( consumed || contained->charges != old_charges ) {
3502  changed = true;
3503  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( item_location( target, contained ) );
3504  }
3505  if( consumed ) {
3506  it.remove_item( *contained );
3507  }
3508  }
3509 
3510  if( changed ) {
3511  it.on_contents_changed();
3512  who.invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
3513  handler.handle_by( who );
3514  }
3515  }
3516 
3517  return;
3518  }
3519 
3520  std::vector<item *> remove_contained;
3521  for( item *contained : it.all_items_top() ) {
3522  if( contained->ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ) {
3523  contained->charges /= PLUTONIUM_CHARGES;
3524  }
3525  if( who.add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true, &it, contained ) ) {
3526  qty += contained->charges;
3527  remove_contained.push_back( contained );
3528  actually_unloaded = true;
3529  }
3530  }
3531  // remove the ammo leads in the belt
3532  for( item *remove : remove_contained ) {
3533  it.remove_item( *remove );
3534  actually_unloaded = true;
3535  }
3536 
3537  // remove the belt linkage
3538  if( it.is_ammo_belt() ) {
3539  if( it.type->magazine->linkage ) {
3540  item link( *it.type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, qty );
3541  if( who.add_or_drop_with_msg( link, true ) ) {
3542  actually_unloaded = true;
3543  }
3544  }
3545  if( actually_unloaded ) {
3546  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You disassemble your %s." ), it.tname() );
3547  }
3548  } else if( actually_unloaded ) {
3549  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You unload your %s." ), it.tname() );
3550  }
3551 
3552  if( it.has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3553  target.remove_item();
3554  }
3555 
3556  who.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
3557 }
3558 
3559 void unload_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3560 {
3561  jsout.start_object();
3562 
3563  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
3564  jsout.member( "target", target );
3565 
3566  jsout.end_object();
3567 }
3568 
3569 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> unload_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3570 {
3571  unload_activity_actor actor = unload_activity_actor( 0, item_location::nowhere );
3572 
3573  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3574 
3575  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
3576  data.read( "target", actor.target );
3577 
3578  return actor.clone();
3579 }
3580 
3581 craft_activity_actor::craft_activity_actor( item_location &it, const bool is_long ) :
3582  craft_item( it ), is_long( is_long )
3583 {
3584  cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3585  cached_assistants = 0;
3586  cached_base_total_moves = 1;
3587  cached_cur_total_moves = 1;
3588  cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
3589  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3590 }
3591 
3592 bool craft_activity_actor::check_if_craft_okay( item_location &craft_item, Character &crafter )
3593 {
3594  item *craft = craft_item.get_item();
3595 
3596  // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3597  if( !craft || square_dist( craft_item.pos_bub(), crafter.pos_bub() ) > 1 ) {
3598  crafter.add_msg_player_or_npc(
3599  _( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
3600  "You stop crafting. "
3601  "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting." ),
3602  _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "
3603  "<npcname> stops crafting." ) );
3604  return false;
3605  }
3606 
3607  if( !craft->is_craft() ) {
3608  debugmsg( "ACT_CRAFT target '%s' is not a craft. Aborting ACT_CRAFT.", craft->tname() );
3609  return false;
3610  }
3611 
3612  if( !cached_continuation_requirements ) {
3613  cached_continuation_requirements = craft->get_continue_reqs();
3614  }
3615  return crafter.can_continue_craft( *craft, *cached_continuation_requirements );
3616 }
3617 
3618 void craft_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &crafter )
3619 {
3620  if( !check_if_craft_okay( craft_item, crafter ) ) {
3621  act.set_to_null();
3622  }
3623  activity_override = craft_item.get_item()->get_making().exertion_level();
3624  cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3625  cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
3626  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3627  act.targets.clear();
3628  act.targets.push_back( craft_item );
3629 }
3630 
3631 void craft_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &crafter )
3632 {
3633  if( !check_if_craft_okay( craft_item, crafter ) ) {
3634  act.set_to_null();
3635  return;
3636  }
3637 
3638  // We already checked if this is nullptr above
3639  item &craft = *craft_item.get_item();
3640 
3641  const std::optional<tripoint> location = craft_item.where() == item_location::type::character
3642  ? std::optional<tripoint>() : std::optional<tripoint>( craft_item.position() );
3643  const recipe &rec = craft.get_making();
3644  if( !use_cached_workbench_multiplier ) {
3645  cached_workbench_multiplier = crafter.workbench_crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location );
3646  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = true;
3647  }
3648  const float crafting_speed = crafter.crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location,
3649  use_cached_workbench_multiplier,
3650  cached_workbench_multiplier );
3651  const int assistants = crafter.available_assistant_count( craft.get_making() );
3652 
3653  if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
3654  crafter.cancel_activity();
3655  return;
3656  }
3657 
3658  if( cached_crafting_speed != crafting_speed || cached_assistants != assistants ) {
3659  cached_crafting_speed = crafting_speed;
3660  cached_assistants = assistants;
3661 
3662  // Base moves for batch size with no speed modifier or assistants
3663  // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3664  cached_base_total_moves = std::max( static_cast<int64_t>( 1 ),
3665  rec.batch_time( crafter, craft.get_making_batch_size(), 1.0f, 0 ) );
3666  // Current expected total moves, includes crafting speed modifiers and assistants
3667  cached_cur_total_moves = std::max( static_cast<int64_t>( 1 ),
3668  rec.batch_time( crafter, craft.get_making_batch_size(), crafting_speed,
3669  assistants ) );
3670  }
3671  const double base_total_moves = cached_base_total_moves;
3672  const double cur_total_moves = cached_cur_total_moves;
3673 
3674  // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3675  // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6'732'000 )
3676  const int old_counter = craft.item_counter;
3677 
3678  // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed /
3679  //crafter.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() )
3680  int spent_moves = crafter.get_moves() * crafter.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier(
3681  exertion_level() );
3682  const double delta_progress = spent_moves * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3683  // Current progress in moves
3684  const double current_progress = craft.item_counter * base_total_moves / 10'000'000.0 +
3685  delta_progress;
3686  // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3687  craft.item_counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10'000'000.0 );
3688  crafter.set_moves( 0 );
3689 
3690  // This is to ensure we don't over count skill steps
3691  craft.item_counter = std::min( craft.item_counter, 10'000'000 );
3692 
3693  // This nominal craft time is also how many practice ticks to perform
3694  // spread out evenly across the actual duration.
3695  const double total_practice_ticks = rec.time_to_craft_moves( crafter,
3696  recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) / 100.0;
3697 
3698  const int ticks_per_practice = 10'000'000.0 / total_practice_ticks;
3699  int num_practice_ticks = craft.item_counter / ticks_per_practice -
3700  old_counter / ticks_per_practice;
3701  bool level_up = false;
3702  if( num_practice_ticks > 0 ) {
3703  level_up |= crafter.craft_skill_gain( craft, num_practice_ticks );
3704  }
3705  // Proficiencies and tools are gained/consumed after every 5% progress
3706  int five_percent_steps = craft.item_counter / 500'000 - old_counter / 500'000;
3707  if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3708  // Divide by 100 for seconds, 20 for 5%
3709  const time_duration pct_time = time_duration::from_seconds( base_total_moves / 2000 );
3710  level_up |= crafter.craft_proficiency_gain( craft, pct_time * five_percent_steps );
3711  // Invalidate the crafting time cache because proficiencies may have changed
3712  cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3713  // Also reset the multiplier
3714  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3715  }
3716 
3717  // Unlike skill, tools are consumed once at the start and should not be consumed at the end
3718  if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3719  --five_percent_steps;
3720  }
3721 
3722  if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3723  if( !crafter.craft_consume_tools( craft, five_percent_steps, false ) ) {
3724  // So we don't skip over any tool comsuption
3725  craft.item_counter -= craft.item_counter % 500'000 + 1;
3726  crafter.cancel_activity();
3727  return;
3728  }
3729  }
3730 
3731  // if item_counter has reached 100% or more
3732  if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3733  if( rec.is_practice() && !is_long && craft.get_making_batch_size() == 1 ) {
3734  if( query_yn( _( "Keep practicing until proficiency increases?" ) ) ) {
3735  is_long = true;
3736  *( crafter.last_craft ) = craft_command( &craft.get_making(), 1, is_long, &crafter, location );
3737  }
3738  }
3739  item craft_copy = craft;
3740  craft_item.remove_item();
3741  // We need to cache this before we cancel the activity else we risk Use After Free
3742  const bool will_continue = is_long;
3743  crafter.cancel_activity();
3744  crafter.complete_craft( craft_copy, location );
3745  if( will_continue ) {
3746  if( crafter.making_would_work( crafter.lastrecipe, craft_copy.get_making_batch_size() ) ) {
3747  crafter.last_craft->execute( location );
3748  }
3749  }
3750  } else {
3751  if( level_up && craft.get_making().is_practice() &&
3752  query_yn( _( "Your proficiency has increased. Stop practicing?" ) ) ) {
3753  crafter.cancel_activity();
3754  } else if( craft.item_counter >= craft.get_next_failure_point() ) {
3755  bool destroy = craft.handle_craft_failure( crafter );
3756  // If the craft needs to be destroyed, do it and stop crafting.
3757  if( destroy ) {
3758  crafter.add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "There is nothing left of the %s to craft from." ),
3759  _( "There is nothing left of the %s <npcname> was crafting." ), craft.tname() );
3760  craft_item.remove_item();
3761  crafter.cancel_activity();
3762  }
3763  }
3764  }
3765 }
3766 
3767 void craft_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3768 {
3769  act.set_to_null();
3770 }
3771 
3772 void craft_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
3773 {
3774  item *craft = craft_item.get_item();
3775  // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3776  if( !craft ) {
3777  return;
3778  }
3779  const recipe item_recipe = craft->get_making();
3780  // practice recipe items with no components can be safely removed
3781  if( item_recipe.category == "CC_PRACTICE" && craft->components.empty() ) {
3782  craft_item.remove_item();
3783  }
3784 }
3785 
3786 std::string craft_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
3787 {
3788  if( !craft_item ) {
3789  //We have somehow lost the craft item. This will be handled in do_turn in the check_if_craft_is_ok call.
3790  return "";
3791  }
3792  return craft_item.get_item()->tname();
3793 }
3794 
3795 float craft_activity_actor::exertion_level() const
3796 {
3797  return activity_override;
3798 }
3799 
3800 void craft_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3801 {
3802  jsout.start_object();
3803 
3804  jsout.member( "craft_loc", craft_item );
3805  jsout.member( "long", is_long );
3806  jsout.member( "activity_override", activity_override );
3807 
3808  jsout.end_object();
3809 }
3810 
3811 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> craft_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3812 {
3813  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3814 
3815  craft_activity_actor actor = craft_activity_actor();
3816 
3817  data.read( "craft_loc", actor.craft_item );
3818  data.read( "long", actor.is_long );
3819  data.read( "activity_override", actor.activity_override );
3820 
3821  return actor.clone();
3822 }
3823 
3824 void workout_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3825 {
3826  if( who.get_sleepiness() > sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
3827  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are too tired to exercise." ) );
3828  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3829  act.set_to_null();
3830  return;
3831  }
3832  if( who.get_thirst() > 240 ) {
3833  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are too dehydrated to exercise." ) );
3834  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3835  act.set_to_null();
3836  return;
3837  }
3838  if( who.is_armed() ) {
3839  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Empty your hands first." ) );
3840  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3841  act.set_to_null();
3842  return;
3843  }
3844  map &here = get_map();
3845  // free training requires all limbs intact, but specialized workout machines
3846  // train upper or lower parts of body only and may permit workout with
3847  // broken limbs as long as they are not involved by the machine
3848  bool hand_equipment = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WORKOUT_ARMS, location );
3849  bool leg_equipment = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WORKOUT_LEGS, location );
3850 
3851  if( hand_equipment && ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_l ) ||
3852  who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_r ) ) ) {
3853  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train here with a broken arm." ) );
3854  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3855  act.set_to_null();
3856  return;
3857  }
3858  if( leg_equipment && ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_l ) ||
3859  who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
3860  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train here with a broken leg." ) );
3861  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3862  act.set_to_null();
3863  return;
3864  }
3865  if( !hand_equipment && !leg_equipment &&
3866  ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_l ) ||
3867  who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_r ) ||
3868  who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_l ) ||
3869  who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
3870  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train freely with a broken limb." ) );
3871  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3872  act.set_to_null();
3873  return;
3874  }
3875  uilist workout_query;
3876  workout_query.desc_enabled = true;
3877  workout_query.text =
3878  _( "Physical effort determines workout efficiency, but also rate of exhaustion." );
3879  workout_query.title = _( "Choose training intensity:" );
3880  workout_query.addentry_desc( 1, true, 'l', pgettext( "training intensity", "Light" ),
3881  _( "Light exercise comparable in intensity to walking, but more focused and methodical." ) );
3882  workout_query.addentry_desc( 2, true, 'm', pgettext( "training intensity", "Moderate" ),
3883  _( "Moderate exercise without excessive exertion, but with enough effort to break a sweat." ) );
3884  workout_query.addentry_desc( 3, true, 'a', pgettext( "training intensity", "Active" ),
3885  _( "Active exercise with full involvement. Strenuous, but in a controlled manner." ) );
3886  workout_query.addentry_desc( 4, true, 'h', pgettext( "training intensity", "High" ),
3887  _( "High intensity exercise with maximum effort and full power. Exhausting in the long run." ) );
3888  workout_query.query();
3889  switch( workout_query.ret ) {
3890  case UILIST_CANCEL:
3891  act.set_to_null();
3892  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3893  return;
3894  case 4:
3895  act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_HARD;
3896  intensity_modifier = 4;
3897  break;
3898  case 3:
3899  act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_ACTIVE;
3900  intensity_modifier = 3;
3901  break;
3902  case 2:
3903  act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_MODERATE;
3904  intensity_modifier = 2;
3905  break;
3906  case 1:
3907  default:
3908  act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_LIGHT;
3909  intensity_modifier = 1;
3910  break;
3911  }
3912  int length;
3913  query_int( length, _( "Train for how long (minutes): " ) );
3914  if( length > 0 ) {
3915  duration = length * 1_minutes;
3916  } else {
3917  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3918  act.set_to_null();
3919  return;
3920  }
3921  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
3922  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3923  if( who.male ) {
3924  sfx::play_activity_sound( "plmove", "sleepiness_m_med", sfx::get_heard_volume( location ) );
3925  } else {
3926  sfx::play_activity_sound( "plmove", "sleepiness_f_med", sfx::get_heard_volume( location ) );
3927  }
3928  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You start your workout session." ) );
3929 }
3930 
3931 void workout_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3932 {
3933  if( who.get_sleepiness() > sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
3934  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are exhausted so you finish your workout early." ) );
3935  act.set_to_null();
3936  return;
3937  }
3938  if( who.get_thirst() > 240 ) {
3939  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are dehydrated so you finish your workout early." ) );
3940  act.set_to_null();
3941  return;
3942  }
3943  if( !rest_mode && who.get_stamina() > who.get_stamina_max() / 3 ) {
3944  who.mod_stamina( -25 - intensity_modifier );
3945  if( one_in( 180 / intensity_modifier ) ) {
3946  who.mod_sleepiness( 1 );
3947  who.mod_thirst( 1 );
3948  }
3949  if( calendar::once_every( 16_minutes / intensity_modifier ) ) {
3950  //~ heavy breathing when exercising
3951  std::string huff = _( "yourself huffing and puffing!" );
3952  sounds::sound( location + tripoint_east, 2 * intensity_modifier, sounds::sound_t::speech, huff,
3953  true );
3954  }
3955  // morale bonus kicks in gradually after 5 minutes of exercise
3956  if( calendar::once_every( 2_minutes ) &&
3957  ( ( elapsed + act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) / 100 * 1_turns ) > 5_minutes ) {
3958  who.add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, intensity_modifier, 20, 6_hours, 30_minutes );
3959  }
3960  if( calendar::once_every( 2_minutes ) ) {
3961  add_msg_debug_if( who.is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_ACT_WORKOUT, who.activity_level_str() );
3962  add_msg_debug_if( who.is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_ACT_WORKOUT, act.id().c_str() );
3963  }
3964  } else if( !rest_mode ) {
3965  rest_mode = true;
3966  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You catch your breath for few moments." ) );
3967  } else if( who.get_stamina() >= who.get_stamina_max() ) {
3968  rest_mode = false;
3969  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You get back to your training." ) );
3970  }
3971 }
3972 
3973 void workout_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3974 {
3975  if( !query_keep_training( act, who ) ) {
3976  act.set_to_null();
3977  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish your workout session." ) );
3978  }
3979 }
3980 
3981 void workout_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
3982 {
3983  stop_time = calendar::turn;
3984 }
3985 
3986 bool workout_activity_actor::query_keep_training( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3987 {
3988  if( disable_query || !who.is_avatar() ) {
3989  elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
3990  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 60_minutes );
3991  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3992  return true;
3993  }
3994  int length;
3995  uilist workout_query;
3996  workout_query.text = _( "You have finished your training cycle, keep training?" );
3997  workout_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop training." ) );
3998  workout_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue training." ) );
3999  workout_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C', _( "Continue training and don't ask again." ) );
4000  workout_query.query();
4001  switch( workout_query.ret ) {
4002  case UILIST_CANCEL:
4003  case 1:
4004  act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
4005  act.set_to_null();
4006  return false;
4007  case 3:
4008  disable_query = true;
4009  elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
4010  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 60_minutes );
4011  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
4012  return true;
4013  case 2:
4014  default:
4015  query_int( length, _( "Train for how long (minutes): " ) );
4016  elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
4017  duration = 0_minutes;
4018  if( length > 0 ) {
4019  duration = length * 1_minutes;
4020  }
4021  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
4022  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
4023  return true;
4024  }
4025 }
4026 
4027 void workout_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4028 {
4029  jsout.start_object();
4030 
4031  jsout.member( "disable_query", disable_query );
4032  jsout.member( "act_id", act_id );
4033  jsout.member( "duration", duration );
4034  jsout.member( "location", location );
4035  jsout.member( "stop_time", stop_time );
4036  jsout.member( "elapsed", elapsed );
4037  jsout.member( "intensity_modifier", intensity_modifier );
4038  jsout.member( "rest_mode", rest_mode );
4039 
4040  jsout.end_object();
4041 }
4042 
4043 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> workout_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4044 {
4045  workout_activity_actor actor = workout_activity_actor( tripoint_zero );
4046 
4047  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4048 
4049  data.read( "disable_query", actor.disable_query );
4050  data.read( "act_id", actor.act_id );
4051  data.read( "duration", actor.duration );
4052  data.read( "location", actor.location );
4053  data.read( "stop_time", actor.stop_time );
4054  data.read( "elapsed", actor.elapsed );
4055  data.read( "intensity_modifier", actor.intensity_modifier );
4056  data.read( "rest_mode", actor.rest_mode );
4057 
4058  return actor.clone();
4059 }
4060 
4061 // TODO: Display costs in the multidrop menu
4062 static void debug_drop_list( const std::vector<drop_or_stash_item_info> &items )
4063 {
4064  if( !debug_mode ) {
4065  return;
4066  }
4067 
4068  std::string res( "Items ordered to drop:\n" );
4069  for( const drop_or_stash_item_info &it : items ) {
4070  item_location loc = it.loc();
4071  if( !loc ) {
4072  // some items could have been destroyed by e.g. monster attack
4073  continue;
4074  }
4075  res += string_format( "Drop %d %s\n", it.count(), loc->display_name( it.count() ) );
4076  }
4077  popup( res, PF_GET_KEY );
4078 }
4079 
4080 static bool is_bulk_unload( const item_location &lhs, const item_location &rhs )
4081 {
4082  if( lhs.where() == item_location::type::container &&
4083  rhs.where() == item_location::type::container && lhs.parent_item() == rhs.parent_item() ) {
4084  return true;
4085  }
4086  return false;
4087 }
4088 
4089 // Return a list of items to be dropped by the given item-dropping activity in the current turn.
4090 static std::list<item> obtain_activity_items( std::vector<drop_or_stash_item_info> &items,
4091  contents_change_handler &handler, Character &who, bool &bulk_unload )
4092 {
4093  std::list<item> res;
4094 
4095  debug_drop_list( items );
4096 
4097  auto it = items.begin();
4098  for( ; it != items.end(); ++it ) {
4099  item_location loc = it->loc();
4100  if( !loc ) {
4101  // some items could have been destroyed by e.g. monster attack
4102  continue;
4103  }
4104 
4105  int consumed_moves;
4106  if( !bulk_unload ) {
4107  // Cost to take an item from a container or map
4108  consumed_moves = loc.obtain_cost( who, it->count() );
4109  } else {
4110  // Pure cost to handling item excluding overhead.
4111  consumed_moves = std::max( who.item_handling_cost( *loc, true, 0, it->count(), true ), 1 );
4112  }
4113  if( !who.is_npc() && who.get_moves() <= 0 && consumed_moves > 0 ) {
4114  break;
4115  }
4116 
4117  // Check if next is bulk unload before moving item.
4118  auto it_next = std::next( it );
4119  if( it_next != items.end() && it_next->loc() ) {
4120  bulk_unload = is_bulk_unload( loc, it_next->loc() );
4121  }
4122 
4123  who.mod_moves( -consumed_moves );
4124 
4125  // If item is inside another (container/pocket), unseal it, and update encumbrance
4126  if( loc.has_parent() ) {
4127  // Save parent items to be handled when finishing or canceling activity,
4128  // in case there are still other items to drop from the same container.
4129  // This assumes that an item and any of its parents/ancestors are not
4130  // dropped at the same time.
4131  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( loc );
4132  } else {
4133  // when parent's encumbrance cannot be marked as dirty,
4134  // mark character's encumbrance as dirty instead (correctness over performance)
4135  who.set_check_encumbrance( true );
4136  }
4137 
4138  // Take off the item or remove it from where it's been
4139  if( loc.where_recursive() == item_location::type::map ||
4140  loc.where_recursive() == item_location::type::vehicle ) {
4141  item copy( *loc );
4142  if( loc->count_by_charges() && loc->count() > it->count() ) {
4143  copy.charges -= it->count();
4144  }
4145  loc.remove_item();
4146  res.push_back( copy );
4147  } else if( who.is_worn( *loc ) ) {
4148  who.takeoff( loc, &res );
4149  } else if( loc->count_by_charges() ) {
4150  res.push_back( who.reduce_charges( &*loc, it->count() ) );
4151  } else {
4152  res.push_back( who.i_rem( &*loc ) );
4153  }
4154  }
4155 
4156  // Remove handled items from activity
4157  items.erase( items.begin(), it );
4158  return res;
4159 }
4160 
4161 void drop_or_stash_item_info::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4162 {
4163  jsout.start_object();
4164  jsout.member( "loc", _loc );
4165  jsout.member( "count", _count );
4166  jsout.end_object();
4167 }
4168 
4169 void drop_or_stash_item_info::deserialize( const JsonObject &jsobj )
4170 {
4171  jsobj.read( "loc", _loc );
4172  jsobj.read( "count", _count );
4173 }
4174 
4175 void drop_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4176 {
4177  const tripoint_bub_ms pos = placement + who.pos_bub();
4178  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate,
4179  obtain_activity_items( items, handler, who, current_bulk_unload ),
4180  pos, force_ground );
4181  // Cancel activity if items is empty. Otherwise, we modified in place and we will continue
4182  // to resolve the drop next turn. This is different from the pickup logic which creates
4183  // a brand new activity every turn and cancels the old activity
4184  if( items.empty() ) {
4185  who.cancel_activity();
4186  }
4187 }
4188 
4189 void drop_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
4190 {
4191  handler.handle_by( who );
4192 }
4193 
4194 void drop_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4195 {
4196  jsout.start_object();
4197  jsout.member( "items", items );
4198  jsout.member( "unhandled_containers", handler );
4199  jsout.member( "placement", placement );
4200  jsout.member( "force_ground", force_ground );
4201  jsout.member( "current_bulk_unload", current_bulk_unload );
4202  jsout.end_object();
4203 }
4204 
4205 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> drop_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4206 {
4207  drop_activity_actor actor;
4208 
4209  JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4210  jsobj.read( "items", actor.items );
4211  jsobj.read( "unhandled_containers", actor.handler );
4212  jsobj.read( "placement", actor.placement );
4213  jsobj.read( "force_ground", actor.force_ground );
4214  jsobj.read( "current_bulk_unload", actor.current_bulk_unload );
4215 
4216  return actor.clone();
4217 }
4218 
4219 void harvest_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4220 {
4221  map &here = get_map();
4222 
4223  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
4224  const furn_id furn = here.furn( target );
4225 
4226  if( furn->has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn ) ) {
4227  exam_furn = true;
4228  } else if( furn->has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar ) ) {
4229  exam_furn = true;
4230  nectar = true;
4231  }
4232  }
4233 
4234  const harvest_id harvest = here.get_harvest( target );
4235  if( harvest.is_null() || harvest->empty() ) {
4236  if( !auto_forage ) {
4237  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4238  _( "Nothing can be harvested from this plant in the current season." ) );
4239  }
4240 
4241  if( who.manual_examine ) {
4242  iexamine::none( who, target );
4243  }
4244 
4245  act.set_to_null();
4246  return;
4247  }
4248 
4249  const time_duration forage_time = rng( 5_seconds, 15_seconds );
4250  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_HARVEST, "harvest time: %s", to_string_writable( forage_time ) );
4251  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( forage_time );
4252  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
4253 }
4254 
4255 void harvest_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4256 {
4257  act.set_to_null();
4258 
4259  map &here = get_map();
4260 
4261  // If nothing can be harvested, neither can nectar
4262  // Incredibly low priority TODO: Allow separating nectar seasons
4263  if( nectar && iexamine_helper::drink_nectar( who ) ) {
4264  return;
4265  }
4266 
4267  const float survival_skill = who.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4268  bool got_anything = false;
4269  for( const harvest_entry &entry : here.get_harvest( target ).obj() ) {
4270  const float min_num = entry.scale_num.first * survival_skill + entry.base_num.first;
4271  const float max_num = entry.scale_num.second * survival_skill + entry.base_num.second;
4272  const int roll = std::min<int>( entry.max, std::round( rng_float( min_num, max_num ) ) );
4273  got_anything = roll > 0;
4274  for( int i = 0; i < roll; i++ ) {
4275  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( who, entry.drop, false );
4276  }
4277  }
4278 
4279  if( !got_anything ) {
4280  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You couldn't harvest anything." ) );
4281  }
4282 
4283  if( exam_furn ) {
4284  here.furn_set( target, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
4285  } else {
4286  here.ter_set( target, here.get_ter_transforms_into( target ) );
4287  }
4288 
4289  iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( who );
4290 }
4291 
4292 void harvest_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4293 {
4294  jsout.start_object();
4295  jsout.member( "target", target );
4296  jsout.member( "exam_furn", exam_furn );
4297  jsout.member( "nectar", nectar );
4298  jsout.member( "auto_forage", auto_forage );
4299  jsout.end_object();
4300 }
4301 
4302 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> harvest_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4303 {
4304  harvest_activity_actor actor( tripoint_zero );
4305 
4306  JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4307  jsobj.read( "target", actor.target );
4308  jsobj.read( "exam_furn", actor.exam_furn );
4309  jsobj.read( "nectar", actor.nectar );
4310  jsobj.read( "auto_forage", actor.auto_forage );
4311  return actor.clone();
4312 }
4313 
4314 static void stash_on_pet( const std::list<item> &items, monster &pet, Character &who )
4315 {
4316  units::volume remaining_volume = pet.storage_item->get_total_capacity() - pet.get_carried_volume();
4317  units::mass remaining_weight = pet.weight_capacity() - pet.get_carried_weight();
4318  map &here = get_map();
4319 
4320  for( const item &it : items ) {
4321  if( it.volume() > remaining_volume ) {
4322  add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s did not fit and fell to the %2$s." ), it.display_name(),
4323  here.name( pet.pos() ) );
4324  here.add_item_or_charges( pet.pos(), it );
4325  } else if( it.weight() > remaining_weight ) {
4326  add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s is too heavy and fell to the %2$s." ), it.display_name(),
4327  here.name( pet.pos() ) );
4328  here.add_item_or_charges( pet.pos(), it );
4329  } else {
4330  pet.add_item( it );
4331  remaining_volume -= it.volume();
4332  remaining_weight -= it.weight();
4333  }
4334  // TODO: if NPCs can have pets or move items onto pets
4335  item( it ).handle_pickup_ownership( who );
4336  }
4337 }
4338 
4339 void stash_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4340 {
4341  const tripoint pos = placement + who.pos();
4342 
4343  monster *pet = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( pos );
4344  if( pet != nullptr && pet->has_effect( effect_pet ) ) {
4345  stash_on_pet( obtain_activity_items( items, handler, who, current_bulk_unload ),
4346  *pet, who );
4347  if( items.empty() ) {
4348  who.cancel_activity();
4349  }
4350  } else {
4351  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The pet has moved somewhere else." ) );
4352  who.cancel_activity();
4353  }
4354 }
4355 
4356 void stash_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
4357 {
4358  handler.handle_by( who );
4359 }
4360 
4361 void stash_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4362 {
4363  jsout.start_object();
4364  jsout.member( "items", items );
4365  jsout.member( "unhandled_containers", handler );
4366  jsout.member( "placement", placement );
4367  jsout.member( "current_bulk_unload", current_bulk_unload );
4368  jsout.end_object();
4369 }
4370 
4371 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> stash_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4372 {
4373  stash_activity_actor actor;
4374 
4375  JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4376  jsobj.read( "items", actor.items );
4377  jsobj.read( "unhandled_containers", actor.handler );
4378  jsobj.read( "placement", actor.placement );
4379  jsobj.read( "current_bulk_unload", actor.current_bulk_unload );
4380 
4381  return actor.clone();
4382 }
4383 
4384 void disable_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4385 {
4386  act.moves_total = moves_total;
4387  act.moves_left = moves_total;
4388  monster &critter = *get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4389  critter.add_effect( effect_worked_on, 1_turns );
4390 }
4391 
4392 void disable_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4393 {
4394  monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4395  if( !mon_ptr ) {
4396  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The robot has moved somewhere else." ) );
4397  who.cancel_activity();
4398  return;
4399  }
4400 
4401  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
4402  if( !can_disable_or_reprogram( critter ) ) {
4403  // I think recovery from stunned is the only reason this could happen
4404  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s recovers before you can finish." ), critter.name() );
4405  who.cancel_activity();
4406  return;
4407  }
4408 
4409  critter.add_effect( effect_worked_on, 1_turns );
4410 }
4411 
4412 void disable_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4413 {
4414  // Should never be null as we just checked in do_turn
4415  monster &critter = *get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4416 
4417  if( reprogram ) {
4418  if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
4419  critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
4420  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4421  add_msg( _( "The %s hovers momentarily as it surveys the area." ),
4422  critter.name() );
4423  }
4424  } else {
4425  critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, true );
4426  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4427  add_msg( _( "The %s lets out a whirring noise and starts to follow you." ),
4428  critter.name() );
4429  }
4430  }
4431  } else {
4432  get_map().add_item_or_charges( target, critter.to_item() );
4433  if( !critter.has_flag( mon_flag_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
4434  for( std::pair<const itype_id, int> &ammodef : critter.ammo ) {
4435  if( ammodef.second > 0 ) {
4436  get_map().spawn_item( target.xy(), ammodef.first, 1, ammodef.second, calendar::turn );
4437  }
4438  }
4439  }
4440  g->remove_zombie( critter );
4441  }
4442 
4443  act.set_to_null();
4444 }
4445 
4446 bool disable_activity_actor::can_disable_or_reprogram( const monster &monster )
4447 {
4448  if( get_avatar().get_knowledge_level( skill_electronics ) + get_avatar().get_knowledge_level(
4449  skill_mechanics ) <= 0 ) {
4450  return false;
4451  }
4452 
4453  return ( ( monster.friendly != 0 || monster.has_effect( effect_sensor_stun ) ) &&
4454  !monster.has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
4455  !( monster.has_flag( mon_flag_PAY_BOT ) && monster.has_effect( effect_paid ) ) ) &&
4456  ( !monster.type->revert_to_itype.is_empty() || monster.type->id == mon_manhack );
4457 }
4458 
4459 int disable_activity_actor::get_disable_turns()
4460 {
4461  const float elec_skill = get_avatar().get_skill_level( skill_electronics );
4462  const float mech_skill = get_avatar().get_skill_level( skill_mechanics );
4463  const float time_scale = std::max( elec_skill + mech_skill, 1.0f );
4464  return 2000 / time_scale;
4465 }
4466 
4467 void disable_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4468 {
4469  jsout.start_object();
4470  jsout.member( "target", target );
4471  jsout.member( "reprogram", reprogram );
4472  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
4473  jsout.end_object();
4474 }
4475
