4477 {
4478  disable_activity_actor actor = disable_activity_actor();
4479 
4480  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4481 
4482  data.read( "target", actor.target );
4483  data.read( "reprogram", actor.reprogram );
4484  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
4485 
4486  return actor.clone();
4487 }
4488 
4489 void move_furniture_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
4490 {
4491  int moves = g->grabbed_furn_move_time( dp );
4492  act.moves_left = moves;
4493  act.moves_total = moves;
4494 }
4495 
4496 void move_furniture_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4497 {
4498  if( !g->grabbed_furn_move( dp ) ) {
4499  g->walk_move( who.pos() + dp, via_ramp, true );
4500  }
4501  act.set_to_null();
4502 }
4503 
4504 void move_furniture_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
4505 {
4506  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." ) );
4507  get_avatar().grab( object_type::NONE );
4508 }
4509 
4510 void move_furniture_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4511 {
4512  jsout.start_object();
4513  jsout.member( "dp", dp );
4514  jsout.member( "via_ramp", via_ramp );
4515  jsout.end_object();
4516 }
4517 
4518 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> move_furniture_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4519 {
4520  move_furniture_activity_actor actor = move_furniture_activity_actor( tripoint_zero, false );
4521 
4522  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4523 
4524  data.read( "dp", actor.dp );
4525  data.read( "via_ramp", actor.via_ramp );
4526 
4527  return actor.clone();
4528 }
4529 
4530 static int item_move_cost( Character &who, item_location &item, bool bulk_cost )
4531 {
4532  if( !bulk_cost ) {
4533  // Cost to take an item from a container or map
4534  const int obtain_cost = item.obtain_cost( who );
4535  // Cost to move an item to a container, vehicle or the ground
4536  const int move_cost = Pickup::cost_to_move_item( who, *item );
4537  return obtain_cost + move_cost;
4538  } else {
4539  // Pure cost to handling item excluding overhead.
4540  return std::max( who.item_handling_cost( *item, true, 0, -1, true ), 1 );
4541  }
4542 }
4543 
4544 static bool is_bulk_load( const item_location &lhs, const item_location &rhs )
4545 {
4546  if( lhs.where() == rhs.where() && lhs->stacks_with( *rhs ) ) {
4547  switch( lhs.where() ) {
4548  case item_location::type::container:
4549  return lhs.parent_item() == rhs.parent_item();
4550  break;
4551  case item_location::type::map:
4552  case item_location::type::vehicle:
4553  return lhs.position() == rhs.position();
4554  break;
4555  default:
4556  break;
4557  }
4558  }
4559  return false;
4560 }
4561 
4562 void insert_item_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4563 {
4564  if( items.empty() ) {
4565  debugmsg( "ACT_INSERT_ITEM was passed an empty list" );
4566  act.set_to_null();
4567  }
4568 
4569  all_pockets_rigid = holster->all_pockets_rigid();
4570 
4571  const int total_moves = item_move_cost( who, items.front().first, false );
4572  act.moves_left = total_moves;
4573  act.moves_total = total_moves;
4574 }
4575 
4576 static ret_val<void> try_insert( item_location &holster, drop_location &holstered_item,
4577  int *charges_added, Character *carrier )
4578 {
4579  item &it = *holstered_item.first;
4580  ret_val<void> ret = ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" ) );
4581 
4582  if( holster.get_item()->has_flag( json_flag_NO_RELOAD ) ) {
4583  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "destination can't be reloaded" ) );
4584  }
4585 
4586  if( charges_added == nullptr ) {
4587  if( it.is_bucket_nonempty() ) {
4588  debugmsg( "ACT_INSERT_ITEM tried to stash a spillable container without spilling its contents first" );
4589  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item would spill" ) );
4590  }
4591  ret = holster->can_contain_directly( it );
4592  if( !ret.success() ) {
4593  return ret;
4594  }
4595  ret = holster.parents_can_contain_recursive( &it );
4596  if( !ret.success() ) {
4597  return ret;
4598  }
4599 
4600  return holster->put_in( it, pocket_type::CONTAINER, /*unseal_pockets=*/true, carrier );
4601  }
4602 
4603  ret = holster->can_contain_partial_directly( it );
4604  if( !ret.success() ) {
4605  return ret;
4606  }
4607  ret_val<int> max_parent_charges = holster.max_charges_by_parent_recursive( it );
4608  if( !max_parent_charges.success() ) {
4609  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( max_parent_charges.str() );
4610  }
4611  int charges_to_insert = std::min( holstered_item.second, max_parent_charges.value() );
4612  *charges_added = holster->fill_with( it, charges_to_insert, /*unseal_pockets=*/true,
4613  /*allow_sealed=*/true, /*ignore_settings*/true, /*into_bottom*/true, carrier );
4614  if( *charges_added <= 0 ) {
4615  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" ) );
4616  }
4617 
4618  return ret;
4619 }
4620 
4621 void insert_item_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4622 {
4623  bool success = false;
4624  bool bulk_load = false;
4625  Character *carrier = holster.carrier();
4626  drop_location &holstered_item = items.front();
4627  if( holstered_item.first ) {
4628  success = true;
4629  item &it = *holstered_item.first;
4630  // Check if next is bulk load before moving item.
4631  auto itr = std::next( items.begin() );
4632  if( itr != items.end() && itr->first ) {
4633  bulk_load = is_bulk_load( holstered_item.first, itr->first );
4634  }
4635  ret_val<void> ret = ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" ) );
4636 
4637  if( !it.count_by_charges() ) {
4638  ret = try_insert( holster, holstered_item, nullptr, carrier );
4639 
4640  if( ret.success() ) {
4641  //~ %1$s: item to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4642  who.add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s." ),
4643  holstered_item.first->display_name(), holster->type->nname( 1 ) ) );
4644  handler.add_unsealed( holster );
4645  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( holstered_item.first );
4646  holstered_item.first.remove_item();
4647  }
4648  } else {
4649  int charges_added = 0;
4650  ret = try_insert( holster, holstered_item, &charges_added, carrier );
4651 
4652  if( ret.success() ) {
4653  item copy( it );
4654  copy.charges = charges_added;
4655  //~ %1$s: item to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4656  who.add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s." ),
4657  copy.display_name(), holster->type->nname( 1 ) ) );
4658  handler.add_unsealed( holster );
4659  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( holstered_item.first );
4660  it.charges -= charges_added;
4661  if( it.charges == 0 ) {
4662  holstered_item.first.remove_item();
4663  }
4664  }
4665  }
4666 
4667  if( !ret.success() ) {
4668  success = false;
4669  std::string error = ret.str().empty() ?
4670  //~ %1$s: item we failed to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4671  string_format( _( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s." ),
4672  it.tname(), holster->tname() ) :
4673  //~ %1$s: item we failed to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in, %3$s: reason it failed
4674  string_format( _( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s, %3$s." ),
4675  it.tname(), holster->tname(), ret.str() );
4676  who.add_msg_if_player( error );
4677  }
4678  } else {
4679  // item was lost, so just go to next item
4680  success = true;
4681  }
4682 
4683  drop_locations items_remain;
4684  if( who.is_avatar() && reopen_menu && !success ) {
4685  items_remain.insert( items_remain.end(), items.begin(), items.end() );
4686  }
4687 
4688  items.pop_front();
4689  if( items.empty() || !success || items.front().first == item_location::nowhere ) {
4690  holster.make_active();
4691  handler.handle_by( who );
4692  act.set_to_null();
4693  if( !items_remain.empty() ) {
4694  g->insert_item( items_remain );
4695  }
4696  return;
4697  }
4698 
4699  // Restart the activity
4700  const int total_moves = item_move_cost( who, items.front().first, bulk_load );
4701  act.moves_left = total_moves;
4702  act.moves_total = total_moves;
4703 }
4704 
4705 void insert_item_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
4706 {
4707  handler.handle_by( who );
4708 }
4709 
4710 void insert_item_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4711 {
4712  jsout.start_object();
4713 
4714  jsout.member( "holster", holster );
4715  jsout.member( "items", items );
4716  jsout.member( "handler", handler );
4717  jsout.member( "all_pockets_rigid", all_pockets_rigid );
4718  jsout.member( "reopen_menu", reopen_menu );
4719 
4720  jsout.end_object();
4721 }
4722 
4723 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> insert_item_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4724 {
4725  insert_item_activity_actor actor;
4726 
4727  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4728 
4729  data.read( "holster", actor.holster );
4730  data.read( "items", actor.items );
4731  data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
4732  data.read( "all_pockets_rigid", actor.all_pockets_rigid );
4733  data.read( "reopen_menu", actor.reopen_menu );
4734 
4735  return actor.clone();
4736 }
4737 
4738 reload_activity_actor::reload_activity_actor( item::reload_option &&opt, int extra_moves )
4739 {
4740  moves_total = opt.moves() + extra_moves;
4741  quantity = opt.qty();
4742  target_loc = std::move( opt.target );
4743  ammo_loc = std::move( opt.ammo );
4744 }
4745 
4746 bool reload_activity_actor::can_reload() const
4747 {
4748  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
4749  debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_RELOAD" );
4750  return false;
4751  }
4752 
4753  if( !target_loc ) {
4754  debugmsg( "reload target is null, failed to reload" );
4755  return false;
4756  }
4757 
4758  if( !ammo_loc ) {
4759  debugmsg( "ammo target is null, failed to reload" );
4760  return false;
4761  }
4762 
4763  return true;
4764 }
4765 
4766 void reload_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4767 {
4768  act.moves_total = moves_total;
4769  act.moves_left = moves_total;
4770 }
4771 
4772 void reload_activity_actor::make_reload_sound( Character &who, item &reloadable )
4773 {
4774  if( reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume > 0 ) {
4775  sfx::play_variant_sound( "reload", reloadable.typeId().str(),
4776  sfx::get_heard_volume( who.pos() ) );
4777  sounds::ambient_sound( who.pos(), reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume,
4778  sounds::sound_t::activity, reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise.translated() );
4779  }
4780 }
4781 
4782 void reload_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4783 {
4784  act.set_to_null();
4785  if( !can_reload() ) {
4786  return;
4787  }
4788 
4789  item &reloadable = *target_loc;
4790  item &ammo = *ammo_loc;
4791  const std::string reloadable_name = reloadable.tname();
4792  // cache check results because reloading deletes the ammo item
4793  const std::string ammo_name = ammo.tname();
4794  const bool ammo_is_filthy = ammo.is_filthy();
4795  const bool ammo_uses_speedloader = ammo.has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER );
4796  const bool ammo_uses_speedloader_clip = ammo.has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER_CLIP );
4797 
4798  if( !reloadable.reload( who, std::move( ammo_loc ), quantity ) ) {
4799  add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't reload the %s." ), reloadable_name );
4800  return;
4801  }
4802 
4803  if( ammo_is_filthy ) {
4804  reloadable.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
4805  }
4806 
4807  if( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) > 7800 ) {
4808  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You manage to loosen some debris and make your %s somewhat operational." ),
4809  reloadable_name );
4810  reloadable.set_var( "dirt", ( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) - rng( 790, 2750 ) ) );
4811  }
4812 
4813  if( reloadable.is_gun() ) {
4814  if( reloadable.has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) && !ammo_uses_speedloader &&
4815  !ammo_uses_speedloader_clip ) {
4816  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You insert %dx %s into the %s." ), quantity, ammo_name, reloadable_name );
4817  }
4818  make_reload_sound( who, reloadable );
4819  } else if( reloadable.is_watertight_container() ) {
4820  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You refill the %s." ), reloadable_name );
4821  } else {
4822  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You reload the %1$s with %2$s." ), reloadable_name, ammo_name );
4823  }
4824 
4825  who.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
4826 
4827  item_location loc = target_loc;
4828  // Reload may have caused the item to increase in size more than the pocket/location can contain.
4829  // We want to avoid this because items will be deleted on a save/load.
4830  if( loc.check_parent_capacity_recursive() ) {
4831  return;
4832  }
4833 
4834  // Attempt to put item in another pocket before prompting
4835  if( who.try_add( reloadable, nullptr, nullptr, false ) != item_location::nowhere ) {
4836  // try_add copied the old item, so remove it now.
4837  loc.remove_item();
4838  return;
4839  }
4840 
4841  // Build prompt
4842  uilist reload_query;
4843  const bool wield_check = who.can_wield( reloadable ).success();
4844  reload_query.text = string_format( _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory" ),
4845  reloadable_name );
4846  if( who.has_wield_conflicts( reloadable ) ) {
4847  reload_query.addentry( 1, wield_check, 'w',
4848  _( "Dispose of %s and wield %s" ), who.get_wielded_item()->display_name(),
4849  reloadable_name );
4850  } else {
4851  reload_query.addentry( 1, wield_check, 'w', _( "Wield %s" ), reloadable_name );
4852  }
4853  reload_query.addentry( 2, true, 'd', _( "Drop %s" ), reloadable_name );
4854  reload_query.query();
4855 
4856  switch( reload_query.ret ) {
4857  case 1:
4858  // This case is only reachable if wield_check is true
4859  who.wield( reloadable );
4860  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you wield it instead." ),
4861  reloadable_name );
4862  break;
4863  case 2:
4864  default:
4865  // In player inventory and player is wielding something.
4866  loc.carrier()->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
4867  _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you drop it instead." ),
4868  reloadable_name );
4869  get_map().add_item_or_charges( loc.position(), reloadable );
4870  loc.remove_item();
4871  break;
4872  }
4873 }
4874 
4875 void reload_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4876 {
4877  act.moves_total = 0;
4878  act.moves_left = 0;
4879 }
4880 
4881 void reload_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4882 {
4883  jsout.start_object();
4884 
4885  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
4886  jsout.member( "qty", quantity );
4887  jsout.member( "target_loc", target_loc );
4888  jsout.member( "ammo_loc", ammo_loc );
4889 
4890  jsout.end_object();
4891 }
4892 
4893 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> reload_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4894 {
4895  reload_activity_actor actor;
4896 
4897  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4898 
4899  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
4900  data.read( "qty", actor.quantity );
4901  data.read( "target_loc", actor.target_loc );
4902  data.read( "ammo_loc", actor.ammo_loc );
4903  return actor.clone();
4904 }
4905 
4906 void milk_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4907 {
4908  act.moves_total = total_moves;
4909  act.moves_left = total_moves;
4910 }
4911 
4912 void milk_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4913 {
4914  if( monster_coords.empty() ) {
4915  debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" );
4916  act.set_to_null();
4917  return;
4918  }
4919  map &here = get_map();
4920  const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( monster_coords.at( 0 ) );
4921  monster *source_mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( source_pos );
4922  if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
4923  // We might end up here if the creature dies while being milked
4924  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The udders slip out of your hands." ) );
4925  act.set_to_null();
4926  }
4927 }
4928 
4929 void milk_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4930 {
4931  act.set_to_null();
4932  if( monster_coords.empty() ) {
4933  debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" );
4934  return;
4935  }
4936  map &here = get_map();
4937  const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( monster_coords.at( 0 ) );
4938  monster *source_mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( source_pos );
4939  if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
4940  debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
4941  return;
4942  }
4943  auto milked_item = source_mon->ammo.find( source_mon->type->starting_ammo.begin()->first );
4944  if( milked_item == source_mon->ammo.end() ) {
4945  debugmsg( "animal has no milkable ammo type" );
4946  return;
4947  }
4948  if( milked_item->second <= 0 ) {
4949  debugmsg( "started milking but udders are now empty before milking finishes" );
4950  return;
4951  }
4952  item milk( milked_item->first, calendar::turn, milked_item->second );
4953  milk.set_item_temperature( units::from_celsius( 38.6 ) );
4954  if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( milk, nullptr, 1, nullptr, nullptr, -1, source_mon ) ) {
4955  milked_item->second = 0;
4956  if( milk.charges > 0 ) {
4957  milked_item->second = milk.charges;
4958  } else {
4959  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s's udders run dry." ), source_mon->get_name() );
4960  }
4961  }
4962  // if the monster was not manually tied up, but needed to be fixed in place temporarily then
4963  // remove that now.
4964  if( !string_values.empty() && string_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
4965  source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
4966  }
4967 }
4968 
4969 void milk_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4970 {
4971  jsout.start_object();
4972 
4973  jsout.member( "total_moves", total_moves );
4974  jsout.member( "monster_coords", monster_coords );
4975  jsout.member( "string_values", string_values );
4976 
4977  jsout.end_object();
4978 }
4979 
4980 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> milk_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4981 {
4982  milk_activity_actor actor;
4983  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4984 
4985  data.read( "moves_total", actor.total_moves );
4986  data.read( "monster_coords", actor.monster_coords );
4987  data.read( "string_values", actor.string_values );
4988 
4989  return actor.clone();
4990 }
4991 
4992 void shearing_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4993 {
4994  monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
4995  if( !mon ) {
4996  debugmsg( "shearing lost monster when starting" );
4997  act.set_to_null();
4998  return;
4999  }
5000 
5001  std::string pet_name_capitalized = mon->unique_name.empty() ? mon->disp_name( false,
5002  true ) : mon->unique_name;
5003 
5004  if( !mon->shearable() ) {
5005  add_msg( _( "%1$s has nothing %2$s could shear." ), pet_name_capitalized, who.disp_name() );
5006  if( shearing_tie ) {
5007  mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5008  }
5009  act.set_to_null();
5010  return;
5011  }
5012 
5013  const int shearing_quality = who.max_quality( qual_SHEAR );
5014  if( !( shearing_quality > 0 ) ) {
5015  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5016  add_msg( m_info, _( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool." ), who.disp_name( false, true ) );
5017  } else { // who.is_npc
5018  // npcs can't shear monsters yet, this is for when they are able to
5019  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool." ), who.disp_name(),
5020  mon->disp_name() );
5021  }
5022  if( shearing_tie ) {
5023  mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5024  }
5025  act.set_to_null();
5026  return;
5027  }
5028 
5029  const time_duration shearing_time = 30_minutes / shearing_quality;
5030  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SHEARING, "shearing_time time = %s",
5031  to_string_writable( shearing_time ) );
5032 
5033  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5034  add_msg( m_info,
5035  _( "%1$s start shearing %2$s." ), who.disp_name( false, true ), mon->disp_name() );
5036  } else { // who.is_npc
5037  // npcs can't shear monsters yet, this is for when they are able to
5038  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s starts shearing %2$s." ), who.disp_name(),
5039  mon->disp_name() );
5040  }
5041 
5042  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( shearing_time );
5043  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5044 }
5045 
5046 void shearing_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
5047 {
5048  if( !who.has_quality( qual_SHEAR ) ) {
5049  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5050  add_msg(
5051  m_bad,
5052  _( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool anymore." ),
5053  who.disp_name( false, true ) );
5054  } else {
5055  add_msg_if_player_sees(
5056  who,
5057  _( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool anymore." ),
5058  who.disp_name() );
5059  }
5060  who.cancel_activity();
5061  }
5062 }
5063 
5064 void shearing_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5065 {
5066  monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
5067  if( !mon ) {
5068  debugmsg( "shearing monster at position disappeared" );
5069  act.set_to_null();
5070  return;
5071  }
5072 
5073  const shearing_data &shear_data = mon->type->shearing;
5074  if( !shear_data.valid() ) {
5075  debugmsg( "shearing monster does not have shearing_data" );
5076  if( shearing_tie ) {
5077  mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5078  }
5079  act.set_to_null();
5080  return;
5081  }
5082 
5083  map &mp = get_map();
5084 
5085  add_msg_if_player_sees( who,
5086  string_format(
5087  _( "%1$s finished shearing %2$s and got:" ),
5088  who.disp_name( false, true ),
5089  mon->unique_name.empty() ? mon->disp_name() : mon->unique_name ) );
5090 
5091  const std::vector<shearing_roll> shear_roll = shear_data.roll_all( *mon );
5092  for( const shearing_roll &roll : shear_roll ) {
5093  if( roll.result->count_by_charges() ) {
5094  item shear_item( roll.result, calendar::turn, roll.amount );
5095  mp.add_item_or_charges( who.pos(), shear_item );
5096  add_msg_if_player_sees( who, shear_item.display_name() );
5097  } else {
5098  item shear_item( roll.result, calendar::turn );
5099  for( int i = 0; i < roll.amount; ++i ) {
5100  mp.add_item_or_charges( who.pos(), shear_item );
5101  }
5102  add_msg_if_player_sees( who,
5103  //~ %1$s - item, %2$d - amount
5104  string_format( _( "%1$s x%2$d" ),
5105  shear_item.display_name(), roll.amount ) );
5106  }
5107  }
5108 
5109  mon->add_effect( effect_sheared, calendar::season_length() );
5110  if( shearing_tie ) {
5111  mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5112  }
5113 
5114  act.set_to_null();
5115 }
5116 
5117 void shearing_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
5118 {
5119  monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
5120  if( !mon ) {
5121  return;
5122  }
5123 
5124  if( shearing_tie ) {
5125  // free the poor critter
5126  mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5127  }
5128 }
5129 
5130 void shearing_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5131 {
5132  jsout.start_object();
5133  jsout.member( "mon_coords", mon_coords );
5134  jsout.member( "shearing_tie", shearing_tie );
5135  jsout.end_object();
5136 }
5137 
5138 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> shearing_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5139 {
5140  shearing_activity_actor actor = shearing_activity_actor( {} );
5141 
5142  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5143  data.read( "mon_coords", actor.mon_coords );
5144  data.read( "shearing_tie", actor.shearing_tie );
5145  return actor.clone();
5146 }
5147 
5148 static bool check_if_disassemble_okay( item_location target, Character &who )
5149 {
5150  item *disassembly = target.get_item();
5151 
5152  // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
5153  if( !disassembly ) {
5154  who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
5155  _( "You no longer have the in progress disassembly in your possession. "
5156  "You stop disassembling. "
5157  "Reactivate the in progress disassembly to continue disassembling." ),
5158  _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress disassembly in their possession. "
5159  "<npcname> stops disassembling." ) );
5160  return false;
5161  }
5162  return true;
5163 }
5164 
5165 void disassemble_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5166 {
5167  if( act.targets.empty() ) {
5168  act.set_to_null();
5169  return;
5170  }
5171  if( act.targets.back()->typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
5172  act.position = act.targets.back()->get_making_batch_size();
5173  }
5174  target = who.create_in_progress_disassembly( act.targets.back() );
5175  act.targets.pop_back();
5176 
5177  if( !check_if_disassemble_okay( target, who ) ) {
5178  act.set_to_null();
5179  return;
5180  }
5181 
5182  // Mark the item, not available for other characters
5183  target->set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
5184 
5185  activity_override = target->get_making().exertion_level();
5186 
5187  cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
5188  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
5189 }
5190 
5191 void disassemble_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5192 {
5193  if( !check_if_disassemble_okay( target, who ) ) {
5194  act.set_to_null();
5195  return;
5196  }
5197 
5198  // We already checked if this is nullptr above
5199  item &craft = *target;
5200 
5201  const std::optional<tripoint> location = target.where() == item_location::type::character
5202  ? std::optional<tripoint>() : std::optional<tripoint>( target.position() );
5203  if( !use_cached_workbench_multiplier ) {
5204  cached_workbench_multiplier = who.workbench_crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location );
5205  use_cached_workbench_multiplier = true;
5206  }
5207  const float crafting_speed = who.crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location,
5208  use_cached_workbench_multiplier, cached_workbench_multiplier );
5209 
5210  if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
5211  who.cancel_activity();
5212  return;
5213  }
5214 
5215  if( moves_total == 0 ) {
5216  craft.item_counter = 10'000'000;
5217  } else {
5218  const int spent_moves = who.get_moves() * who.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() );
5219  craft.item_counter += std::round( spent_moves * crafting_speed * 10'000'000.0 / moves_total );
5220  craft.item_counter = std::min( craft.item_counter, 10'000'000 );
5221  who.set_moves( 0 );
5222  }
5223 
5224  if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
5225  who.complete_disassemble( target );
5226  }
5227 }
5228 
5229 void disassemble_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
5230 {
5231  act.set_to_null();
5232 }
5233 
5234 void disassemble_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
5235 {
5236  if( target.get_item() ) {
5237  target->erase_var( "activity_var" );
5238  }
5239 }
5240 
5241 float disassemble_activity_actor::exertion_level() const
5242 {
5243  return activity_override;
5244 }
5245 
5246 std::string disassemble_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
5247 {
5248  if( !target ) {
5249  // We have somehow lost the disassembly item. This will be handled in do_turn in the check_if_disassemble_okay call.
5250  return "";
5251  }
5252  return target->tname();
5253 }
5254 
5255 void disassemble_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5256 {
5257  jsout.start_object();
5258 
5259  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5260  jsout.member( "target", target );
5261  jsout.member( "activity_override", activity_override );
5262 
5263  jsout.end_object();
5264 }
5265 
5266 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> disassemble_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5267 {
5268  disassemble_activity_actor actor = disassemble_activity_actor( 0 );
5269 
5270  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5271 
5272  data.read( "target", actor.target );
5273  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
5274  data.read( "activity_override", actor.activity_override );
5275 
5276  return actor.clone();
5277 }
5278 
5279 void oxytorch_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
5280 {
5281  const map &here = get_map();
5282 
5283  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5284  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5285  if( !furn_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5286  if( !testing ) {
5287  debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
5288  }
5289  act.set_to_null();
5290  return;
5291  }
5292 
5293  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( furn_type->oxytorch->duration() );
5294  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5295  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5296  if( !ter_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5297  if( !testing ) {
5298  debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
5299  }
5300  act.set_to_null();
5301  return;
5302  }
5303  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( ter_type->oxytorch->duration() );
5304  } else {
5305  if( !testing ) {
5306  debugmsg( "oxytorch activity called on invalid terrain" );
5307  }
5308  act.set_to_null();
5309  return;
5310  }
5311 
5312  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total );
5313  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5314 }
5315 
5316 void oxytorch_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
5317 {
5318  if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
5319  tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
5320  sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "oxytorch", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
5321  if( calendar::once_every( 2_turns ) ) {
5322  sounds::sound( target, 10, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "hissssssssss!" ) );
5323  }
5324  } else {
5325  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5326  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." ), tool->tname() );
5327  } else { // who.is_npc()
5328  add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." ), who.disp_name( false,
5329  true ), tool->tname() );
5330  }
5331  who.cancel_activity();
5332  }
5333 }
5334 
5335 void oxytorch_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5336 {
5337  map &here = get_map();
5338  const activity_data_common *data;
5339 
5340  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5341  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5342  if( !furn_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5343  if( !testing ) {
5344  debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
5345  }
5346  act.set_to_null();
5347  return;
5348  }
5349 
5350  const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->oxytorch->result();
5351  if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5352  if( !testing ) {
5353  debugmsg( "oxytorch furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() );
5354  }
5355  act.set_to_null();
5356  return;
5357  }
5358 
5359  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->oxytorch );
5360  here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5361  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5362  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5363  if( !ter_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5364  if( !testing ) {
5365  debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
5366  }
5367  act.set_to_null();
5368  return;
5369  }
5370 
5371  const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->oxytorch->result();
5372  if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5373  if( !testing ) {
5374  debugmsg( "oxytorch terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() );
5375  }
5376  act.set_to_null();
5377  return;
5378  }
5379 
5380  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->oxytorch );
5381  here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5382  } else {
5383  if( !testing ) {
5384  debugmsg( "oxytorch activity finished on invalid terrain" );
5385  }
5386  act.set_to_null();
5387  return;
5388  }
5389 
5390  for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5391  const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5392  if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5393  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5394  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5395  } else {
5396  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5397  for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5398  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5399  }
5400  }
5401  }
5402 
5403  // 50% chance of starting a fire.
5404  if( one_in( 2 ) && here.flammable_items_at( target ) ) {
5405  here.add_field( target, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes );
5406  }
5407 
5408  if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5409  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5410  }
5411 
5412  act.set_to_null();
5413 }
5414 
5415 void oxytorch_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5416 {
5417  jsout.start_object();
5418  jsout.member( "target", target );
5419  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
5420  jsout.end_object();
5421 }
5422 
5423 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> oxytorch_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5424 {
5425  oxytorch_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
5426  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5427  data.read( "target", actor.target );
5428  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
5429  return actor.clone();
5430 }
5431 
5432 void tent_placement_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5433 {
5434  act.moves_total = moves_total;
5435  act.moves_left = moves_total;
5436 }
5437 
5438 void tent_placement_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
5439 {
5440  map &here = get_map();
5441  const tripoint center = p.pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * target.x, ( radius + 1 ) * target.y,
5442  0 );
5443 
5444  // Make a square of floor surrounded by wall.
5445  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5446  here.furn_set( dest, wall );
5447  }
5448  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius - 1 ) ) {
5449  here.furn_set( dest, floor );
5450  }
5451  // Place the center floor and the door.
5452  if( floor_center ) {
5453  here.furn_set( center, *floor_center );
5454  }
5455  here.furn_set( p.pos() + target, door_closed );
5456 
5457  add_msg( m_info, _( "You set up the %s on the ground." ), it.tname() );
5458  add_msg( m_info, _( "Examine the center square to pack it up again." ) );
5459  act.set_to_null();
5460 }
5461 
5462 void tent_placement_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &p )
5463 {
5464  map &here = get_map();
5465  here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos() + target, it, true );
5466 }
5467 
5468 void tent_placement_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5469 {
5470  jsout.start_object();
5471  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5472  jsout.member( "wall", wall );
5473  jsout.member( "floor", floor );
5474  jsout.member( "floor_center", floor_center );
5475  jsout.member( "door_closed", door_closed );
5476  jsout.member( "radius", radius );
5477  jsout.member( "it", it );
5478  jsout.member( "target", target );
5479  jsout.end_object();
5480 }
5481 
5482 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> tent_placement_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5483 {
5484  item it;
5485  tent_placement_activity_actor actor( 0, {}, 0, it, {}, {}, {}, {} );
5486  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5487  data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
5488  data.read( "wall", actor.wall );
5489  data.read( "floor", actor.floor );
5490  data.read( "floor_center", actor.floor_center );
5491  data.read( "door_closed", actor.door_closed );
5492  data.read( "radius", actor.radius );
5493  data.read( "it", actor.it );
5494  data.read( "target", actor.target );
5495  return actor.clone();
5496 }
5497 
5498 void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5499 {
5500  act.moves_total = moves_total;
5501  act.moves_left = moves_total;
5502 }
5503 
5504 void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
5505 {
5506  map &here = get_map();
5507  for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( target, radius ) ) {
5508  here.furn_set( pt, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
5509  }
5510  here.add_item_or_charges( target, item( tent, calendar::turn ) );
5511  act.set_to_null();
5512 }
5513 
5514 void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5515 {
5516  jsout.start_object();
5517  jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5518  jsout.member( "radius", radius );
5519  jsout.member( "target", target );
5520  jsout.member( "tent", tent );
5521  jsout.end_object();
5522 }

5534 }

5540 }
5541 
5542 void reel_cable_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5543 {
5544  cable->reset_link( false, &who, -2 );
5545  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You reel in the %s and wind it up." ), cable->link_name() );
5546  if( cable->has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
5547  cable.remove_item();
5548  }
5549  act.set_to_null();
5550 }

5570 void meditate_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5571 {
5572  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 20_minutes );
5573  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5574 }
5575 
5576 void meditate_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5577 {
5578  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You pause to engage in spiritual contemplation." ) );
5579  who.add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 5, 10 );
5580  act.set_to_null();
5581 }
5582 
5583 void meditate_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5584 {
5585  jsout.write_null();
5586 }
5587 
5588 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> meditate_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
5589 {
5590  return meditate_activity_actor().clone();
5591 }
5592 
5593 void play_with_pet_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5594 {
5595  act.moves_total = rng( 50, 125 ) * 100;
5596  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5597 }
5598 
5599 void play_with_pet_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5600 {
5601  who.add_morale( MORALE_PLAY_WITH_PET, rng( 3, 10 ), 10, 5_hours, 25_minutes );
5602 
5603  if( !playstr.empty() ) {
5604  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, playstr, pet_name );
5605  }
5606 
5607  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Playing with your %s has lifted your spirits a bit." ),
5608  pet_name );
5609  act.set_to_null();
5610 }
5611 
5612 void play_with_pet_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5613 {
5614  jsout.start_object();
5615  jsout.member( "pet_name", pet_name );
5616  jsout.member( "playstr", playstr );
5617  jsout.end_object();
5618 }
5619 
5620 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> play_with_pet_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5621 {
5622  play_with_pet_activity_actor actor = play_with_pet_activity_actor();
5623  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5624  data.read( "pet_name", actor.pet_name );
5625  data.read( "playstr", actor.playstr );
5626  return actor.clone();
5627 }
5628 
5629 time_duration prying_activity_actor::prying_time( const activity_data_common &data,
5630  const item_location &tool, const Character &who )
5631 {
5632  const pry_data &pdata = data.prying_data();
5633  if( pdata.prying_nails ) {
5634  return data.duration();
5635  }
5636 
5637  int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5638  difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5639  return time_duration::from_seconds(
5640  /** @ARM_STR speeds up crowbar prying attempts */
5641  std::max( 5, 2 * ( 4 * difficulty - who.get_arm_str() ) ) );
5642 }
5643 
5644 void prying_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5645 {
5646  const map &here = get_map();
5647 
5648  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5649  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5650  if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5651  if( !testing ) {
5652  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
5653  }
5654  act.set_to_null();
5655  return;
5656  }
5657 
5658  prying_nails = furn_type->prying->prying_data().prying_nails;
5659  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>(
5660  prying_time( *furn_type->prying, tool, who ) );
5661  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5662  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5663  if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5664  if( !testing ) {
5665  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
5666  }
5667  act.set_to_null();
5668  return;
5669  }
5670 
5671  prying_nails = ter_type->prying->prying_data().prying_nails;
5672  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>(
5673  prying_time( *ter_type->prying, tool, who ) );
5674  } else {
5675  if( !testing ) {
5676  debugmsg( "prying activity called on invalid terrain" );
5677  }
5678  act.set_to_null();
5679  return;
5680  }
5681 
5682  if( prying_nails && !tool->has_quality( qual_PRYING_NAIL ) ) {
5683  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't use your %1$s to pry up the nails." ), tool->tname() );
5684  act.set_to_null();
5685  return;
5686  }
5687 
5688  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total );
5689  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5690 }
5691 
5692 void prying_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
5693 {
5694  std::string method = "CROWBAR";
5695 
5696  if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who, method ) ) {
5697  int ammo_consumed = tool->ammo_required();
5698  std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator iter = tool->type->ammo_scale.find( method );
5699  if( iter != tool->type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
5700  ammo_consumed *= iter->second;
5701  }
5702  tool->ammo_consume( ammo_consumed, tool.position(), &who );
5703  if( prying_nails ) {
5704  sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hammer", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
5705  }
5706  } else {
5707  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5708  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." ), tool->tname() );
5709  } else { // who.is_npc()
5710  add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." ), who.disp_name( false,
5711  true ), tool->tname() );
5712  }
5713  who.cancel_activity();
5714  }
5715 }
5716 
5717 void prying_activity_actor::handle_prying( Character &who )
5718 {
5719  map &here = get_map();
5720  const activity_data_common *data;
5721 
5722  // check if Character passed the difficulty check
5723  auto difficulty_check = [&]( const activity_data_common & data ) -> bool {
5724  const pry_data &pdata = data.prying_data();
5725 
5726  int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5727  difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5728 
5729  /** @ARM_STR increases chance of prying success */
5730  const int dice_str = dice( 4, who.get_arm_str() );
5731 
5732  return dice( 4, difficulty ) < dice_str;
5733  };
5734 
5735  auto handle_failure = [&]( const pry_data & pdata ) -> void {
5736  if( !pdata.breakable )
5737  {
5738  return;
5739  }
5740 
5741  int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5742  difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5743 
5744  /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS reduces chance of breaking when prying */
5745  const int dice_mech = dice( 2, static_cast<int>( round( who.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) ) );
5746  /** @ARM_STR reduces chance of breaking when prying */
5747  const int dice_str = dice( 2, who.get_arm_str() );
5748 
5749  if( dice( 4, difficulty ) > dice_mech + dice_str )
5750  {
5751  // bash will always succeed
5752  here.bash( target, 0, false, true );
5753  }
5754 
5755  if( !data->prying_data().failure.empty() )
5756  {
5757  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->prying_data().failure.translated() );
5758  }
5759  };
5760 
5761  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5762  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5763  if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5764  if( !testing ) {
5765  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
5766  }
5767  return;
5768  }
5769 
5770  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->prying );
5771  if( !difficulty_check( *furn_type->prying ) ) {
5772  handle_failure( furn_type->prying->prying_data() );
5773  return;
5774  }
5775 
5776  const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->prying->result();
5777  if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5778  if( !testing ) {
5779  debugmsg( "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() );
5780  }
5781  return;
5782  }
5783 
5784  here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5785  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5786  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5787  if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5788  if( !testing ) {
5789  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
5790  }
5791  return;
5792  }
5793 
5794  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->prying );
5795  if( !difficulty_check( *ter_type->prying ) ) {
5796  handle_failure( ter_type->prying->prying_data() );
5797  return;
5798  }
5799 
5800  const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->prying->result();
5801  if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5802  if( !testing ) {
5803  debugmsg( "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() );
5804  }
5805  return;
5806  }
5807 
5808  here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5809  } else {
5810  if( !testing ) {
5811  debugmsg( "prying activity finished on invalid terrain" );
5812  }
5813  return;
5814  }
5815 
5816  for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5817  const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5818  if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5819  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5820  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5821  } else {
5822  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5823  for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5824  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5825  }
5826  }
5827  }
5828 
5829  const pry_data &pdata = data->prying_data();
5830  if( pdata.noisy ) {
5831  sounds::sound( target, 12, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "crunch!" ), true, "tool", "crowbar" );
5832  }
5833 
5834  if( pdata.alarm ) {
5835  get_event_bus().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( who.getID() );
5836  sounds::sound( who.pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
5837  "alarm" );
5838  }
5839 
5840  if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5841  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5842  }
5843 }
5844 
5845 void prying_activity_actor::handle_prying_nails( Character &who )
5846 {
5847  map &here = get_map();
5848  const activity_data_common *data;
5849 
5850  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5851  const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5852  if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5853  if( !testing ) {
5854  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() );
5855  }
5856  return;
5857  }
5858 
5859  const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->prying->result();
5860  if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5861  if( !testing ) {
5862  debugmsg( "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() );
5863  }
5864  return;
5865  }
5866 
5867  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->prying );
5868  here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5869  } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5870  const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5871  if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5872  if( !testing ) {
5873  debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() );
5874  }
5875  return;
5876  }
5877 
5878  const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->prying->result();
5879  if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5880  if( !testing ) {
5881  debugmsg( "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() );
5882  }
5883  return;
5884  }
5885 
5886  data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->prying );
5887  here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5888  } else {
5889  if( !testing ) {
5890  debugmsg( "prying nails activity finished on invalid terrain" );
5891  }
5892  return;
5893  }
5894 
5895  for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5896  const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5897  if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5898  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5899  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5900  } else {
5901  item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5902  for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5903  here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5904  }
5905  }
5906  }
5907 
5908  if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5909  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5910  }
5911 
5912  who.practice( skill_fabrication, 1, 1 );
5913 }
5914 
5915 void prying_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5916 {
5917  act.set_to_null();
5918 
5919  if( prying_nails ) {
5920  handle_prying_nails( who );
5921  } else {
5922  handle_prying( who );
5923  }
5924 }
5925 
5926 void prying_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5927 {
5928  jsout.start_object();
5929  jsout.member( "target", target );
5930  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
5931  jsout.member( "prying_nails", prying_nails );
5932  jsout.end_object();
5933 }
5934 
5935 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> prying_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5936 {
5937  prying_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
5938  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5939  data.read( "target", actor.target );
5940  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
5941  data.read( "prying_nails", actor.prying_nails );
5942  return actor.clone();
5943 }

5955  act.set_to_null();

5971  act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5972 }
5973 
5974 void haircut_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5975 {
5976  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You give your hair a trim." ) );
5977  who.add_morale( MORALE_HAIRCUT, 3, 3, 480_minutes, 3_minutes );
5978  if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5979  uilist amenu;
5980  amenu.title = _( "Change what?" );
5981  amenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change hairstyle" ) );
5982  amenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change facial hairstyle" ) );
5983 
5984  amenu.query();
5985  if( amenu.ret == 0 ) {
5986  who.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::HAIR );
5987  } else if( amenu.ret == 1 ) {
5988  who.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::HAIR_F );
5989  }
5990  }
5991  act.set_to_null();
5992 }
5993 
5994 void haircut_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5995 {
5996  jsout.write_null();
5997 }
5998 
5999 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> haircut_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
6000 {
6001  return haircut_activity_actor().clone();
6002 }
6003 
6004 static bool check_stealing( Character &who, item &it )
6005 {
6006  if( !it.is_owned_by( who, true ) ) {
6007  // Has the player given input on if stealing is ok?
6008  if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_ASK" ) {
6009  Pickup::query_thief();
6010  }
6011  if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_HONEST" ) {
6012  if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
6013  who.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
6014  }
6015  return false;
6016  }
6017  }
6018 
6019  return true;
6020 }
6021 
6022 bool avatar_action::check_stealing( Character &who, item &weapon )
6023 {
6024  return ::check_stealing( who, weapon );
6025 }
6026 
6027 void wield_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6028 {
6029  if( who.get_moves() > 0 ) {
6030  if( target_item ) {
6031  // Make copies so the original remains untouched if wielding fails
6032  item newit = *target_item;
6033  item leftovers = newit;
6034 
6035  // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
6036  if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
6037  leftovers.charges = newit.charges - quantity;
6038  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6039  newit.charges = quantity;
6040  }
6041  } else {
6042  leftovers.charges = 0;
6043  }
6044 
6045  if( check_stealing( who, newit ) ) {
6046  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( target_item );
6047  if( who.wield( newit ) ) {
6048  // If we wielded up a whole stack, remove the original item
6049  // Otherwise, replace the item with the leftovers
6050  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6051  *target_item = std::move( leftovers );
6052  } else {
6053  target_item.remove_item();
6054  }
6055  }
6056  handler.handle_by( who );
6057  }
6058  }
6059 
6060  who.cancel_activity();
6061  }
6062 }
6063 
6064 void wield_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6065 {
6066  jsout.start_object();
6067 
6068  jsout.member( "target_items", target_item );
6069  jsout.member( "quantities", quantity );
6070  jsout.member( "handler", handler );
6071 
6072  jsout.end_object();
6073 }
6074 
6075 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wield_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6076 {
6077  wield_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6078 
6079  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6080 
6081  data.read( "target_items", actor.target_item );
6082  data.read( "quantities", actor.quantity );
6083  data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
6084 
6085  return actor.clone();
6086 }
6087 
6088 void wear_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6089 {
6090  // ACT_WEAR has item_location targets, and int quantities
6091  while( who.get_moves() > 0 && !target_items.empty() ) {
6092  item_location target = std::move( target_items.back() );
6093  int quantity = quantities.back();
6094  target_items.pop_back();
6095  quantities.pop_back();
6096 
6097  if( !target ) {
6098  debugmsg( "Lost target item of ACT_WEAR" );
6099  continue;
6100  }
6101 
6102  // Make copies so the original remains untouched if wearing fails
6103  item newit = *target;
6104  item leftovers = newit;
6105 
6106  // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
6107  if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
6108  leftovers.charges = newit.charges - quantity;
6109  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6110  newit.charges = quantity;
6111  }
6112  } else {
6113  leftovers.charges = 0;
6114  }
6115 
6116  if( check_stealing( who, newit ) ) {
6117  handler.unseal_pocket_containing( target );
6118  if( who.wear_item( newit ) ) {
6119  // If we wore up a whole stack, remove the original item
6120  // Otherwise, replace the item with the leftovers
6121  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6122  *target = std::move( leftovers );
6123  } else {
6124  target.remove_item();
6125  }
6126  }
6127  }
6128  }
6129 
6130  // If there are no items left we are done
6131  if( target_items.empty() ) {
6132  handler.handle_by( who );
6133  who.cancel_activity();
6134  }
6135 }
6136 
6137 void wear_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6138 {
6139  jsout.start_object();
6140 
6141  jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
6142  jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
6143  jsout.member( "handler", handler );
6144 
6145  jsout.end_object();
6146 }
6147 
6148 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wear_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6149 {
6150  wear_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6151 
6152  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6153 
6154  data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
6155  data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
6156  data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
6157 
6158  return actor.clone();
6159 }
6160 
6161 void invoke_item_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6162 {
6163  item_location _item = item;
6164  std::string _method = method;
6165  if( method.empty() ) {
6166  who.cancel_activity();
6167  who.invoke_item( _item.get_item() );
6168  return;
6169  }
6170  who.cancel_activity();
6171  who.invoke_item( _item.get_item(), _method );
6172 }
6173 
6174 void invoke_item_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6175 {
6176  jsout.start_object();
6177 
6178  jsout.member( "item", item );
6179  jsout.member( "method", method );
6180 
6181  jsout.end_object();
6182 }
6183 
6184 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> invoke_item_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6185 {
6186  invoke_item_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6187 
6188  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6189 
6190  data.read( "item", actor.item );
6191  data.read( "method", actor.method );
6192 
6193  return actor.clone();
6194 }
6195 
6196 void pickup_menu_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6197 {
6198  std::optional<tripoint> p( where );
6199  std::vector<drop_location> s( selection );
6200  who.cancel_activity();
6201  who.pick_up( game_menus::inv::pickup( *who.as_avatar(), p, s ) );
6202 }
6203 
6204 void pickup_menu_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6205 {
6206  jsout.start_object();
6207 
6208  jsout.member( "where", where );
6209  jsout.member( "selection", selection );
6210 
6211  jsout.end_object();
6212 }
6213 
6214 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> pickup_menu_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6215 {
6216  pickup_menu_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6217 
6218  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6219 
6220  data.read( "where", actor.where );
6221  data.read( "selection", actor.selection );
6222 
6223  return actor.clone();
6224 }
6225 
6226 static void chop_single_do_turn( player_activity &act )
6227 {
6228  const map &here = get_map();
6229  sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "axe", sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) );
6230  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
6231  //~ Sound of a wood chopping tool at work!
6232  sounds::sound( here.getlocal( act.placement ), 15, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "CHK!" ) );
6233  }
6234 }
6235 
6236 void chop_logs_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6237 {
6238  act.moves_total = moves;
6239  act.moves_left = moves;
6240 }
6241 
6242 void chop_logs_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6243 {
6244  chop_single_do_turn( act );
6245 }
6246 
6247 void chop_logs_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6248 {
6249  map &here = get_map();
6250  const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6251  int log_quan;
6252  int stick_quan;
6253  int splint_quan;
6254  if( here.ter( pos ) == ter_t_trunk ) {
6255  log_quan = rng( 2, 3 );
6256  stick_quan = rng( 0, 3 );
6257  splint_quan = 0;
6258  } else if( here.ter( pos ) == ter_t_stump ) {
6259  log_quan = rng( 0, 2 );
6260  stick_quan = 0;
6261  splint_quan = rng( 5, 15 );
6262  } else {
6263  log_quan = 0;
6264  stick_quan = 0;
6265  splint_quan = 0;
6266  }
6267  for( int i = 0; i != log_quan; ++i ) {
6268  item obj( itype_log, calendar::turn );
6269  obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6270  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6271  }
6272  for( int i = 0; i != stick_quan; ++i ) {
6273  item obj( itype_stick_long, calendar::turn );
6274  obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6275  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6276  }
6277  for( int i = 0; i != splint_quan; ++i ) {
6278  item obj( itype_splinter, calendar::turn );
6279  obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6280  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6281  }
6282  here.ter_set( pos, ter_t_dirt );
6283  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping wood." ) );
6284 
6285  act.set_to_null();
6286  activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6287 }
6288 
6289 void chop_logs_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6290 {
6291  jsout.start_object();
6292 
6293  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6294  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6295 
6296  jsout.end_object();
6297 }
6298 
6299 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_logs_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6300 {
6301  chop_logs_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6302 
6303  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6304 
6305  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6306  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6307 
6308  return actor.clone();
6309 }
6310 
6311 void chop_planks_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6312 {
6313  act.moves_total = moves;
6314  act.moves_left = moves;
6315 }
6316 
6317 void chop_planks_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6318 {
6319  chop_single_do_turn( act );
6320 }
6321 
6322 void chop_planks_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6323 {
6324  const int max_planks = 10;
6325  /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION increases number of planks cut from a log */
6326  int planks = normal_roll( 2 + who.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ), 1 );
6327  int wasted_planks = max_planks - planks;
6328  int scraps = rng( wasted_planks, wasted_planks * 3 );
6329  planks = std::min( planks, max_planks );
6330 
6331  map &here = get_map();
6332  if( planks > 0 ) {
6333  here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act.placement ), itype_2x4, planks, 0, calendar::turn );
6334  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, n_gettext( "You produce %d plank.", "You produce %d planks.",
6335  planks ), planks );
6336  }
6337  if( scraps > 0 ) {
6338  here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act.placement ), itype_splinter, scraps, 0, calendar::turn );
6339  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, n_gettext( "You produce %d splinter.", "You produce %d splinters.",
6340  scraps ), scraps );
6341  }
6342  if( planks < max_planks / 2 ) {
6343  who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You waste a lot of the wood." ) );
6344  }
6345  act.set_to_null();
6346  activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6347 }
6348 
6349 void chop_planks_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6350 {
6351  jsout.start_object();
6352 
6353  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6354 
6355  jsout.end_object();
6356 }
6357 
6358 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_planks_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6359 {
6360  chop_planks_activity_actor actor( {} );
6361 
6362  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6363 
6364  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6365 
6366  return actor.clone();
6367 }
6368 
6369 void chop_tree_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6370 {
6371  act.moves_total = moves;
6372  act.moves_left = moves;
6373 }
6374 
6375 void chop_tree_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6376 {
6377  chop_single_do_turn( act );
6378 }
6379 
6380 void chop_tree_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6381 {
6382  map &here = get_map();
6383  const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6384 
6385  tripoint direction;
6386  if( !who.is_npc() &&
6387  ( who.backlog.empty() || who.backlog.front().id() != ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) ) {
6388  while( true ) {
6389  if( const std::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction(
6390  _( "Select a direction for the tree to fall in." ) ) ) {
6391  direction = *dir;
6392  break;
6393  }
6394  // try again
6395  }
6396  } else {
6397  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
6398  const point main_dir = pos.xy() - who.pos().xy();
6399  const int circle_size = 8;
6400  static constexpr std::array<point, circle_size> circle = {
6401  point_east, point_south_east, point_south, point_south_west, point_west,
6402  point_north_west, point_north, point_north_east
6403  };
6404  int circle_center = 0; // Initialized as the compiler complained
6405  for( int i = 0; i < circle_size; i++ ) {
6406  if( main_dir == circle[i] ) {
6407  circle_center = i;
6408  break;
6409  }
6410  }
6411  std::vector<point> candidates;
6412  candidates = { main_dir, // Fall straight away
6413  circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 1 ) % circle_size], // Fall away to the left. Adding the full circle to ensure modulo gives a non negative result
6414  circle[( circle_center + 1 ) % circle_size], // Fall away to the right
6415  circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 2 ) % circle_size], // Fall to the left
6416  circle[( circle_center + 2 ) % circle_size], // Fall to the right
6417  circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 3 ) % circle_size], // Fall towards to the left
6418  circle[( circle_center + 3 ) % circle_size]
6419  }; // Fall towards to the right
6420  for( const point &direc : candidates ) {
6421  bool cantuse = false;
6422  tripoint proposed_to = pos + point( 3 * direc.x, 3 * direc.y );
6423  std::vector<tripoint> rough_tree_line = line_to( pos, proposed_to );
6424  for( const tripoint &elem : rough_tree_line ) {
6425  if( creatures.creature_at( elem ) ) {
6426  cantuse = true;
6427  break;
6428  }
6429  }
6430  if( !cantuse ) {
6431  direction = tripoint( direc, pos.z );
6432  break;
6433  }
6434  }
6435  }
6436 
6437  here.cut_down_tree( tripoint_bub_ms( pos ), direction.xy() );
6438 
6439  who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping down a tree." ) );
6440  // sound of falling tree
6441  here.collapse_at( pos, false, true, false );
6442  sfx::play_variant_sound( "misc", "timber",
6443  sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) );
6444  get_event_bus().send<event_type::cuts_tree>( who.getID() );
6445  act.set_to_null();
6446  activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6447 }
6448 
6449 void chop_tree_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6450 {
6451  jsout.start_object();
6452 
6453  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6454  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6455 
6456  jsout.end_object();
6457 }
6458 
6459 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_tree_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6460 {
6461  chop_tree_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6462 
6463  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6464 
6465  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6466  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6467 
6468  return actor.clone();
6469 }
6470 
6471 void churn_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )

6473  act.moves_total = moves;
6474  act.moves_left = moves;
6475 }
6476 
6477 void churn_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6478 {
6479  map &here = get_map();
6480  who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish churning up the earth here." ) );
6481  here.ter_set( here.getlocal( act.placement ), ter_t_dirtmound );
6482  // Go back to what we were doing before
6483  // could be player zone activity, or could be NPC multi-farming
6484  act.set_to_null();
6485  activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6486 }
6487

6490  jsout.start_object();
6491 
6492  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6493  jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6494 
6495  jsout.end_object();
6496 }
6497

6499 {
6500  churn_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6501 
6502  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6503 
6504  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6505  data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6506 
6507  return actor.clone();
6508 }

6516 void clear_rubble_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6517 {
6518  map &here = get_map();
6519  const tripoint_bub_ms &pos = here.bub_from_abs( act.placement );
6520  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You clear up the %s." ), here.furnname( pos ) );
6521  here.furn_set( pos, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
6522 
6523  act.set_to_null();
6524 
6525  here.maybe_trigger_trap( pos, who, true );
6526 }
