6547 
6548 void firstaid_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6549 {
6550  act.moves_total = moves;
6551  act.moves_left = moves;
6552  act.name = name;
6553 }
6554 
6555 void firstaid_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6556 {
6557  static const std::string iuse_name_string( "heal" );
6558 
6559  item_location it = act.targets.front();
6560  item *used_tool = it->get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
6561  if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
6562  debugmsg( "Lost tool used for healing" );
6563  act.set_to_null();
6564  return;
6565  }
6566 
6567  const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
6568  const heal_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const heal_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
6569  if( actor == nullptr ) {
6570  debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
6571  act.set_to_null();
6572  return;
6573  }
6574 
6575  Character *patient = patientID == get_avatar().getID() ? &get_avatar() :
6576  dynamic_cast<Character *>( g->find_npc( patientID ) );
6577  if( !patient ) {
6578  debugmsg( "Your patient can no longer be found so you stop using the %s.", name );
6579  act.set_to_null();
6580  act.values.clear();
6581  return;
6582  }
6583  const bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( act.str_values[0] );
6584  int charges_consumed = actor->finish_using( who, *patient,
6585  *used_tool, healed );
6586  std::list<item>used;
6587  if( used_tool->has_flag( flag_SINGLE_USE ) ) {
6588  it.remove_item();
6589  } else if( used_tool->is_medication() ) {
6590  if( !it->count_by_charges() ||
6591  it->use_charges( it->typeId(), charges_consumed, used, it.position() ) ) {
6592  it.remove_item();
6593  }
6594  } else if( used_tool->is_tool() ) {
6595  if( used_tool->type->charges_to_use() ) {
6596  it->activation_consume( charges_consumed, it.position(), &who );
6597  }
6598  }
6599 
6600  // Erase activity and values.
6601  act.set_to_null();
6602  act.values.clear();
6603 
6604  // Return to first eat or consume meds menu activity in the backlog.
6605  for( player_activity &backlog_act : who.backlog ) {
6606  if( backlog_act.id() == ACT_EAT_MENU ||
6607  backlog_act.id() == ACT_CONSUME_MEDS_MENU ) {
6608  backlog_act.auto_resume = true;
6609  break;
6610  }
6611  }
6612  // Clear the backlog of any activities that will not auto resume.
6613  for( auto iter = who.backlog.begin(); iter != who.backlog.end(); ) {
6614  if( !iter->auto_resume ) {
6615  iter = who.backlog.erase( iter );
6616  } else {
6617  ++iter;
6618  }
6619  }
6620 }
6621 
6622 void firstaid_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6623 {
6624  jsout.start_object();
6625 
6626  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6627  jsout.member( "name", name );
6628  jsout.member( "patientID", patientID );
6629 
6630  jsout.end_object();
6631 }
6632 
6633 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> firstaid_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6634 {
6635  firstaid_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, {} );
6636 
6637  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6638 
6639  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6640  data.read( "name", actor.name );
6641  data.read( "patientID", actor.patientID );
6642 
6643  return actor.clone();
6644 }
6645 
6646 void forage_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6647 {
6648  act.moves_total = moves;
6649  act.moves_left = moves;
6650 }
6651 
6652 void forage_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6653 {
6654  // Don't forage if we aren't next to the bush - otherwise we get weird bugs
6655  bool next_to_bush = false;
6656  map &here = get_map();
6657  for( const tripoint &pnt : here.points_in_radius( who.pos(), 1 ) ) {
6658  // TODO: fix point types
6659  if( here.getglobal( pnt ) == act.placement ) {
6660  next_to_bush = true;
6661  break;
6662  }
6663  }
6664 
6665  if( !next_to_bush ) {
6666  act.set_to_null();
6667  return;
6668  }
6669 
6670  const int veggy_chance = rng( 1, 100 );
6671  bool found_something = false;
6672 
6673  item_group_id group_id;
6674  ter_str_id next_ter;
6675 
6676  switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
6677  case SPRING:
6678  group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_spring;
6679  next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_spring;
6680  break;
6681  case SUMMER:
6682  group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_summer;
6683  next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_summer;
6684  break;
6685  case AUTUMN:
6686  group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_autumn;
6687  next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_autumn;
6688  break;
6689  case WINTER:
6690  group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_winter;
6691  next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_winter;
6692  break;
6693  default:
6694  debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
6695  }
6696 
6697  const tripoint bush_pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6698  here.ter_set( bush_pos, next_ter );
6699 
6700  // Survival gives a bigger boost, and Perception is leveled a bit.
6701  // Both survival and perception affect time to forage
6702 
6703  ///\EFFECT_PER slightly increases forage success chance
6704  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases forage success chance
6705  if( veggy_chance < round( who.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 3 + who.per_cur - 2 ) ) {
6706  const std::vector<item *> dropped =
6707  here.put_items_from_loc( group_id, who.pos(), calendar::turn );
6708  // map::put_items_from_loc can create multiple items and merge them into one stack.
6709  // That stack will then appear multiple times in the vector.
6710  // Remember and check the already handled items to prevent rolling
6711  // poison/hallucinogen multiple times and print misleading messages.
6712  std::vector<item *> handled;
6713  for( item *it : dropped ) {
6714  if( std::find( handled.rbegin(), handled.rend(), it ) != handled.rend() ) {
6715  continue;
6716  }
6717  handled.push_back( it );
6718  found_something = true;
6719  if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
6720  it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON );
6721  it->poison = rng( 2, 7 );
6722  } else if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_HALLU ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
6723  it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
6724  }
6725  add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->display_name() );
6726  }
6727  }
6728  // 10% to drop a item/items from this group.
6729  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
6730  const std::vector<item *> dropped =
6731  here.put_items_from_loc( Item_spawn_data_trash_forest, who.pos(), calendar::turn );
6732  // same as above
6733  std::vector<item *> handled;
6734  for( item * const &it : dropped ) {
6735  if( std::find( handled.rbegin(), handled.rend(), it ) != handled.rend() ) {
6736  continue;
6737  }
6738  handled.push_back( it );
6739  add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->display_name() );
6740  found_something = true;
6741  }
6742  }
6743 
6744  if( !found_something ) {
6745  add_msg( _( "You didn't find anything." ) );
6746  }
6747 
6748  iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( who );
6749 
6750  act.set_to_null();
6751 
6752  here.maybe_trigger_trap( bush_pos, who, true );
6753 }
6754 
6755 void forage_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6756 {
6757  jsout.start_object();
6758 
6759  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6760 
6761  jsout.end_object();
6762 }
6763 
6764 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> forage_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6765 {
6766  forage_activity_actor actor( {} );
6767 
6768  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6769 
6770  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6771 
6772  return actor.clone();
6773 }
6774 
6775 void gunmod_add_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6776 {
6777  act.moves_total = moves;
6778  act.moves_left = moves;
6779  act.name = name;
6780 }
6781 
6782 void gunmod_add_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6783 {
6784  act.set_to_null();
6785  // first unpack all of our arguments
6786  if( act.values.size() != 4 ) {
6787  debugmsg( "Insufficient arguments to ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
6788  return;
6789  }
6790 
6791  item &gun = *act.targets.at( 0 );
6792  item &mod = *act.targets.at( 1 );
6793 
6794  // chance of success (%)
6795  const int roll = act.values[1];
6796  // chance of damage (%)
6797  const int risk = act.values[2];
6798 
6799  // any tool charges used during installation
6800  const itype_id tool( act.name );
6801  const int qty = act.values[3];
6802 
6803  if( !gun.is_gunmod_compatible( mod ).success() ) {
6804  debugmsg( "Invalid arguments in ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
6805  return;
6806  }
6807 
6808  if( !tool.is_empty() && qty > 0 ) {
6809  who.use_charges( tool, qty );
6810  }
6811 
6812  if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= roll ) {
6813  add_msg( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." ), mod.tname(),
6814  gun.tname() );
6815  gun.put_in( who.i_rem( &mod ), pocket_type::MOD );
6816  gun.on_contents_changed();
6817 
6818  } else if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= risk ) {
6819  if( gun.inc_damage() ) {
6820  // Remove irremovable mods prior to destroying the gun
6821  for( item *mod : gun.gunmods() ) {
6822  if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
6823  who.remove_item( *mod );
6824  }
6825  }
6826  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and destroyed your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
6827  gun.tname() );
6828  who.i_rem( &gun );
6829  } else {
6830  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and damaged your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
6831  gun.tname() );
6832  }
6833 
6834  } else {
6835  add_msg( m_info, _( "You failed at installing the %s." ), mod.tname() );
6836  }
6837 }
6838 
6839 void gunmod_add_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6840 {
6841  jsout.start_object();
6842 
6843  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6844  jsout.member( "name", name );
6845 
6846  jsout.end_object();
6847 }
6848 
6849 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> gunmod_add_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6850 {
6851  gunmod_add_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6852 
6853  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6854 
6855  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6856  data.read( "name", actor.name );
6857 
6858  return actor.clone();
6859 }
6860 
6861 void longsalvage_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6862 {
6863  act.index = index;
6864 
6865  //todo: refactor the actor to process items in ::do_turn, then remove setting the moves to 0
6866  //this currently still can't get interrupted before you get attacked
6867  act.moves_left = 0;
6868 }
6869 
6870 void longsalvage_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6871 {
6872  static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
6873  item &main_tool = who.i_at( act.index );
6874  map &here = get_map();
6875  map_stack items = here.i_at( who.pos() );
6876  item *salvage_tool = main_tool.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
6877  if( salvage_tool == nullptr ) {
6878  debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long salvage" );
6879  act.set_to_null();
6880  return;
6881  }
6882 
6883  const use_function *use_fun = salvage_tool->get_use( salvage_string );
6884  const salvage_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
6885  if( actor == nullptr ) {
6886  debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
6887  act.set_to_null();
6888  return;
6889  }
6890 
6891  for( item &it : items ) {
6892  // Check first and only if possible attempt it with player char
6893  // This suppresses warnings unless it is an item the player wears
6894  if( actor->valid_to_cut_up( nullptr, it ) ) {
6895  item_location item_loc( map_cursor( who.pos() ), &it );
6896  actor->try_to_cut_up( who, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
6897  return;
6898  }
6899  }
6900 
6901  add_msg( _( "You finish salvaging." ) );
6902  act.set_to_null();
6903 }
6904 
6905 void longsalvage_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6906 {
6907  jsout.start_object();
6908 
6909  jsout.member( "index", index );
6910 
6911  jsout.end_object();
6912 }
6913 
6914 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> longsalvage_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6915 {
6916  longsalvage_activity_actor actor( {} );
6917 
6918  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6919 
6920  data.read( "index", actor.index );
6921 
6922  return actor.clone();
6923 }
6924 
6925 void mop_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6926 {
6927  act.moves_total = moves;
6928  act.moves_left = moves;
6929 }
6930 
6931 void mop_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6932 {
6933  // Blind character have a 1/3 chance of actually mopping.
6934  const bool will_mop = one_in( who.is_blind() ? 1 : 3 );
6935  if( will_mop ) {
6936  map &here = get_map();
6937  here.mop_spills( here.bub_from_abs( act.placement ) );
6938  }
6939  activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6940 }
6941 
6942 void mop_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6943 {
6944  jsout.start_object();
6945 
6946  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6947 
6948  jsout.end_object();
6949 }
6950 
6951 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> mop_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6952 {
6953  mop_activity_actor actor( {} );
6954 
6955  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6956 
6957  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6958 
6959  return actor.clone();
6960 }
6961 
6962 void unload_loot_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6963 {
6964  jsout.start_object();
6965 
6966  jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6967  jsout.member( "num_processed", num_processed );
6968  jsout.member( "stage", stage );
6969  jsout.member( "coord_set", coord_set );
6970  jsout.member( "placement", placement );
6971 
6972  jsout.end_object();
6973 }
6974 
6975 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> unload_loot_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6976 {
6977  unload_loot_activity_actor actor( {} );
6978 
6979  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6980 
6981  data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6982  data.read( "num_processed", actor.num_processed );
6983  data.read( "stage", actor.stage );
6984  data.read( "coord_set", actor.coord_set );
6985  data.read( "placement", actor.placement );
6986 
6987  return actor.clone();
6988 }
6989 
6990 void unload_loot_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6991 {
6992  act.moves_total = moves;
6993  act.moves_left = moves;
6994 }
6995 
6996 static void move_item( Character &you, item &it, const int quantity, const tripoint_bub_ms &src,
6997  const tripoint_bub_ms &dest, vehicle *src_veh, int src_part )
6998 {
6999  item leftovers = it;
7000 
7001  if( quantity != 0 && it.count_by_charges() ) {
7002  // Reinserting leftovers happens after item removal to avoid stacking issues.
7003  leftovers.charges = it.charges - quantity;
7004  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
7005  it.charges = quantity;
7006  }
7007  } else {
7008  leftovers.charges = 0;
7009  }
7010 
7011  map &here = get_map();
7012  // Check that we can pick it up.
7013  if( it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
7014  you.mod_moves( -activity_handlers::move_cost( it, src, dest ) );
7015 
7016  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( you, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { it }, dest );
7017  // Remove from map or vehicle.
7018  if( src_veh ) {
7019  vehicle_part &vp_src = src_veh->part( src_part );
7020  src_veh->remove_item( vp_src, &it );
7021  } else {
7022  here.i_rem( src, &it );
7023  }
7024  }
7025 
7026  // If we didn't pick up a whole stack, put the remainder back where it came from.
7027  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
7028  if( src_veh ) {
7029  vehicle_part &vp_src = src_veh->part( src_part );
7030  if( !src_veh->add_item( vp_src, leftovers ) ) {
7031  debugmsg( "SortLoot: Source vehicle failed to receive leftover charges." );
7032  }
7033  } else {
7034  here.add_item_or_charges( src, leftovers );
7035  }
7036  }
7037 }
7038 
7039 void unload_loot_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &you )
7040 {
7041  enum activity_stage : int {
7042  //Initial stage
7043  INIT = 0,
7044  //Think about what to do first: choose destination
7045  THINK,
7046  //Do activity
7047  DO,
7048  };
7049 
7050  faction const *fac = you.get_faction();
7051  faction_id fac_id = fac == nullptr ? faction_id() : fac->id;
7052 
7053  map &here = get_map();
7054  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = you.get_location();
7055  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
7056  if( here.check_vehicle_zones( here.get_abs_sub().z() ) ) {
7057  mgr.cache_vzones();
7058  }
7059 
7060  if( stage == INIT ) {
7061  // TODO: fix point types
7062  coord_set.clear();
7063  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p :
7064  mgr.get_near( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
7065  fac_id ) ) {
7066  coord_set.insert( p.raw() );
7067  }
7068 
7069  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p :
7070  mgr.get_near( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
7071  fac_id ) ) {
7072  coord_set.insert( p.raw() );
7073  }
7074  stage = THINK;
7075  }
7076 
7077  if( stage == THINK ) {
7078  //initialize num_processed
7079  num_processed = 0;
7080  // TODO: fix point types
7081  std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> src_set;
7082  src_set.reserve( coord_set.size() );
7083  for( const tripoint &p : coord_set ) {
7084  src_set.emplace_back( p );
7085  }
7086  // sort source tiles by distance
7087  const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
7088 
7089  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &src : src_sorted ) {
7090  // TODO: fix point types
7091  placement = src.raw();
7092  coord_set.erase( src.raw() );
7093 
7094  const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
7095  if( !here.inbounds( src_loc ) ) {
7096  if( !here.inbounds( you.pos() ) ) {
7097  // p is implicitly an NPC that has been moved off the map, so reset the activity
7098  // and unload them
7099  you.cancel_activity();
7100  you.assign_activity( ACT_UNLOAD_LOOT );
7101  you.set_moves( 0 );
7102  g->reload_npcs();
7103  return;
7104  }
7105  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
7106  route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
7107  you.get_path_avoid() );
7108  if( route.empty() ) {
7109  // can't get there, can't do anything, skip it
7110  continue;
7111  }
7112  stage = DO;
7113  you.set_destination( route, act );
7114  you.activity.set_to_null();
7115  return;
7116  }
7117 
7118  // skip tiles in IGNORE zone and tiles on fire
7119  // (to prevent taking out wood off the lit brazier)
7120  // and inaccessible furniture, like filled charcoal kiln
7121  if( mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE, src, fac_id ) ||
7122  here.get_field( src_loc, fd_fire ) != nullptr ||
7123  !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( src_loc ) ) {
7124  continue;
7125  }
7126 
7127  //nothing to sort?
7128  const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo();
7129  if( ( !ovp || ovp->items().empty() ) && here.i_at( src_loc ).empty() ) {
7130  continue;
7131  }
7132 
7133  bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
7134  // before we unload any item, check if player is at or
7135  // adjacent to the loot source tile
7136  if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
7137  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
7138  bool adjacent = false;
7139 
7140  // get either direct route or route to nearest adjacent tile if
7141  // source tile is impassable
7142  if( here.passable( src_loc ) ) {
7143  route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
7144  you.get_path_avoid() );
7145  } else {
7146  // impassable source tile (locker etc.),
7147  // get route to nearest adjacent tile instead
7148  route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
7149  adjacent = true;
7150  }
7151 
7152  // check if we found path to source / adjacent tile
7153  if( route.empty() ) {
7154  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't reach the source tile." ),
7155  you.disp_name() );
7156  continue;
7157  }
7158 
7159  // shorten the route to adjacent tile, if necessary
7160  if( !adjacent ) {
7161  route.pop_back();
7162  }
7163 
7164  // set the destination and restart activity after player arrives there
7165  // we don't need to check for safe mode,
7166  // activity will be restarted only if
7167  // player arrives on destination tile
7168  stage = DO;
7169  you.set_destination( route, act );
7170  you.activity.set_to_null();
7171  return;
7172  }
7173  stage = DO;
7174  break;
7175  }
7176  }
7177  if( stage == DO ) {
7178  // TODO: fix point types
7179  const tripoint_abs_ms src( placement );
7180  const tripoint_bub_ms src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
7181 
7182  bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
7183  // before we move any item, check if player is at or
7184  // adjacent to the loot source tile
7185  if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
7186  stage = THINK;
7187  return;
7188  }
7189 
7190  // the boolean in this pair being true indicates the item is from a vehicle storage space
7191  auto items = std::vector<std::pair<item *, bool>>();
7192  vehicle *src_veh;
7193  int src_part;
7194 
7195  //Check source for cargo part
7196  //map_stack and vehicle_stack are different types but inherit from item_stack
7197  // TODO: use one for loop
7198  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo() ) {
7199  src_veh = &ovp->vehicle();
7200  src_part = ovp->part_index();
7201  for( item &it : ovp->items() ) {
7202  items.emplace_back( &it, true );
7203  }
7204  } else {
7205  src_veh = nullptr;
7206  src_part = -1;
7207  }
7208  for( item &it : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
7209  items.emplace_back( &it, false );
7210  }
7211 
7212  bool unload_mods = false;
7213  bool unload_molle = false;
7214  bool unload_sparse_only = false;
7215  int unload_sparse_threshold = 20;
7216 
7217  std::vector<zone_data const *> const zones = mgr.get_zones_at( src, zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL,
7218  fac_id );
7219 
7220  // get most open rules out of all stacked zones
7221  for( zone_data const *zone : zones ) {
7222  unload_options const &options = dynamic_cast<const unload_options &>( zone->get_options() );
7223  unload_molle |= options.unload_molle();
7224  unload_mods |= options.unload_mods();
7225  unload_sparse_only |= options.unload_sparse_only();
7226  unload_sparse_threshold |= options.unload_sparse_threshold();
7227  }
7228 
7229  //Skip items that have already been processed
7230  for( auto it = items.begin() + num_processed; it < items.end(); ++it ) {
7231 
7232  item &thisitem = *it->first;
7233 
7234  // skip unpickable liquid
7235  if( thisitem.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7236  ++num_processed;
7237  continue;
7238  }
7239 
7240  // skip favorite items in ignore favorite zones
7241  if( thisitem.is_favorite && mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE_FAVORITES, src, fac_id ) ) {
7242  ++num_processed;
7243  continue;
7244  }
7245 
7246  // Only if it's from a vehicle do we use the vehicle source location information.
7247  vehicle *this_veh = it->second ? src_veh : nullptr;
7248  const int this_part = it->second ? src_part : -1;
7249 
7250  // if this item isn't going anywhere and its not sealed
7251  // check if it is in a unload zone or a strip corpse zone
7252  // then we should unload it and see what is inside
7253  if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, abspos, 1, fac_id ) ||
7254  ( mgr.has_near( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, abspos, 1, fac_id ) && it->first->is_corpse() ) ) {
7255  if( you.rate_action_unload( *it->first ) == hint_rating::good &&
7256  !it->first->any_pockets_sealed() ) {
7257  std::unordered_map<itype_id, int> item_counts;
7258  if( unload_sparse_only ) {
7259  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
7260  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7261  item_counts[contained->typeId()]++;
7262  }
7263  }
7264  }
7265  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
7266  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7267  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7268  if( unload_sparse_only &&
7269  item_counts[contained->typeId()] > unload_sparse_threshold ) {
7270  continue;
7271  }
7272  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7273  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7274  }
7275  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7276  return;
7277  }
7278  }
7279  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
7280  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7281  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7282  if( it->first->is_ammo_belt() ) {
7283  if( it->first->type->magazine->linkage ) {
7284  item link( *it->first->type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, contained->count() );
7285  if( this_veh != nullptr ) {
7286  vehicle_part &vp_this = this_veh->part( this_part );
7287  this_veh->add_item( vp_this, link );
7288  } else {
7289  here.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, link );
7290  }
7291  }
7292  }
7293  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7294  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7295 
7296  if( it->first->has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it->first->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
7297  if( this_veh != nullptr ) {
7298  vehicle_part &vp_this = this_veh->part( this_part );
7299  this_veh->remove_item( vp_this, it->first );
7300  } else {
7301  here.i_rem( src_loc, it->first );
7302  }
7303  }
7304  }
7305  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7306  return;
7307  }
7308  }
7309  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL ) ) {
7310  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7311  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7312  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7313  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7314  }
7315  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7316  return;
7317  }
7318  }
7319  }
7320  // if unloading mods
7321  if( unload_mods ) {
7322  // remove each mod, skip irremovable
7323  for( item *mod : it->first->gunmods() ) {
7324  if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
7325  continue;
7326  }
7327  you.gunmod_remove( *it->first, *mod );
7328  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7329  return;
7330  }
7331  }
7332  }
7333 
7334  // if unloading molle
7335  if( unload_molle ) {
7336  while( !it->first->get_contents().get_added_pockets().empty() ) {
7337  item removed = it->first->get_contents().remove_pocket( 0 );
7338  move_item( you, removed, 1, src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7339  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7340  return;
7341  }
7342  }
7343  }
7344 
7345  // after dumping items go back to start of activity loop
7346  // so that can re-assess the items in the tile
7347  ++num_processed;
7348  return;
7349  }
7350 
7351  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
7352  return;
7353  }
7354  }
7355 
7356  //this location is sorted
7357  stage = THINK;
7358  return;
7359  }
7360 
7361  // If we got here without restarting the activity, it means we're done
7362  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s sorted out every item possible." ), you.disp_name( false, true ) );
7363  if( you.is_npc() ) {
7364  npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( &you );
7365  guy->revert_after_activity();
7366  }
7367  act.set_to_null();
7368 }
7369 
7370 bool vehicle_folding_activity_actor::fold_vehicle( Character &p, bool check_only ) const
7371 {
7372  map &here = get_map();
7373  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( target_pos );
7374  if( !vp ) {
7375  debugmsg( "Lost ACT_VEHICLE_FOLD target vehicle" );
7376  return false;
7377  }
7378  vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
7379 
7380  if( !veh.is_foldable() ) {
7381  p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s cannot be folded." ), veh.name );
7382  return false;
7383  }
7384 
7385  const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7386  for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh.get_all_parts() ) {
7387  for( const itype_id &tool : vp.info().get_folding_tools() ) {
7388  if( !inv.has_tools( tool, 1 ) ) {
7389  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" ), item::nname( tool ) );
7390  return false;
7391  }
7392  }
7393  }
7394 
7395  if( veh.velocity != 0 ) {
7396  p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You can't fold the %s while it's in motion." ), veh.name );
7397  return false;
7398  }
7399 
7400  if( check_only ) {
7401  return true; // bail out early if we're just checking
7402  }
7403 
7404  // Drop cargo to ground
7405  // TODO: make cargo shuffling add time to activity
7406  for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh.get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
7407  vehicle_stack cargo = vpr.items();
7408  for( const item &elem : cargo ) {
7409  here.add_item_or_charges( veh.pos_bub(), elem );
7410  }
7411  cargo.clear();
7412  }
7413 
7414  veh.unboard_all();
7415  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You fold the %s." ), veh.name );
7416  here.add_item_or_charges( veh.pos_bub(), veh.get_folded_item() );
7417  here.destroy_vehicle( &veh );
7418 
7419  return true;
7420 }
7421 
7422 vehicle_folding_activity_actor::vehicle_folding_activity_actor( const vehicle &target )
7423 {
7424  folding_time = target.folding_time();
7425  target_pos = target.bub_part_pos( 0 );
7426 }
7427 
7428 void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7429 {
7430  avatar *pc = p.as_avatar();
7431  if( pc && pc->get_grab_type() == object_type::VEHICLE ) {
7432  optional_vpart_position grabbed_veh = get_map().veh_at( pc->pos_bub() + pc->grab_point );
7433  optional_vpart_position target_veh = get_map().veh_at( target_pos );
7434  if( grabbed_veh && target_veh && ( &grabbed_veh->vehicle() == &target_veh->vehicle() ) ) {
7435  pc->grab( object_type::NONE );
7436  pc->add_msg_if_player( _( "You let go of %s." ), grabbed_veh->vehicle().name );
7437  }
7438  }
7439 
7440  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( folding_time );
7441  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( folding_time );
7442 
7443  if( !fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7444  act.set_to_null();
7445  }
7446 }
7447 
7448 void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7449 {
7450  if( calendar::once_every( 30_seconds ) ) {
7451  if( !fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7452  act.set_to_null();
7453  }
7454  }
7455 }
7456 
7457 void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7458 {
7459  fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ false );
7460  act.set_to_null();
7461 }
7462 
7463 void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7464 {
7465  jsout.start_object();
7466  jsout.member( "target_pos", target_pos );
7467  jsout.member( "folding_time", folding_time );
7468  jsout.end_object();
7469 }
7470 
7471 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> vehicle_folding_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7472 {
7473  vehicle_folding_activity_actor actor;
7474  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7475  data.read( "target_pos", actor.target_pos );
7476  data.read( "folding_time", actor.folding_time );
7477  return actor.clone();
7478 }
7479 
7480 bool vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::unfold_vehicle( Character &p, bool check_only ) const
7481 {
7482  if( p.cant_do_underwater() ) {
7483  return false;
7484  }
7485  if( p.cant_do_mounted() ) {
7486  return false;
7487  }
7488  map &here = get_map();
7489  vehicle *veh = here.add_vehicle( vehicle_prototype_none, p.pos(), 0_degrees, 0, 0, false );
7490  if( veh == nullptr ) {
7491  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." ), it.tname() );
7492  return false;
7493  }
7494  if( !veh->restore_folded_parts( it ) ) {
7495  here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7496  return false;
7497  }
7498  const bool cant_float = !veh->can_float();
7499  const auto invalid_pos = [&here, &cant_float]( const tripoint & p ) {
7500  return ( cant_float && here.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) )
7501  || here.veh_at( p )
7502  || here.impassable( p );
7503  };
7504 
7505  const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7506  for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
7507  if( vp.info().location != "structure" ) {
7508  continue;
7509  }
7510  if( invalid_pos( vp.pos() ) ) {
7511  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." ), it.tname() );
7512  here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7513  return false;
7514  }
7515  for( const itype_id &tool : vp.info().get_unfolding_tools() ) {
7516  if( !inv.has_tools( tool, 1 ) ) {
7517  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" ), item::nname( tool ) );
7518  here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7519  return false;
7520  }
7521  }
7522  }
7523  if( check_only ) { // if we're just checking bail out at this point - this is a valid location.
7524  here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7525  return true;
7526  }
7527  veh->name = it.get_var( "vehicle_name" );
7528  veh->set_owner( p );
7529  here.add_vehicle_to_cache( veh );
7530  if( here.veh_at( p.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
7531  here.board_vehicle( p.pos(), &p ); // if boardable unbroken part is present -> get on it
7532  }
7533  if( p.is_avatar() && it.get_var( "tracking", 0 ) == 1 ) {
7534  veh->toggle_tracking(); // restore position tracking state
7535  }
7536 
7537  std::string unfold_msg = it.get_var( "unfold_msg" );
7538  if( unfold_msg.empty() ) {
7539  unfold_msg = _( "You unfold the %s." );
7540  } else {
7541  unfold_msg = _( unfold_msg );
7542  }
7543  p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, unfold_msg, veh->name );
7544 
7545  return true;
7546 }
7547 
7548 vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor( const item &it )
7549  : it( it )
7550 {
7551  constexpr int legacy_unfold_moves = 500;
7552  unfolding_time = time_duration::from_moves( it.get_var( "unfolding_time", legacy_unfold_moves ) );
7553 }
7554 
7555 void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7556 {
7557  act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( unfolding_time );
7558  act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( unfolding_time );
7559  if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7560  act.canceled( p );
7561  }
7562 }
7563 
7564 void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7565 {
7566  if( calendar::once_every( 30_seconds ) ) {
7567  if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7568  act.canceled( p );
7569  }
7570  }
7571 }
7572 
7573 void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7574 {
7575  if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ false ) ) {
7576  debugmsg( "failed unfolding %s", it.display_name() );
7577  act.canceled( p );
7578  }
7579  act.set_to_null();
7580 }
7581 
7582 void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7583 {
7584  get_map().add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), it, true );
7585  act.set_to_null();
7586 }
7587 
7588 void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7589 {
7590  jsout.start_object();
7591  jsout.member( "it", it );
7592  jsout.member( "unfolding_time", unfolding_time );
7593  jsout.end_object();
7594 }
7595 
7596 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7597 {
7598  vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor actor;
7599  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7600  data.read( "it", actor.it );
7601  data.read( "unfolding_time", actor.unfolding_time );
7602  return actor.clone();
7603 }
7604 
7605 void wash_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
7606 {
7607  act.moves_total = requirements.time;
7608  act.moves_left = requirements.time;
7609 }
7610 
7611 void wash_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7612 {
7613  const auto is_liquid_crafting_component = []( const item & it ) {
7614  return is_crafting_component( it ) && ( !it.count_by_charges() || it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) );
7615  };
7616  const inventory &crafting_inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7617  if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water, requirements.water, is_liquid_crafting_component ) &&
7618  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water_clean, requirements.water, is_liquid_crafting_component ) ) {
7619  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of water or clean water to wash these items." ),
7620  requirements.water );
7621  act.set_to_null();
7622  return;
7623  } else if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_soap, requirements.cleanser ) &&
7624  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_detergent, requirements.cleanser ) &&
7625  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_liquid_soap, requirements.cleanser,
7626  is_liquid_crafting_component ) ) {
7627  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of cleansing agent to wash these items." ),
7628  requirements.cleanser );
7629  act.set_to_null();
7630  return;
7631  }
7632 
7633  for( drop_location &ait : to_wash ) {
7634  item_location filthy_item = ait.first;
7635  if( filthy_item->count_by_charges() ) {
7636  item copy( *filthy_item );
7637  copy.charges = ait.second;
7638  copy.unset_flag( flag_FILTHY );
7639  filthy_item->charges -= ait.second;
7640  if( filthy_item->charges <= 0 ) {
7641  filthy_item.remove_item();
7642  }
7643  p.i_add_or_drop( copy );
7644  } else {
7645  filthy_item->unset_flag( flag_FILTHY );
7646  p.on_worn_item_washed( *filthy_item );
7647  }
7648  }
7649 
7650  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
7651  comps.emplace_back( itype_water, requirements.water );
7652  comps.emplace_back( itype_water_clean, requirements.water );
7653  p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_liquid_crafting_component );
7654 
7655  std::vector<item_comp> comps1;
7656  comps1.emplace_back( itype_soap, requirements.cleanser );
7657  comps1.emplace_back( itype_detergent, requirements.cleanser );
7658  comps1.emplace_back( itype_liquid_soap, requirements.cleanser );
7659  p.consume_items( comps1 );
7660 
7661  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You washed your items." ) );
7662 
7663  // Make sure newly washed components show up as available if player attempts to craft immediately
7664  p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
7665 
7666  act.set_to_null();
7667 }
7668 
7669 void wash_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7670 {
7671  jsout.start_object();
7672  jsout.member( "to_wash", to_wash );
7673  jsout.member( "time", requirements.time );
7674  jsout.member( "water", requirements.water );
7675  jsout.member( "cleanser", requirements.cleanser );
7676  jsout.end_object();
7677 }
7678 
7679 std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wash_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7680 {
7681  wash_activity_actor actor;
7682  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7683  data.read( "to_wash", actor.to_wash );
7684  data.read( "time", actor.requirements.time );
7685  data.read( "water", actor.requirements.water );
7686  data.read( "cleanser", actor.requirements.cleanser );
7687  return actor.clone();
7688 }
7689 
7690 namespace activity_actors
7691 {
7692 
7693 // Please keep this alphabetically sorted
7694 const std::unordered_map<activity_id, std::unique_ptr<activity_actor>( * )( JsonValue & )>
7695 deserialize_functions = {
7696  { ACT_AIM, &aim_activity_actor::deserialize },
7697  { ACT_AUTODRIVE, &autodrive_activity_actor::deserialize },
7698  { ACT_BIKERACK_RACKING, &bikerack_racking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7699  { ACT_BIKERACK_UNRACKING, &bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7700  { ACT_BINDER_COPY_RECIPE, &bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::deserialize },
7701  { ACT_BOLTCUTTING, &boltcutting_activity_actor::deserialize },
7702  { ACT_CHOP_LOGS, &chop_logs_activity_actor::deserialize },
7703  { ACT_CHOP_PLANKS, &chop_planks_activity_actor::deserialize },
7704  { ACT_CHOP_TREE, &chop_tree_activity_actor::deserialize },
7705  { ACT_CHURN, &churn_activity_actor::deserialize },
7706  { ACT_CLEAR_RUBBLE, &clear_rubble_activity_actor::deserialize },
7707  { ACT_CONSUME, &consume_activity_actor::deserialize },
7708  { ACT_CRACKING, &safecracking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7709  { ACT_CRAFT, &craft_activity_actor::deserialize },
7710  { ACT_DATA_HANDLING, &data_handling_activity_actor::deserialize },
7711  { ACT_DISABLE, &disable_activity_actor::deserialize },
7712  { ACT_DISASSEMBLE, &disassemble_activity_actor::deserialize },
7713  { ACT_DROP, &drop_activity_actor::deserialize },
7714  { ACT_EBOOKSAVE, &ebooksave_activity_actor::deserialize },
7715  { ACT_FIRSTAID, &firstaid_activity_actor::deserialize },
7716  { ACT_FORAGE, &forage_activity_actor::deserialize },
7717  { ACT_FURNITURE_MOVE, &move_furniture_activity_actor::deserialize },
7718  { ACT_GLIDE, &glide_activity_actor::deserialize },
7719  { ACT_GUNMOD_ADD, &gunmod_add_activity_actor::deserialize },
7720  { ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE, &gunmod_remove_activity_actor::deserialize },
7721  { ACT_HACKING, &hacking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7722  { ACT_HACKSAW, &hacksaw_activity_actor::deserialize },
7723  { ACT_HAIRCUT, &haircut_activity_actor::deserialize },
7724  { ACT_HARVEST, &harvest_activity_actor::deserialize},
7725  { ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR, &hotwire_car_activity_actor::deserialize },
7726  { ACT_INSERT_ITEM, &insert_item_activity_actor::deserialize },
7727  { ACT_INVOKE_ITEM, &invoke_item_activity_actor::deserialize },
7728  { ACT_LOCKPICK, &lockpick_activity_actor::deserialize },
7729  { ACT_LONGSALVAGE, &longsalvage_activity_actor::deserialize },
7730  { ACT_MEDITATE, &meditate_activity_actor::deserialize },
7731  { ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL, &migration_cancel_activity_actor::deserialize },
7732  { ACT_MILK, &milk_activity_actor::deserialize },
7733  { ACT_MOP, &mop_activity_actor::deserialize },
7734  { ACT_MOVE_ITEMS, &move_items_activity_actor::deserialize },
7735  { ACT_OPEN_GATE, &open_gate_activity_actor::deserialize },
7736  { ACT_OXYTORCH, &oxytorch_activity_actor::deserialize },
7737  { ACT_PICKUP, &pickup_activity_actor::deserialize },
7738  { ACT_PICKUP_MENU, &pickup_menu_activity_actor::deserialize },
7739  { ACT_PLAY_WITH_PET, &play_with_pet_activity_actor::deserialize },
7740  { ACT_PRYING, &prying_activity_actor::deserialize },
7741  { ACT_READ, &read_activity_actor::deserialize },
7742  { ACT_REEL_CABLE, &reel_cable_activity_actor::deserialize },
7743  { ACT_RELOAD, &reload_activity_actor::deserialize },
7744  { ACT_SHAVE, &shave_activity_actor::deserialize },
7745  { ACT_SHEARING, &shearing_activity_actor::deserialize },
7746  { ACT_STASH, &stash_activity_actor::deserialize },
7747  { ACT_TENT_DECONSTRUCT, &tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::deserialize },
7748  { ACT_TENT_PLACE, &tent_placement_activity_actor::deserialize },
7749  { ACT_TRY_SLEEP, &try_sleep_activity_actor::deserialize },
7750  { ACT_UNLOAD, &unload_activity_actor::deserialize },
7751  { ACT_UNLOAD_LOOT, &unload_loot_activity_actor::deserialize },
7752  { ACT_VEHICLE_FOLD, &vehicle_folding_activity_actor::deserialize },
7753  { ACT_VEHICLE_UNFOLD, &vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::deserialize },
7754  { ACT_WASH, &wash_activity_actor::deserialize },
7755  { ACT_WEAR, &wear_activity_actor::deserialize },
7756  { ACT_WIELD, &wield_activity_actor::deserialize},
7757  { ACT_WORKOUT_ACTIVE, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7758  { ACT_WORKOUT_HARD, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7759  { ACT_WORKOUT_LIGHT, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7760  { ACT_WORKOUT_MODERATE, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7761 };
7762 } // namespace activity_actors
7763 
7764 void serialize( const cata::clone_ptr<activity_actor> &actor, JsonOut &jsout )
7765 {
7766  if( !actor ) {
7767  jsout.write_null();
7768  } else {
7769  jsout.start_object();
7770 
7771  jsout.member( "actor_type", actor->get_type() );
7772  jsout.member( "actor_data", *actor );
7773 
7774  jsout.end_object();
7775  }
7776 }
7777 
7778 void deserialize( cata::clone_ptr<activity_actor> &actor, const JsonValue &jsin )
7779 {
7780  if( jsin.test_null() ) {
7781  actor = nullptr;
7782  } else {
7783  JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7784  if( data.has_member( "actor_data" ) ) {
7785  activity_id actor_type;
7786  data.read( "actor_type", actor_type );
7787  auto deserializer = activity_actors::deserialize_functions.find( actor_type );
7788  if( deserializer != activity_actors::deserialize_functions.end() ) {
7789  JsonValue jv = data.get_member( "actor_data" );
7790  actor = deserializer->second( jv );
7791  } else {
7792  debugmsg( "Failed to find activity actor deserializer for type \"%s\"", actor_type.c_str() );
7793  actor = nullptr;
7794  }
7795  } else {
7796  debugmsg( "Failed to load activity actor" );
7797  actor = nullptr;
7798  }
7799  }
7800 }
